title: SecureW2 JoinNow
description:
You can securely access your organization's wireless network after easy configuration using the SecureW2 JoinNow app. JoinNow only needs to be run once, then you'll be able to connect to your organization's secure Wi-Fi network. 

How does it work? There are two steps that occur when you do the one-time setup:

The app will automatically download your organization's Wi-fi configuration settings and install them on your device.

Your device will connect to the network through a secure, encrypted connection.

From there on, you don't need to do anything beyond leaving JoinNow on your device. You'll be able to effortlessly connect to your network.

Please note:

Deleting the app (or deactivating it through an "app sleep" feature, as seen on Samsung devices) will remove the Wi-Fi configuration settings, interrupting your Wi-Fi connection. 

Google's Android device policy is the reason why you are required to set a screen PIN lock once your device is configured for connection to secure wireless networks. This is not a SecureW2 JoinNow policy. Your screen PIN lock must be enabled, otherwise you may experience issues with connectivity.
 
If you have any questions or issues with the app, be sure to check out our Android Common Issues page here: 

https://cloud.securew2.com/public/guides/android/

You may also read our Privacy policy here: https://cloud.securew2.com/public/general/privacy-policy.html


To learn more about SecureW2 and the services we offer, you can visit our site: https://www.securew2.com/

recentChanges:
1. Improved instructions and images for better user experience.
2. Help Guides button linking to a new Common Issues page.
3. Minor bug fixes.
comments: At least once a week I have to uninstall and reinstall this darn app because it randomly stops working and won't allow me to connect to the university internet. Extremely frustrating when you have to spend an hour setting up internet when you're just trying to write your thesis. Unfortunately there is no other way to connect to the university internet except using this app so I just have to put up with it.

Doesn't work, still can't connect to organizations wifi. Using Android 10, followed instructions to the letter. Tried multiple times. Fails every time. Absolute garbagio, avoid this app at all costs and petition your schools to abandon it ASAP
This app does not work anymore, you guys keep telling people to give you feed back. This has been an issues for over a year now, why isn't this fixed yet?

Will not let me connect to my University wifi. It says I'm enrolled successfully but when I check my wifi I'm still on guest network forcing me to renew my wifi every few hours and will not allow me to connect to my school wifi for full access. Following the troubleshoot instructions did not help either

kann mich mit meinem s20 gar nicht verbinden obwohl die app meint, dass ich erfolgreich angemeldet bin. EDIT: i sent you an Email but its just like i descriped, it just doesnt connect and it use to connect normally

title: QR & Barcode Reader
description:
QR & Barcode Reader is a modern QR code scanner and barcode scanner with all the features you need.

Scan any QR code or barcode to get additional information including results from popular online services; Amazon, eBay and Google - 100% FREE!

ALL COMMON FORMATS
Scan all common barcode formats: QR, Data Matrix, Aztec, UPC, EAN, Code 39 and many more.

RELEVANT ACTIONS
Open URLs, connect to WiFi hotspots, add calendar events, read VCards, find product and price information, etc.

SECURITY AND PERFORMANCE
Protect yourself from malicious links with Chrome Custom Tabs featuring Google Safe Browsing technology and profit from shorter loading times.

MINIMAL PERMISSIONS
Scan an image without giving access to your device storage. Even share contact data as QR code without giving access to your address book!

SCAN FROM IMAGES
Detect codes within picture files or scan directly using the camera.

FLASHLIGHT AND ZOOM
Activate the flashlight for reliable scans in dark environments and use pinch-to-zoom to read barcodes even from far distances.

CREATE AND SHARE
Share arbitrary data such as website links with the built-in QR code generator by displaying them on your screen as a QR code and scanning them with another device.

CUSTOM SEARCH OPTIONS
Get specific information by adding custom websites into the barcode search (i.e. your favorite shopping website).

CSV EXPORT AND ANNOTATIONS
Manage unlimited history and export it (as CSV file). Import it to Excel or save it to any cloud storage such as Google Drive. Annotate your scans and manage product inventory or implement quality assurance in your small business!

Enjoy one of the best QR code reader apps available for smartphones and tablets running Android 6.0 or higher.

Supported QR codes:
‚Ä¢ website links (URL)
‚Ä¢ contact data (MeCard, vCard, vcf)
‚Ä¢ calendar events
‚Ä¢ WiFi hotspot access information
‚Ä¢ geo locations
‚Ä¢ phone call information
‚Ä¢ email, SMS and MATMSG

Barcodes and two-dimensional codes:
‚Ä¢ article numbers (EAN, UPC, JAN, GTIN, ISBN)
‚Ä¢ Codabar or Codeabar
‚Ä¢ Code 39, Code 93 and Code 128
‚Ä¢ Interleaved 2 of 5 (ITF)
‚Ä¢ PDF417
‚Ä¢ GS1 DataBar (RSS-14)
‚Ä¢ Aztec Code
‚Ä¢ Data Matrix

QR Code is a registered trademark of DENSO WAVE INCORPORATED in the United States and other countries.

You can't search the country. Not sure why Chrome keyword exists in ootions... Wroks really slow, and on really samll qr you need to center it perfectly and is slow.

For some reason after I scan a QR Code the link is unable to be clicked nor to be copied so I had to manually type a super long "supposed to be one click" link. It was a google form (if ever you are asking).
It works quick for me and I don't have to go to the app for me to scan its at the top of my screen when I scroll down to see my settings I haven't had any ads from this app so far so

less than 3mb is quite impressive, considering that my gallery app is around 100 and is less complex than this, honestly I'm gonna use this once a year but it's not worth installing cause it's so dang small, seems pretty nice from what I've used however.

it seems to be good to me it'll scan the code and scanned the internet and gave me the information that on the subject,but I've only used it once. if it continues to work properly I'd be happy bumping it up to 5 stars üåü.

title: Free WiFi Passwords & Hotspots by Instabridge
description:
The Wifi Hunt is over!


We‚Äôve all been there: you‚Äôre in a rush or not sure which place has free wifi and you don‚Äôt want to go on a scavenger hunt throughout the city every time you need to connect! Instabridge is here to save you the hassle of asking for the wifi password everywhere you go. The offline map makes it the perfect travel app. With over 20 million hotspots added to our database, Instabridge is like a master key that can help you connect when and where you want.

Instabridge is a worldwide community of people who share WiFi passwords. We‚Äôve collected over 20 million passwords and hotspots, and this number is growing every day! It‚Äôs totally free, saves you money on data usage, and helps others who can‚Äôt afford wifi connect when they need to. The more people that add WiFi, the closer we are to making WiFi free and accessible for everyone! 

Just download the app >> Automatically connect to WiFi >> Join our community

With millions of secure, up-to-date WiFi hotspots, Instabridge is the simplest way to surf the Internet for free. Instabridge's Wifi finder knows which Wi-Fi networks work and automatically keeps you off those that don't. No setup required. It just works! With our beautifully integrated travel map and detailed statistics on every network in our database, you won‚Äôt ever have to worry about how and where you can connect.

FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Get free Wi-Fi Internet connections in all major cities
‚Ä¢ Data saving web browser with 10x better compression than the competition
‚Ä¢ No data limitation, no cost
‚Ä¢ Auto-connect to Wi-Fi as soon as it‚Äôs available (perfect on airports). Get free Internet automatically!
‚Ä¢ Useful stats (like speed, popularity and data usage) on any password or hotspot in our database.
‚Ä¢ Offline maps included so you can find hotspots even when you‚Äôre roaming or low on data! The perfect app when travelling! 
‚Ä¢ Supports WEP, WPA, WPA2 and WPA3.
‚Ä¢ Easier to use than WPS.
‚Ä¢ Easy to use speed tests.


Help us make WiFi accessible to everyone! When you join our community, you‚Äôre paving the way for the millions of people worldwide who can‚Äôt afford WiFi at home.


What others are saying about Instabridge:
""Instabridge is a Swedish company that‚Äôs invented something so simple, and so awesome, that you‚Äôve got to wonder what took this industry so long!""
Android Authority

‚ÄúToday‚Äôs application is, simply, exceptional. It's a brilliant idea, an excellent solution and executed perfectly. I'm in love.‚Äù
El Android Libre

""Instabridge is an elegant solution""
Lifehacker

""A simple interface allows friends to get access without having to type in a convoluted string of numbers and letters from a scrap of paper.""
The Economist



*****
Important Note: Instabridge is not for Wi-Fi tethering nor is it a Wi-Fi hacker tool and cannot be used for Wi-Fi hacking in any way. Instabridge syncs wifi passwords between your own devices and to people you have chosen to trust.

comments: Free share WiFi. When I first download the app I thought it was just search free Wi-Fi. I can see a lot of people in the reviews don't understand this app works . First you download the app create a profile. And you share your own lock Wi-Fi with your own password so other people can use your network. Only with the password. Basically You're allowing people to use your network only if they download and connect to the app with your Wi-Fi password.

Aright I have to admit this app is great but wouldn't be better if this app was offine and if it was offline my rating would be 5 star üí´ ‚ú®. I say that tho because it would make more sense for this app be offline not for Internet. But otherwise it's a good app.

This app is very nice because we can see password of WiFi without connected. But it not show our neighborhood wifi... We can only see others WiFi who is far from us. I think developer has to fix this problem as soon.

Worthless because nothings open on my block and the locked ones cant recieve anything so I only needed wifi for a particular game that needs data and wifi together that game is very hard to connect to plus have to go up the street all the time 1 block over has free 12 open wifis that open up makes no sense on that its annoying for neighborhoods
Apple has a different version of this app on their app store but it is still the same thing pretty much. Does the same thing just looks different for Android. Still a must have app tho!

title: Calendar
description:
Simple Calendar - Easy Schedule & Agenda Planner has everything you need to organise your diary.

Proton Calendar is a personal calendar app that lets you take control of your daily tasks. With Calendar, you can quickly schedule meetings and events and get reminders about upcoming activities.

The interface in 2021 calendar with holidays is quite simple. To add an event to the calendar just tap the day and then move on to add an event and its duration. Add events, set reminders and even sync other digital calendars to stay on top of your routine like Trello: Organize anything with anyone, anywhere!

A Calendar Feature:
‚Ä¢ Any.do app - any to do list app and daily planner
‚Ä¢ aCalendar - Send and receive meeting invitations in Proton Calendar.
‚Ä¢ Fanya - Todo Lists & Tasks Organizer - Add a special calendar for the birthdays of people in your Contacts list.
‚Ä¢ Events from Gmail - Flight, hotel, concert, restaurant reservations and more are added to your calendar automatically.
‚Ä¢ To-Do List - Use Reminders to create and view to-dos alongside your events. Remind Period Tracker - Period Calendar Ovulation Tracker.
‚Ä¢ Goals - Add personal goals‚Äîlike ‚Äúrun 3 times a week‚Äù‚Äîand Calendar will schedule time for them automatically.
‚Ä¢ One Calendar - View all your calendar accounts in a single app and see all your events in List, Day, Week, or Month view.
‚Ä¢ DigiCal Calendar Agenda - View and manage all your appointments, events and birthdays.
‚Ä¢ Handy Calendar 2021 Reminder ToDo - Subscribe to calendars for holidays, your favorite sports teams, and more.

Simple Calendar - Easy Schedule & Agenda Planner
‚Ä¢ Calendar Lite - Daily Planner, Event Schedule, Agenda Management in iCal
‚Ä¢ XP Calendar - Manage your tasks, meetings and birthdays in iCal
‚Ä¢ Different ways to view your icalendar - see all your events in List, month, week and day view.
‚Ä¢ Listta: notes and to-do tasks - Create, manage, and view your fantastical tasks, agenda alongside your events in icalendar.
‚Ä¢ Later - Schedule for Instagram - kalendar works with all calendars on your phone, including Exchange.

My Daily Planner: To Do List, Calendar, Organizer
Calendar offers various options to set reminders and program alarms so you don't forget any of your tasks. This helps ensure you arrive on time for any appointment or important reunion. You can always save important dates such as birthdays or anniversaries.

Simple Calendar to schedule your next meeting
My Calendar - Period Tracker is the best Ethiopian Calendar (·âÄ·äï ·àò·âÅ·å†·à™·ã´). Customizable calendar views, many Live Tile options, birthdays with photos and task management with task categories. Get My Daily Planner: To Do List, Calendar, Organizer.

USA Calendar with Holidays 2021
USA holiday calendar 2021 is a day planner and easy To Do Reminder with Alarm. Simple Calendar: daily planner, schedule maker is a free, professional and easy to use as bill calendar, appointment calendar and manage your business events and programs using Calendar Planner!

Appointment Calendar - Agenda, Tasks and Events
Keep track of your schedule and share it with others using My Calendar - Period Tracker. Simple Calendar is schedule planner, day planner, Proton Calendar and appointment calendar. Task Agenda: organize and remember your tasks!

Calendars: Planner & Reminders
With Calendar you should have no problem keeping track of all the activities and events in your daily life. Todoist: To-Do List, Tasks & Reminders

SYNC WITH GOOGLE CALENDAR, OUTLOOK AND EXCHANGE
There's no need to keep buying a new paper calendar every year because your Galaxy phone's digital Calendar has everything you need to organize your daily schedule. Add events, set reminders, and even sync other digital in google classroom, so you can always stay on top of your routine.

comments: Too many ads to be useful. I usually try to get used to an app before I buy it, that is not possible with this app due to the intrusive ads. If the ad frequency/disruption were fixed, I think it would still be 4 stars. I don't really see the advantage over google calendar. Maybe im missing something

I use this app to figure out dates for my stories that take place in the future but I was bored today and scrolled as far in the past as I can. You can go back to 33 AD. Then I tried going as far forward and I'm convinced it's infinite. I've been scrolling for an hour and I'm still going after 6000

I'm constantly forgetting what day it is. I've been through 3 months of chemo and radiation and the doctor is telling me that I have chemo brain. It makes you to kind of lose your memory for about 6 months. So I sometimes have to use the app just to figure out what the day and date yet. Thank you for your help.
Lost all my appt. Info had put on calendar since 1st of year on July 29th. Too many ads and interference. I think the recent update caused problems I had not experienced before.
Very hard to use. Bought no ads still having trouble. Will have to find another calendar program. Shuckins.

title: Smart Eye Tech-File Protection
description:
Screen Privacy and Document Security

Whether it‚Äôs private personal documents, photos or videos; or highly confidential business documents, contracts or presentations; no one should be able to view or have access to them except for you and anyone else you want to see them.  No one else. Period. It‚Äôs none of their business.  

Protect your files, your intellectual property, your privacy.  Keep sensitive documents private and confidential with Smart Eye Technology.  

Working at coffee shop? In line at the airport? Can you be sure no one is looking over your shoulders viewing that important file on your phone?  Smart Eye is the only authentication security platform that blocks unauthorized viewers with continuous biometric identification. 

When you open and view any type of file in the Smart Eye app, your device authenticates your identity and access through continuous facial recognition. Moment by moment the device scans your face.  If you put your phone down while the file is still open, a warning sign pops up to prevent passerby‚Äôs from seeing the file. The device also scans for any unauthorized faces that come into view. If someone does a warning sign pops up blocking their view and alerting you.

Secure File Sharing and Document Control
‚Ä¢ Send and receive documents with confidence. Smart Eye Technology puts you in complete control over who can view your documents and how they can access them.  

Secure file sharing begins with using multiple biometrics to authenticate access to documents you send. Select the number of biometrics you require to authenticate the receiver.  Default is two.  

Then control over document access is at your fingertips. How long can they have access? 24 hours? 72 hours? Where can they access it? At the office only? Can they share it? Can they download the document? Default is no. Changed your mind and want to delete access after sent? Done. Get notifications and keep track of activity on your document. 

Secure Platform
‚Ä¢ No document hacking through emails. No passwords to remember or hack. Smart Eye provides vigilant protection with its pioneering biometric security platform and the most advanced end-to-end encryption (256 bit encryption). 

Smart Eye Technology is Technology for Your Eyes Only.  Download Smart Eye today, and we‚Äôll keep an eye out for you.

Smart Eye Features:

Privacy & Security
‚Ä¢ Protect your privacy with continuous biometric recognition
‚Ä¢ View documents in a public place without fear of eavesdroppers
‚Ä¢ Continuous facial recognition ensures you and only you can see your screen
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúMultiple viewers‚Äù warning when someone peeks at your screen
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúAway from phone‚Äù pops up when you‚Äôre not at your phone

Biometric ID
‚Ä¢ Facial recognition
‚Ä¢ Fingerprint recognition
‚Ä¢ Print behavior 
‚Ä¢ Voice recognition
‚Ä¢ Iris recognition (COMING SOON)
‚Ä¢ Sign documents with facial recognition

Advanced Document Control
‚Ä¢ Upload, review, send, receive, store and sign e-documents
‚Ä¢ Protect documents you send with multiple biometrics
‚Ä¢ Control document access limits
‚Ä¢ Document tracking with real-time notifications
‚Ä¢ Set retention requirements to keep information secure

Take control of your security. Protect your documents with Smart Eye Technology.

Visit us at:
www.getsmarteye.com

title: ID.me Authenticator
description:
ID.me Authenticator is a simple and free Two Factor Authentication (2FA) solution for your ID.me account. It keeps your online accounts secure on websites that support 2FA. This app generates 6-digit Time-Based One-Time Passwords (TOTP) and PUSH notification based one-touch authentication.

ID.me Authenticator as a TOTP Code Generator: Signing into your account requires your username, password and a verification code that you can generate using this app. Once configured, you can get verification codes without the need for a network or cellular connection when this app is used as a TOTP code generator. You can enroll and connect ID.me Authenticator to your account for 2FA by scanning the QR code at setup time.

ID.me Authenticator for PUSH based authentication: You enter your username and password when signing into your account, then approve the push notification sent to your phone. You will need to enroll and connect ID.me Authenticator to your ID.me account to enable this feature.

comments: It is simple all I ever get when I use your app is codes to prove my identity. Which I have done. And I cannot do anything else. When I contact support I never get a response back. You all suck. I thought this was a way that we could look up things that were needed. But it's not. Even when you go to the site online you can't do anything on it either. If there was a way I wouldn't even giving you the one star.

Not only is the app worthless, the customer service is terrible. After multiple attempts to get identified I kept on being rejected and I did not receive the option of the trusted referee as per the website. So I sent an email to contact us. After a couple of days I got a reply with the same instructions I had already tried and never worked. They just insisted to keep trying and wasting my time. HORRIBLE

ID.me is a piteously poor-quality implementation of an automated facial and ID recognition platform. The text recognition alone is so poor that it failed to recognize my address and birthday in two separate places in two separate ways despite crystal clear digital camera images. It also failed to authenticate one of my documents, and doesn't support Google voice numbers. After misrecognizing text, it does not let you fix their error or modify the information. No reupload. Clunky video chat.

This is the worst website I have ever tried to navigate through! The absolute worst! It is not user friendly, no clear instructions, just not well developed.. So sad! And customer service is only by email and waiting for a response. Why can't I speak to someone? Very disappointed.

This app is beyond ridiculous! I've been trying to sign in with whatever code that is supposed to be sent, and nothing happens. Just the same old email telling me to download the app. But if I'm on the app it says my sign in is not authenticated. Well duh, I've been trying to do that but it keeps sending me in circles! The fact alone that this app only has a 3.3 should tell you everything. Run!!

title: Missed Free
description:
Ever wonder what calls are not making it to your phone‚Äôs call log or missed calls list?
 
Smartphones including iPhone can‚Äôt register incoming calls when the phone is not connected to the mobile operator‚Äôs network!
 
If you frequently travel by air, run out of battery, turn off your phone a lot or are often in areas with spotty coverage but always want to know who called, Missed Free is for you!
 
missed alerts you of the incoming calls when your phone is off or has no service. For example, if your phone is in airplane mode and three people call but don‚Äôt leave a voice mail then you will get alerts from missed for these calls when you connect back to your mobile operator‚Äôs network. Without missed you will never know who called!

title: NiceLock - Launcher for Good Lock
description:
NiceLock is a launcher application for Good Lock customization modules for Samsung devices.

Good Lock is an incredible official app by Samsung for customizing Samsung devices. It consists of modules which edit and change many things in the UI such as task changer,  notification panel, lockscreen, split screen and more. Unfortunately it is only available in a few countries. Even if you install them manually, most of them does not appear in your app drawer. That is where NiceLock comes into play, by acting as a launcher for all of your modules, allows you to access them.

Adfree version available here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bluehorizonapps.nicelock3Paid

Important Note:

‚Ä¢NiceLock does not install Good Lock modules due to Google Play Store rules, and you need to install these modules manually if you are outside Korea, the United States, UK, Singapore, Australia, and Canada. 


Features:
‚Ä¢Adding shortcuts to homescreen (Ad-Free only)

‚Ä¢Night Mode
NiceLock has a Night Mode option to be easier on your eyes and if you just prefer darker layouts.

‚Ä¢Cloud Database
When launched, NiceLock checks its own database to see if your modules have updates available.

‚Ä¢Cloud Rollout
When a new module is published, you will be able to see it on NiceLock instantly without even needing to update NiceLock! 

‚Ä¢Push Notifications
When a module update is available, NiceLock will send you push notifications.

‚Ä¢Material Design UI
NiceLock is updated with a fresh, clean Material Design UI. 


Good Lock ¬© is a trademark of Samsung.

title: Microsoft OneDrive
description:
Microsoft OneDrive keeps your photos and files backed up, protected, synced, and accessible on all your devices. This OneDrive app lets you view and share OneDrive files, documents, and photos with friends and family. Plus, you can use the app to automatically back up your phone‚Äôs photos and videos. Start with 5 GB of free cloud storage or upgrade to a Microsoft 365 subscription to get 1 TB of storage.

Microsoft OneDrive offers the following features:

Back up photos & videos
‚Ä¢ Automatic photo backup when you turn on Camera Upload
‚Ä¢ Find photos easily thanks to automatic tagging
‚Ä¢ View photos on your phone, computer, and online

File sharing and access
‚Ä¢ Share files, photos, videos, and albums with friends and family
‚Ä¢ Get notifications when a shared document is edited
‚Ä¢ Set password-protected or expiring sharing links*
‚Ä¢ Access selected OneDrive files on the app without being online

Document Scanning
‚Ä¢ Scan, sign, and send docs right from the OneDrive mobile app
‚Ä¢ Scan and markup docs, receipts, whiteboards, and more

Search
‚Ä¢ Search photos by what‚Äôs in them (i.e. beach, snow, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Search docs by name or content

Security
‚Ä¢ All OneDrive files are encrypted at rest and in transit
‚Ä¢ Personal Vault lets you protect your important files with identity verification
‚Ä¢ Restore files with version history
‚Ä¢ Stay protected with ransomware detection & recovery*

Works with Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, Outlook
‚Ä¢  Use Microsoft Office apps to edit and collaborate in real time on Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneNote files stored in OneDrive.
‚Ä¢  Back up, view, and save your Office documents.

The OneDrive app for Android offers 5 GB of free cloud storage to sync photos and files across your devices, share photos and docs, and keep your digital life backed up in the cloud.

Upgrade to a Microsoft 365 subscription
With a Microsoft 365 Personal subscription you get 1TB of storage (1TB of storage per person for up to 6 people with the Family subscription), OneDrive premium features, and access to all features in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and OneNote on mobiles devices, web browsers, PCs and Macs. 

To make an in-app purchase of a Microsoft 365 Personal or Family subscription: open the app, tap the Me tab, then tap your storage or the diamond icon. Subscriptions begin at $6.99 a month in the US, and can vary by region. Microsoft 365 subscriptions and OneDrive standalone subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your Google Play store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. 

To manage your subscriptions or to disable auto-renewal, after purchase, go to your Google Play store account settings. A subscription cannot be cancelled or refunded during the active subscription period.

Using this OneDrive app for work or school
For you to sign into your work or school account on OneDrive, your organization needs to have a qualifying OneDrive, SharePoint Online or Microsoft 365 business subscription plan. 
 
Privacy
This app is provided by Microsoft. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or its affiliates maintain facilities. 
 
Privacy Policy: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=507539 
Terms of Use: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=246338 

*Requires Microsoft 365 Personal or Family subscription

recentChanges: You can now display your media files on a Chromecast receiver or TV from a compatible device. Look for a Cast icon showing in the top toolbar. We hope you enjoy this top-requested feature!
comments: I use onedrive because for my work. I really hate the application. It's always take long time on my phone to open the file even if my connection is good. After takes time, sometimes it's failed. Please fix this issue. I have been using for few months still get same issue. Sometimes if I need urgent file to open, I need to turn on my computer to get faster.

Works great. Would love to have face catagorization and better search results though. I don't like that the search bar does not show albums in the results. It should show albums first if you are searching in the pictures section of the app. Aside from that so far so good. I got 1 year of 365 for 60% off by being a game pass subscriber so I'm giving the service a shot. It's good, but can be better. It's third with Amazon photos, and google photos besting it. Good work though guys. Keep it up! :)

Personally, I would say this app is the one app I use almost every day. It's great for storing everything & once you have it setup, it can in the background keep everything up to date. It isn't hard to install, setup & use. Give it a try !!

As with any Microsoft app, all things good aside from a tad of nagging issues that clearly had no thorough thinking when implemented. PROs are simpleness, efficiency, functionality and very fast operation. CONs one of the biggest issue is that sharing files lacks manageability, signalling and transparency. You should be able to better track, start, stop, analyze what you shared and who accessed/modified shared stuff. All in all one of the best i used for cloud storage though. GG

Thanks so much Samsung, thank you for putting my phone in safe mode and making it IMPOSSIBLE for me to transfer my data before I factory reset.. like there's nothing I can do to fix this, I am stuck and will probably end up losing all my valuable pictures and videos. Thanks a lot, also great customer service that didn't help whatsoever. Your company is a literal fraud, avoid Samsung at all costs.

title: Unroll.Me - Email Cleanup
description:
Decluttering your inbox has never been so easy, or looked so good. With Unroll.Me 3.0, you can unsubscribe from unwanted emails, consolidate sales, newsletters, and listserv emails into a convenient daily digest called the Rollup, and keep the rest in your inbox.

Stop stressing over your inbox and get back to spending time on what matters to you. Download Unroll.Me and get back the ‚Äúyou time‚Äù you‚Äôve been missing.

‚Ä¢ Unsubscribe from the email subscriptions you don‚Äôt want. No future emails from these senders will land in your inbox.

‚Ä¢ Rollup the email subscriptions you want into a daily digest, the Rollup. All future emails from these senders will bypass your inbox and be included in your daily Rollup digest.

‚Ä¢ Keep the email subscriptions you want right in your inbox. These emails will continue to land directly in your inbox.

‚Ä¢ Managing your subscriptions once they are unsubscribed, kept, or rolled up is also quite simple. Head over to the "Subscriptions" tab and you'll be able to make any edits you'd like.

‚Ä¢ The Rollup is a once-daily digest containing all of the rolled-up email subscriptions you receive and will be delivered each day at the time of your choosing: morning, afternoon, or evening.

Unroll.Me currently supports Gmail, Google Apps, Yahoo! Mail, AOL, and Outlook.com accounts.

Decluttering your inbox has never been so easy, or looked so good. With Unroll.Me 3.0, you can unsubscribe from unwanted emails, consolidate sales, newsletters, and listserv emails into a convenient daily digest called the Rollup, and keep the rest in your inbox.

Stop stressing over your inbox and get back to spending time on what matters to you. Download Unroll.Me and get back the ‚Äúyou time‚Äù you‚Äôve been missing.

‚Ä¢ Unsubscribe from the email subscriptions you don‚Äôt want. No future emails from these senders will land in your inbox.

‚Ä¢ Rollup the email subscriptions you want into a daily digest, the Rollup. All future emails from these senders will bypass your inbox and be included in your daily Rollup digest.

‚Ä¢ Keep the email subscriptions you want right in your inbox. These emails will continue to land directly in your inbox.

‚Ä¢ Managing your subscriptions once they are unsubscribed, kept, or rolled up is also quite simple. Head over to the "Subscriptions" tab and you'll be able to make any edits you'd like.

‚Ä¢ The Rollup is a once-daily digest containing all of the rolled-up email subscriptions you receive and will be delivered each day at the time of your choosing: morning, afternoon, or evening.

Unroll.Me currently supports Gmail, Google Apps, Yahoo! Mail, AOL, and Outlook.com accounts.
summary: Clean your Inbox and Unsubscribe!

215 Park Ave S
Fl 3
New York, NY 10003

Introducing Unroll.Me 3.0!

‚Ä¢ Toggle for Rollup email notifications. If you aren‚Äôt receiving Rollup emails to your inbox, go to Settings -> Notifications, and enable New Rollup email notifications.
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes and other improvements to make your experience more enjoyable.

Loving the new Unroll.Me? Rate us to make it official. Have questions or suggestions? Drop us a line at support@unroll.me. We're always listening.
comments: After authentication and a pretty rigorous sign up/sign in process, it ends in a dead loop. "Step 1 of 3, Select application and choose other...". Displays 736 pages of a TOS and tells you it's important to read. As if anyone can spend a day reading and understanding them. Then it just stops. So thanks for promising me a great tool and then wasting 30 minutes of my life.

Whoops! Something went wrong. As soon as I try the last step, that's all I get. Tried 3 times. 2 step authentication is broke and b.s. I used this program for years. Now I will not anymore. Sad day. I would give 0 stars if I could.

Great app,, insanely helpful better than manually unsubscribing to every email when some have multiple To help others You need to enable the two Factor authentication, it's just creating a password for unroll to access your email to you one star review for that reason, you only need it once per email

I love the app! it beats logging in for every account. A few suggestions - please enhance the settings. I'd love to have the option to open links in my preferred browser, change colors, save passwords, etc.

Update 5/20/21: much better now. The new interface is much better and the bug was fixed. Old review: Used to be 5 star. Since new update i had to log in again. On the page to agree, it wont let me scroll down to find the button to agree.

title: Yoroi - The Cardano Wallet
description:
A simple, secure and fast Cardano ADA wallet.
English / Êó•Êú¨Ë™û / ÌïúÍµ≠Ïñ¥ / P—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π

Yoroi allows users to manage ADA on their phone. It is a lightweight wallet that launches quickly, allowing users to start sending or receiving ADA in minutes.

The Yoroi Android App is small and can be downloaded without using much bandwidth. Additionally, Yoroi is a light wallet, which means it does not require a full copy of the blockchain to be stored on the user's device. This means the bandwidth requirements for using the wallet are also low.

Private keys associated with user wallets are only stored locally on the user's device, and this data is encrypted with a wallet password. Private keys are never stored on any centrally-hosted servers.

With support in four languages, Yoroi makes it easier than ever to manage your ADA.

For more information, please visit the Yoroi website. https://yoroi-wallet.com

- Translations updates

comments: Been using Yoroi since the start. Dropped it from 5 to 2 stars. Wallet has become ridiculously slow, even just to load balance. I use Ledger, after I use it I need to restore it on Yoroi everytime if I want to use it again. Keep getting error message. You started out great but went downhill quickly. I'm off to research better choices. Down to 1 star. Now wallet won't even sync. You guys just get worse daily.

Look into other alternatives, Yoroi, and Emurgo by extension, have awful server consistancy and customer support. My wallet won't sync to their networks and I haven't been able to access my ADA for a while now. No phone number to call for help, sent a few emails with no responses back, kinda getting ridiculous. The only reason I didn't freak out was because I checked Twitter and saw I wasn't the only one having problems, not that Yoroi is acknowledging any of them, just crickets on their end.

The wallet still won't let me use biometrics to sign on with my galaxy s10e , even though it promotes it as a feature, also the updating of funds is often slow or even the intrawallet withdrawal is often glitchy, works, but needs a lot of work
Can be slow at times. Sometimes doesn't show my currency on curtain pages such as the dashboard, but will show up on transactions. I like that I can stake my money though.
The wallet works well for me. A little slow for a few minutes after the epoch but otherwise it's fine. Combine this and PoolTool to have a clear picture of your ADA staking and rewards.

title: Phone Link for Alexa
description:
Phone Link connects your Alexa device, such as an Amazon Echo speaker, to your phone or tablet, giving you the ability to read out and send text messages, make phone calls, locate a lost device, and stream music and audio files.  Use this app in combination with the Phone Link Alexa skill.

Here's what's included:

ADVANCED PHONE AND TABLET LOCATOR: 

If your device is close by, you can make it ring - even if it's in silent mode or has the do not disturb setting turned on. If the device is further away, you can get its approximate address.  Just say something like "Ask Phone Link to ring my phone" or "Ask Phone Link to find my tablet".

PHONE CALLS: 

You can ask Alexa to start a phone call on your phone. It will even turn on your phone's speakerphone if you don't have a Bluetooth connection. Just say something like "Ask phone link to call John Smith".

TEXT MESSAGING:

Phone link can read out and send text messages from many popular apps, including Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, your phone's SMS app, and many others. It is also able to read and reply to messages received in Gmail. It works by monitoring your notifications for incoming messages. This is the same system used by Wear OS and Android Auto. Just say something like "Ask Phone Link to send a text to Jane Doe." or "Ask Phone Link to read my messages."

If supported by your Alexa device, you can optionally have Alexa notify you when you have unread messages. When you see the notification light, just say "Alexa, what did I miss?"

MUSIC AND AUDIO STREAMING:

Stream music and audio files stored on your Android device to your Alexa device or app, giving Alexa access to your entire mp3 collection. You can direct Alexa to play by playlist, title, album, artist, or genre. The Phone Link app can be used to set up your playlists.

To start playback, just say something like "Ask Phone Link to play my workout playlist" or "Ask Phone Link to play some rock music".

WORKS WITH ECHO AUTO AND IN-CAR SYSTEMS:

Phone Link works with the Echo Auto and in-car systems, providing a safe way to send and receive text messages hands-free.

SUPPORTS FAMILIES AND PARENTAL MONITORING:

You can use phone link with multiple devices in your household. Just include the device's name in your voice command (e.g, "Ask Phone Link to find John's Phone").  Parents can use it to monitor the location of their children as well as the text messages they are receiving.

COMPATIBILITY:

Phone link works with Amazon Echo devices, the Echo Auto, Fire TV, and third party devices and apps such as Ultimate Alexa.

GETTING STARTED:

Install this app and follow the on-screen instructions. You can enable the Alexa skill and link it to your Amazon account within the app.

PRIVACY:

Your privacy is very important. Text messages and contact information are stored on your phone and nowhere else. Even when you ask Alexa to read or send a message, the message is routed between your phone and Alexa device without any storage occurring on our servers.

title: Persian Calendar
description:
Free and open-source Persian Calendar with Compass/Qibla and Athan, and Dari, Kurdish, Azeri, Pashto, Arabic, Gilaki and English support. Supports Gregorian and Islamic calendars support also.

Works with TalkBack accessibility feature of Android also.

https://github.com/persian-calendar/DroidPersianCalendar

Please note that permanent date notification bar can be easily disabled from preference. Also features an optional Athan player.

title: Flash Alert - Flash Notifications
description:
Don't worry about missing calls or any messages even when in silent mode with flash alert - flash call. When installing flash notifications, every time a call or message comes in, the flash on the phone will notify you. This is a free application that brings many benefits to users.  incoming call flash is simple, but highly appreciated for its functionality and applicability in many cases.

light phone - flashlight call will notify you with the blink of the flashlight every time when an incoming call or SMS arrives on your phone. Users can freely choose the flashing mode of the application such as: default mode, optional mode through parameters... This flexibility in customizability will surely bring many good experiences for users in many different cases.

Not only stopping at incoming calls and SMS messages, phone flash also allows users to manually set up flash notifications from other applications on the device. You just need to select the desired application, led notification will have instructions on how to do it, you just need to follow the instructions to be able to manually install the light notification for the application you want.

flash alert, flash notifications is optimized to run in the background of your phone. This ability to run in the background helps users not always have to open the flashlight call and still ensure not to miss any calls. You can also set the flash mode to save battery power. This means, you can set the flash to not fire while the battery level has reached the allowable limit. This function of the led notification is special useful when the phone's battery is not much, you don't have the phone charger there but still have to use it for a long time.

 incoming call flash - phone flash is extremely useful in cases when you are in a dark place, as well as a place that requires high silence, or a place that is too noisy. flash call  helps you find your phone extremely quickly in the dark even if you accidentally put it on silent mode. Or in meetings, in the hospital or church‚Ä¶ you don't want your phone to make any sound but still don't want to miss calls and notifications. Or even if you're at a party with the music playing, you can't hear the ringtone or feel your phone vibrate. With all the above cases, light phone is definitely the best choice for you.

flash alert is a free notification flash app exclusively for Android operating system. flash notifications, light phone has been thoroughly researched and tested to be able to optimize features, giving users the best experience. With extremely simple operations, quick setup time, this is a great choice for you. Download the free  incoming call flash - flash call app today to experience it together!

title: GTL | GettingOut
description:
GTL‚Äôs GettingOut mobile app is rooted in the power of relationships. It provides simple and reliable communication between inmates and their family and friends -- allowing them to stay connected, even on the go!

With our free mobile app, you can easily make deposits, send and receive messages with our new and improved messaging feature, send photos and videos (select facilities), manage contacts and more. Download the GettingOut app today!
descriptionHTML:
GTL‚Äôs GettingOut mobile app is rooted in the power of relationships. It provides simple and reliable communication between inmates and their family and friends -- allowing them to stay connected, even on the go!

With our free mobile app, you can easily make deposits, send and receive messages with our new and improved messaging feature, send photos and videos (select facilities), manage contacts and more. Download the GettingOut app today!
summary: Simple and reliable communication between inmates, friends and family
recentChanges: Bug fixes.
comments: Very frustrating to use. The app charges 25 cents per message/photo, each requiring approval before being available for the inmate to see. There are no guidelines listed explaining what's acceptable/not acceptable. If the message/picture isn't approved, there's no credit applied to the account. I sent my husband four pictures of his Chevelle, all were approved. Then, I sent a picture of the engine in that Chevelle, and it was declined. I sent the EXACT SAME picture again, they approved it. sigh

I have this installed on both an iPhone and droid. It is a great app when it works and I'm very thankful to have it available. . About a week ago, a forced update began causing the app not to work properly. Messages cannot be input or sent, but they can be read if you close the app and open it again. The photo icons aren't clickable either, however this will be a great feature when it's working again. The 'visit now' connects just fine and really appreciate that! If a developer, by any chance, is reading this review, I hope you're able to fix the last update so the app works again for messages and photos. If I can install an older version without a forced update, please let me know that work-around.

I dropped 60$ into this and have not gotten to use a cent. Like others had said, if you try to send a message or do anything, it just prompts you to make a deposit, and/or tells you that you don't have the funds. Well the funds are there!! Im livid. I've tried several times to contact service for help, but of course get no response. I want my money back!!! SCAM

Messaging doesn't work , viewing your profile doesn't work . the only feature that works is the deposit feature . BUT once you deposit it keeps prompting that you don't have enough money in your account to send messages that are . 34 cents! The worst part is because of covid this is about if as far as visiting or communicating with your loved one . parents trying to see their children , Siblings trying to uplift eachother only to be faced with frustration over a system that doesn't work .

This is the most fraudulent app and company ever. They take your money then never give you access. I can't even get online cause everytime I try to reset my password it goes to a blank screen. Customer service is a joke. You wait on hold forever, no one ever picks up. Their form is another joke... They don't even acknowledge that you filled one out. I've deposited 25 dollars on my account that I cant use, access or even see and they have not responded or given me a refund. Snailmail is better

title: Xfinity
description:
The Xfinity app is the easiest way to activate your Internet service, get online in minutes, and set up your home network ‚Äî no technician needed. Never miss a moment with tools to improve your connection like speed test, troubleshooting, and more. Check network status, view your plan details, and even pay your bill, all from the palm of your hand. And get always-on support with 24/7 real-time help and support right from the app with Xfinity Assistant.

Plus, customers with an xFi Gateway get a powerful, more secure connection for your home with exclusive xFi features included in the app:
‚Ä¢ Protect your network.  Help keep your loved ones safer online with Advanced Security, included at no extra cost. 
‚Ä¢ Enjoy the ultimate control. Create your own WiFi name and password, assign user profiles, and view and control connected devices.
‚Ä¢ Have peace of mind. Pause WiFi for family time, set kid-safe browsing and much more with powerful parental controls.
‚Ä¢ Help improve WiFi coverage. Assess the strength of your WiFi and even order an xFi Pod, right from the app.

Getting started is simple. All you need is your Xfinity ID and the password you set up when you signed up for Xfinity Internet.

Need help signing in?
- If you don't have an Xfinity ID yet, create one here: xfinity.com/getstarted
- Look up your existing Xfinity ID: xfinity.com/id
- Or reset your Xfinity password: xfinity.com/password

Learn more about your options related to 'California Civil Code ¬ß1798.135: Do Not Sell My Info' at www.xfinity.com/privacy/manage-preference

comments: I am in horror at how awful my experiences have been with this app. It has never let me log on once, it says I need to 'upgrade my equipment for the latest experience'. Then it proceeds to tell me my equipment is up to date... cycle repeats. Tech support sends me devices that are identical and apparently will never work with the plan I have,,, SO WHY SEND ME THESE BOXES?? The app won't work with the device so therfore I cannot have access to the internet I pay for.This is ridiculous.Stay away!!!

Terrible! Comcast lies that this is the only way to reset your equipment and but won't let you log in! Disaster!!!! Existing customer, changing my plan. Comcast specifically states that customer service can't help. They force you to use the smartphone app. Yet in less than 10 minutes, telephone support downloaded my new plan info to my modem and Internet service was restored! App hadn't let me login! I had just logged in from my PC an hour before.

For this app being the only way -as far as I've been told- to interact fully with my Xfinity supplied Gateway modem [which I was told was the only cost-saving way to have unlimited internet] it functions rather well overall. Most of the extras I dont pay much mind to, but I can keep track of devices and it has been helping at least know where all the internet usage is going.

Hey look again, exact same thing need to update app before you can connect to wifi inorder to update app! Power flashed, so tried to connect to my router to reset it. But can't connect without wifi! So what's the point of the app then? Wifi not working again. So I open app to see why. "Update app" . If I had connection to update the app, I wouldn't need the app!

Incredibly Frustrating! I cannot sign in to activate my services, the website says Use the App! I tell them, it doesn't work but I get redirected to use this useless app. I enter my information and I am sent right back to the sign in screen. I'm sure it's nice once I get in, but I can't judge that yet.

title: Flashlight (free & without popup ads)
description:
Free, safe and effective LED flashlight app without intrusive popup ads and without unnecessary permissions.

The most important features of the flashlight:
- includes a flashlight widget,
- gesture support, double shake device sideways to turn on/off,
- bright light and high power,
- easy, effective and fast,
- can work when the device is locked,
- safe and without unnecessary permissions,
- free and without popup ads.

Why does the flashlight app require CAMERA permission on older devices?
Technically the flashlight is part of the camera, so sometimes it is required. 
We absolutely do not use camera to preview the image.

recentChanges:
Refreshed version (2020):
- Widget freezing bug fixed
- Refreshed theme and icons
- Optimization of speed and stability
comments: NO ADS! Creator of the app definitely understands what the people want and how they want it. When you first download the app and turn the app on it will let you know if it will work with your phone or not. (Probably to do with different operating systems and the ability to support the software used to create the app) NOTE!: my phone is a Samsung Galaxy S10 and it works great!

Easily the best torch app in the appstore. A nice, clean interface, with no permission-grab shenanigans either. The app itself has a fantastic low key approach to ads, with no pop-ups or pop-unders and definitely no intrusive or forced ads... If only every app developer behaved this way... In fact, it's so good an experience, that I'm bound to become anxious that the developers could knacker the app with some future update... Wow, did I just invent a whole new syndrome - UPDATE ANXIETY?

I really like the app. It's a flashlight so it's hard to get wrong. The main reason I downloaded it was because it supported gestures. You can turn the phone on by shaking the phone side ways twice. The problem I have with it is the app has to be running for it to work. It doesn't run in the background and I tried to enable "Accessibility Service" permissions to but it won't let me. If you make it to where it runs in background and I can use gestures without opening app first. 5 star app.
having to use an old phone with no build-in flashlight, this one is great. turns on right when I launch it, and I've had no issues. no intrusive ads, annoying crashes, nothing. good job üëç

The idea is good. It attempts to do what my old Motorola did without using an app. When I installed it, it told me that my Samsung S20 FE 5G is supported. Works fine for a few minutes (as long as you leave the app running). But it quickly stops responding at all, even with the sensitivity set to max. So rather disappointed after initial delight.

title: Time & Hours Tracker - TimeSheet

Add multiple contacts. Create contact by entering customer name, tax ID, address, and contact details. 
Add multiple projects, create new tasks and projects for the business. 
Create new tasks: Add project name, default project cost, unit type, default quantity, default taxes, notes, and other details.

By installing our time tracker app on your android device, you can manage to track your multiple projects in two different activity modes, i.e., project mode and task mode.

title: Okta Verify
description:
Okta Verify is a lightweight app that allows you to securely access your apps via 2-step verification, ensuring that you, and only you, can access your app accounts.

While you access your apps, you‚Äôll choose a 2-step verification method provided by Okta Verify to finish signing in. You can verify your identity using a push notification sent to your device (if enabled by your organization), a temporary 6-digit code, or biometrics (if enabled by your organization). 

We do request permission to use your device camera so that you can scan a QR code when you enroll your device with Okta.

App Features

Register your device with one or more Okta accounts that require Okta Verify for verification. 
Enroll your device in Okta to enable 2-factor verification using 6-digit one-time passcode.
Enroll your device in Okta for 2-factor verification using push notifications (if enabled by your organization).
Enroll on-device biometrics to use to sign in to an app (if enabled by or organization).
Add 2-factor verification for non-Okta apps that support or require the use of one-time passcodes.
Note: Some functionality is available only if enabled by your IT organization. For more information, check Okta Verify docs at - https://help.okta.com/en/prod/end-user/Content/Topics/end-user/ov-overview.htm?cshid=csh-user-ov-overview.

comments: I can't close the app with the back button, need to hit the home button. Also, couldn't use the app to scan until I hit the Google Play Review button, so here's your one star. Thanks!

UX is not the best I have seen compared to other similar app. When you approve a notification, Okta close the whole android notification curtain instead of just removing/updating the Okta notification. Also in the notification, the dismiss and validate actions are in the reverse order of what is customary on Android (and of what other similar app I use are using). On Android, dismissive actions are on the left and affirmative/validation actions are on the right.

You have to open the app to verify it's you and doesn't show notifications even though the app has full permission. The app doesn't even allow you to preview it's screen in multi task mode, neither does it support split screen, or taking screenshot which makes it very difficult to use when you have to switch between the apps.
The app is very slow compared to VIP access, which uses to work instantly. With Okta there is a delay of 10 to 15 seconds for receiving the notification and reaction on the Site.

Love the app got no issues, works with about every TOTP app out there, not just Okta. Since I required Okta for work I mode all my other ones ( where possible) into this to only have 1 app for all MFA QR code provider and push verification. Fairly simple. Although that said the simplicity is also why I am only giving it 3 stars, there are like ZERO options for configuration, can we have maybe a compact option or custom layout. And where is the DARK mode ????

title: Omega Engine - Watch Face
description:
Feel like the best secret agent while sporting the Omega watch face. You'll be able to leave your phone in your pocket as Omega will tell you every necessary detail you need to get through your day. By knowing your schedule with such details at a moment's glance, your friends might even think you to be a supernatural spy!

Omega is the most complete watch face for your Android Wear device. When fully utilized, Omega will tell you the time, date, weather, battery level of your devices, and your current fitness data. What follows is a list of all of Omega's fully customizable features:

DATE & TIME
- Of course

BATTERY
- Show battery from your watch and/or phone in the battery meters
- Choose the interval at which to poll the battery level of your devices
- Optionally show the exact battery life at the bottom of the screen*
- Use the battery life monitors on the watch face to display approximate battery life (within 10% to 18%)
- Optionally show only the current health block in ambient mode to reduce screen burn-in and brightness

WEATHER
- Omega's handheld app will get current weather information from Dark Sky
- Choose from a variety of details to show: the day's high & low, wind speed & direction, sunrise & sunset*
- Use imperial / metric units
- Note: Requires ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION and INTERNET permission

SCHEDULE
- Omega's wearable app will read the calendars that are on your wear device to determine your next event
- Choose the interval at which to check for new events
- As soon as your current event has ended, Omega will look for the next event
- Choose how long in the future you want to look: check for event in the next 2 hours or the next 1 week
- Note: Requires READ_CALENDAR permission

HEALTH*
- Omega's wearable and/or mobile app will read the Google Fit data from your device
- Choose from a variety of retrieval methods: Google Fit data or sensor data from phone or watch
- Choose the interval at which to update fitness data.
- Note: May require BODY_SENSOR permission

Every one of Omega's features/elements is completely optional and can be modified to your liking, here is what you can do to each element individually:

- Show/hide element*
- Change text size
- Change font
- Text color
- Vertical position*
- Text alignment
- Toggle icon
- Change icon side

*Note: some elements require paid version. Purchase the paid version for only $1.99 for a limited time at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.brohkahn.omega

Application Issues
Our goal was to create a complete and fully functional, usable, power efficient watch face. If you do not think that our mission was a success, please send us an email at kevin@broh-kahn.com with your issues and we will get back to you as quickly as possible. If you have an issue with the application, please do not leave a negative review or uninstall the app; contact us and we will do our best to solve your issue within 3 days.

Feature Requests
If you have a small feature request (i.e. configuration change) for this watch face, please send us an email at kevin@broh-kahn.com and your request will be completed within 1 week, guaranteed. Larger requests may take more time. If you would like us to design a new watch face with all the functionality of Omega, please get in touch and we'll work with you to design a well-designed and functional watch face

Notice: Omega only works on Android and Android Wear devices

This app is clean!!! The one issue I have is the GoldenEye font being too small

title: Movius for BlackBerry
description:
Movius for BlackBerry¬Æ is a cloud-based service that enables individuals and global businesses to achieve regulatory compliance for their mobile business communications. The solution gives employees a distinct mobile number for their business calls, text messaging and voicemail while maintaining privacy of their personal phone number. It works over any global carrier network and can be deployed globally at scale with built-in mobile recording without needing any change to the handset, the SIM or the user‚Äôs existing wireless carrier.

Movius for BlackBerry¬Æ is fully integrated with the BlackBerry Dynamics Android SDK and provides policy control for Enterprise IT Administrators. Movius for BlackBerry allows Click-to-dial and Click-to-message functionality for phone numbers appearing in any BlackBerry Dynamics Container Apps such as BlackBerry Work, BlackBerry Access or other third-party Apps.

Note: Activation of the service is required.

title: Microsoft Outlook: Secure email, calendars & files
description:
Microsoft Outlook keeps you connected and protected, with your email, calendar and files all in one app. With intelligent email, calendar reminders and contacts, Outlook for Android lets you do more from one powerful inbox. Connect. Organize. Get things done.

Email friends, family and colleagues from multiple accounts on one app and see what matters most first with the Focused Inbox that keeps the important messages on top. Switch between your emails and calendar to schedule your next meeting or share your availability with anyone with just a few taps. Email a document from your Files list or a photo from your Gallery and attach it easily.

Microsoft Outlook provides secure and seamless inbox management that enables you to stay connected on the go. Outlook includes Office, Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneDrive integrations to help you manage and send files and connects with Teams, Zoom and other video calling providers without hassle.

Customize email and calendars so you can stay on top of your busy day. Listen to what‚Äôs new in your inbox, organize schedules and more. Find what you need with Search- it‚Äôs only a tap away or you can use your voice and ask for what you need with language you use every day.

Outlook for Android works with Microsoft Exchange, Microsoft 365, Outlook.com, Gmail and Yahoo Mail.

MICROSOFT OUTLOOK FEATURES:

Secure Email, Calendar, Contacts & Files ‚Äì All In One Place
‚Ä¢ Email, calendar, contacts and files are all together in one place.
‚Ä¢ Calendar and file access right from your inbox.
‚Ä¢ Connected experiences with Office, Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneNote.
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Office documents are accessible from Outlook, stored locally, or on OneDrive or other cloud storage.
‚Ä¢ Create and join your online video calls and meetings with Teams, Zoom, BlueJeans and Webex.

Email & Day Planner Management ‚Äì Everything Organized
‚Ä¢ Outlook helps you stay on top of your day with customized calendar and email capabilities.
‚Ä¢ Know what‚Äôs Up Next in your day from your calendar with a glance at your inbox.
‚Ä¢ Email inbox management displays your most important messages first and enables swipe gestures and smart filters.
‚Ä¢ Use as an organizer & share calendars to easily coordinate schedules.
‚Ä¢ RSVP to invitations from your inbox and send a personalized comment too.
‚Ä¢ Add schedules from Facebook or of your favorite sports & TV shows through Bing calendars.

Calendar & Inbox Organizer ‚Äì Intelligence Everywhere
‚Ä¢ Outlook provides helpful ways for you to stay focused.
‚Ä¢ Use your voice to find people, contacts, emails, events and attachments with Search.
‚Ä¢ Use suggested replies instead of typing out your message responses to get things done faster.
‚Ä¢ Email manager highlights actions for you through @mentions.
‚Ä¢ Calendar automatically updates with travel and delivery information.
‚Ä¢ Focused Inbox keeps important emails and conversations front and center.
‚Ä¢ Email organizer groups same subject emails and conversations for easier tracking.
‚Ä¢ Listen to your emails with Play My Emails in English and catch up hands-free to get time back in your day.

Email Management & Spam Protection ‚Äì Safe & Secure
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Outlook protects your information with security you can trust.
‚Ä¢ Simple, secure sign-on to authenticate and protect your identity.
‚Ä¢ Email management with built-in protection against viruses and spam.
‚Ä¢ Advanced protection to keep your messages safe from phishing attacks and other online threats.
‚Ä¢ Microsoft security and privacy keeps your email, calendar, contacts and files safe.

Get management for contacts, email, work schedule, files and more with Microsoft Outlook today.

‚Ä¢ Listen to your emails with Play My Emails in English and catch up hands-free to get time back in your day.

Email Management & Spam Protection ‚Äì Safe & Secure

summary: Connect & protect your inbox, schedules and contacts. Easily organized together.
recentChanges: When adding a recipient to an email, tap "X" to remove unwanted people suggestions. When you remove a suggested person, you will not see it appear on other Outlook apps either.
comments: Works ok. Only major annoying issue for me is instead of being able to collapse group folders or extend them to view sub-folders as in MS Outlook desktop version. I'm forced to scroll down my entire list of folders just to get to a particular sub-folder. This is a major waste of time, and its definitely non-productive. I don't understand why or how the developers didn't see or comprehend this feature. Simply put, Fix it! ...and bc of this blunder, I've only awarded one star.

So, overall experience not bad. However I mostly use outlook for business emails. (Which I send a lot by the way.) But for some reason when I send the initial email, it usually sends it to the other persons spam box. I've lost so many customers because of this issue! Other than that reason, everything else is exceptional!

Appalling experience. I installed this several times on my Samsung tablet. Although it show normal text emails well enough, any attachments simply did not show. Could not be downloaded. Having spend several hours with this App I installed another email app that doesn't screw around with attachments. And yes, I did read all the advice given about downloading and using the file manager to locate the attachments, checked all my settings, etc etc. Installed a different App that works fine.
Revising my earlier review. Actually found where to see and edit all contract. Almost a needle in a haystack. Just need to know how to find what you're looking for. Once you find it, it's easy.

I love outlook, especially the ability to have email from multiple sources. I have my Yahoo, Gmail emails all in one 08/14/21 I'm still loving it!!!! It is the best. Before u do 1,2,3 stars, read the doc, learn the features, know the capabilities. You will be simply WOW

title: Hero
description:
The new Hero app is designed to make tracking behaviors, complying disciplinary actions, and reviewing student information an efficient experience on any mobile device.
With drastic improvements to mobile barcode reading, redesigned workflows to make tracking multiple students easier, smarter ways to search for students, and new compliance modes, these new apps are designed to fit in seamlessly with how you work at school.

We're also excited about what these apps represent: a new mobile platform for Hero that we can aggressively expand upon. The world is mobile first, and we believe your school productivity apps should be the same. In the future, we will be adding classroom interfaces, integrating the student and guardian portals, and adding all kinds of amazing functionality to these apps.

Features Include: 

- Track single or multiple behaviors at once, by searching or scanning IDs.
- Choose disciplinary actions and dates, or apply a default policy.
- Comply student disciplinary actions by student, by scanning IDs, or by disciplinary action.
- See contact information, behavior history, behavior overview, and schedule in student profile.
- Enhanced security through supported biometrics (FaceID, TouchID, and Android Biometric ID).

Existing App Users, Notice These Key Differences:

- Event tracking is not supported in the new apps at this time.
- The general behavior tracking workflow has been revised.
- You are now able to select multiple behaviors, and then initiate a scan or search to select a student.
- Once you have selected a student, you can confirm all of the behaviors and consequences to apply.
- A student's behavior history only shows the 200 most recent entries.
- Compliance now has three modes: Search, scan, and list.

I always have problem updating any info on this app. Personally I think it sucks.
It keeps telling me that this app only supports school staff, which I am. I've uninstalled and reinstalled multiple times and it still won't work. I can log on to the website but not this app.

title: iScan
description:
Now convert your smart phone into a mini pocket scanner and enjoy the high quality image in your device within just one touch with the best ever scanning mobile app iScan. iSacn lets you quickly scan any kind of documents in your office, images, bills, receipts, books, magazines, class notes and anything that needs to be there in your device within no time. This is the fastest means to get the scanned document in the highest quality and convert it immediately into PDF or JPEG format so that you can share the scanned document, image, books, bills, important notes or any kind of paper that you can think of.

***********************
APP FEATURES
***********************
‚úì Automatic document edge detection and perspective correction
‚úì Extremely Fast Processing
‚úì Professional quality results with multiple filter options: photo, document, clear, colour or black & white

‚úì Tiny app size.

title: STOPit
description:
STOPit is transforming the way the world reports and prevents inappropriate behavior. Communities and organizations, such as schools, businesses, and governments, depend upon the individuals within them to speak up in order to keep people safe and mitigate risk. With a simple mobile app, STOPit instantly and anonymously enables users to share information with those who can help resolve issues. STOPit also equips administrators with a smart, easy backend system which supports anonymous two-way communication and other tools to save time and conduct effective, efficient investigations. Most importantly, STOPit is a powerful deterrent for inappropriate behavior. STOPit is helping create safe, smart places for people to live, work and learn.

With the STOPit app, you can anonymously report incidents to your school or employer, which may include text and photos or video. Use STOPit to anonymously alert your organization to inappropriate conduct or safety concerns such as harassment, bullying, ethics or compliance violations, weapons possession, hazing, safety hazards, threats, assault, or illegal activity, or to ask for help for yourself or another.

You can also use STOPit Messenger, which provides for two-way anonymous communication between you and your organization. With STOPit Messenger, your organization can respond to your report to ask questions, and you are able to provide more information, while remaining completely anonymous. You can also use STOPit Messenger to begin a completely anonymous conversation with someone from your organization.
Your organization may also use STOPit to provide you with access to Resources under Get Help. Your organization may also send you Notifications such as updates or alerts, which you will receive in the STOPit app.

Download STOPit for free and get started by entering the access code provided by your organization.

comments: Overall, pretty great game. The plot kept me interested enough, I thought the storyline with the evil Stop-It button being defeated by the Report button was intriguing. The graphics are stunning but the real joy comes from the gameplay, oh man the joy that can come from solving the "Write a report" puzzle, it's incredibly confusing because the game never tells you what actually qualifies as a death threat, so it was really challenging. Overall 7.8/10 too much water. -Will Bair, scientologist

this app is a good idea, that being said it is a idea that is not ever going to be perfect. Does it give some the voices to speak up, yes, but it also increases fear in the minds of students. The fear of messing up can take over ones mind small things that don't really matter. This app is a good way to speak up but it can just as easily be used to spread hate or push someone over the edge. This is a step to fixing a problem but one that needs much improvement.

I think the app has a wonderful purpose and purely good intent behind it--I'm a 16 year old that has endured hell itself with peers. While I love the message and meaning of it, my school is so small I'm rendered unable to use it; as everyone knows everyone, and though it is anonymous someone some way or another will find out and my a$$ will promptly be kicked. The bad reviews are truly pointless to me. Before you trash talk it: think about the meaning of it. Its intent is solely to help you.

Overall pretty good game good setup thought the "report button" could use a little bit more work. Wish the game could be cross platform so I can play with friends. Pretty challenging writing a report.

honestly the reviews are off the wall and i think they should improve to stop the nonsense reporting because if something was a crime or reporting someone doing something they shouldn't be doing all these petty reporting are wasting the police time. of course always go old school if it was emergency to call 911. as an example if there was a woman who her boyfriend was beating her and this is safest to report for help, she wont get help right away because of petty reports cops are investigating.

title: Digital Secure
description:
Digital Secure is a one-stop suite of privacy and security tools for your mobile devices and computers. Protect your devices from online threats, connect to public Wi-Fi with a secure VPN, take control with always-on dark web monitoring, and get guidance on online security from security experts. 

Peace of mind. 24/7.

Here‚Äôs what you‚Äôll get with Digital Secure.

Free security and privacy tools, plus advanced protection for as low as $5 per month. 

1. Security and Privacy (Free)
Protect your device from online threats. Get warnings when connecting to unprotected networks, visiting risky websites or attempting dangerous downloads.

2. Safe Wi-Fi (Paid)
Protect your personal data and online activities on public Wi-Fi networks with a secure VPN connection. So you can connect to any Wi-Fi with confidence. 

3. Identity Theft Protection (Paid)
Take control with always-on dark web monitoring, social media monitoring, and lost wallet guidance. Get theft and breach alerts, and guidance from recovery specialists if essential items such as credit cards and IDs are lost.

4. Security Advisor (Paid)
Get one-click access to security experts. Security Advisors are just a chat away to help answer questions or provide guidance on online security. You can also get tips and solutions on how to take your online security even further with articles, guides and videos from Security Center.

It's your online world. Keep it that way with Digital Secure.

Get your first month on us*.

For a detailed list of features, visit: https://www.verizon.com/digital-secure

*First month free for new customers. Thereafter, you will be billed $5 per month per line or $10 per month per account unless you cancel before promo period ends. Cancel anytime in My Verizon.

comments: How did this app get a 4 star rating? Does not work on my phone. Never has. I've called numerous times. On the phone with Verizon 4 hours one time and they still could not fix, yet I am paying for this? What a ripoff.

Navigating logically back & forth among featured selections:it seems to attempt to anticipate your need only leading to forcing you to start over,wasting time or/and blowing an opportunity window to get something beneficial done conveniently.
Life is complicated. I was hoping this would make life simpler. Not so. I think this app suits Verizon's needs more than its customers. I could be wrong......

Worst ever, crashes daily, lets unidentified networks on! I don't recommend! Every time I send to support they shut it it off for me to turn on again!!! They tell me I don't see you have digital secure, well then what am I paying $10 a month for called digital secure? Oh yes there it is, you do. I have security issues so this needs to be fixed. I thought Verizon was best I am starting to wonder.

I'm experiencing almost the same thing every other customer is experiencing I open it up and it says it's setting things up. I have a notification but when I open the notifications up there's nothing there. Been on the phone with customer service multiple times.
