title: 1Password - Password Manager and Secure Wallet
description:
1Password: the password manager that's as beautiful and simple as it is secure. Simply add your passwords, and let 1Password do the rest. Try 1Password free for 14 days, then keep going with a 1Password.com subscription.

Selected by Android Central as the Best Password Manager for Android: "For those who want the absolute best password manager for their phone, tablet, and computers, 1Password is the way to go."


PUT PASSWORDS IN THEIR PLACE

1Password remembers all your passwords for you, and keeps them safe and secure behind the one password that only you know.

‚óÜ  Create strong, unique passwords for all your online accounts
‚óÜ  Fill usernames and passwords into websites and apps
‚óÜ  Access your information on all your mobile devices and computers
‚óÜ  Share passwords securely with your family or company
‚óÜ  Unlock with a single tap using Fingerprint Unlock


GET ORGANIZED

1Password is for more than just passwords: it‚Äôs the ideal place for financial information, personal documentation, or anything you need to keep secure and accessible.

‚óÜ  Store information in more than a dozen categories: logins, credit cards, addresses, notes, bank accounts, driver licenses, passports, and more
‚óÜ  Create multiple vaults to keep different areas of your life separate
‚óÜ  Organize your information with favorites
‚óÜ  Use search to find and filter your information


STAY SAFE

Everything you store in 1Password is protected by a Master Password that only you know. 1Password uses end-to-end encryption, so your data is only ever decrypted offline. The encryption keys never leave your device, and you are the only one who can see your passwords.

‚óÜ  Unlock the app quickly and securely with Fingerprint Unlock
‚óÜ  Lock the app automatically to ensure your data is protected, even if your device is lost or stolen


SHARE WITH TEAMS AND FAMILIES

1Password for Android has full support for team and family accounts. It‚Äôs never been so easy to share the simple security of 1Password with those you work and live with.

‚óÜ Add all your accounts ‚Äî family, team, individual ‚Äî and see all your information in one place
‚óÜ Easily migrate information between accounts
‚óÜ Share passwords and more with teammates and family members


TRY FREE

Get a 14-day free trial when you install 1Password, and subscribe at any time on 1Password.com.

Your subscription lets you use 1Password everywhere. Your data syncs securely and automatically between your devices, and can also be accessed on the web. Learn more at https://1password.com.


LOVED AND USED BY MILLIONS

1Password has been highlighted in The New York Times, GQ, The Wall Street Journal, Forbes, The Verge, Ars Technica, Mashable, and The Guardian.

‚óÜ Featured on NBC‚Äôs Today Show: Coolest must-have phone apps of 2017!
‚óÜ Named One of The World‚Äôs Greatest 100 Apps by Business Insider

We‚Äôre proud of this recognition, and we‚Äôre even happier that millions of people love and use 1Password every day.


WE LOVE TO HEAR FROM YOU

We love 1Password and strive to make it the best it can be. Connect with us at support+android@agilebits.com, @1Password on Twitter, and Facebook.com/1Password! We're also available for feedback or questions in our discussion forums at https://1pw.ca/AndroidForum .

comments: Dropping a star. My opinion remains - the UX is unfriendly and unintuitive. I'm sure this makes sense to a programmer but not a user. Also, I want the ability to generate a password BEFORE I commit to creating a login. Norton has this. The method you propose assumes I am creating a login in the app, but this is not how people create logins. For $70 per year, this needs a significant overhaul. At this point, I'm seeking a refund. I thought I could put up with the issues, but it's too much.

Not sure what happened here but .... It is not the same and this is before the new versions being released. Things like stating they have Linux client when it's not really a full client, just a snap or maybe python coded program to present their web vault like a client. Then other areas where instructions were literally copy and paste credentials .... Isn't that part of the reason for a. Password Manager? Sometimes is one thing but as a necessity in some scenarios? Use BitWarden, 1Pass done

I love this app. The Family Plan and sharing vaults has been instrumental in getting my elderly parents to FINALLY get a password manager. My only feedback is that the built-in browser is very unhelpful and often has trouble rendering important websites. I wish I could configure this app to open links in a browser app of my choice by tapping the url.

Have liked this app before... this version will not allow me to enable biometric unlock and keeps crashing before I can use it to fill in a username/password. Crashes over and over. Allows me to slide the button for bio unlock, but does not ask for a fingerprint confirmation and does not enable the feature. App is currently useless.

Love it BUT.... It doesnt work on my tablet in DEX mode Samsung S7+ 5g Ultra. Really silly, cos its the only way i use my tablet. I now need to open my phone find the password stored, then go back to tablet and enter it.... Which is really stupid when 1password sets a 20+ multi character password. please fix this

title: arcade
description:
Ready to enter the world of arcade?!

As a part of arcade, play arcade transforms your work achievements into points, badges and levels. Compete with your colleagues in a friendly manner to prove your skill-set, ultimately battling for the top of the leader-board where you are crowned as the reigning champion.

arcade not only transforms your work place into a fun exciting environment, but arcade also utilizes social elements, with the arcade newsfeed you can socialise and get recognized, comment, like and post your taunt! with arcade Messaging you can chat with any member of you team or company live or you can create a group and share the love!.

arcade is always evolving, Don't forget to say Hello to A.D.A.M, he will give you hints to help you become the reigning champ!

title: Google Docs
description:
Create, edit, and collaborate with others on documents from your Android phone or tablet with the Google Docs app. With Docs you can:

- Create new documents or edit existing files
- Share documents and collaborate in the same document at the same time.
- Work anywhere, anytime - even offline
- Add and respond to comments.
- Never worry about losing your work ‚Äì everything is saved automatically as you type.
- Search the web and your files in Drive, right from Docs
- Open, edit, and save Word documents and PDFs.

Google Docs is part of Google Workspace: where teams of any size can chat, create, and collaborate.

Google Workspace subscribers have access to additional Google Docs features, including:
- Working in a single document with teammates or people outside your company. See edits as others type, communicate through built-in chat, and leave feedback through comments and suggestions
- Importing your documents to make them instantly editable, including Microsoft¬Æ Word and PDF files. Export your work in .docx, .pdf, .odt, .rtf, .txt or .html format
- Unlimited version history. Track changes made to your documents and undo anything you choose.
- Working across devices, with or without Internet

Learn more about Google Workspace: https://workspace.google.com/products/docs/

Follow us for more:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/googleworkspace
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/googleworkspace
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/googleworkspace/

Permissions Notice
Contacts: This is used to give suggestions of people to add to files and share with.
Storage: This is used to save and open files on USB or SD storage.

recentChanges: * Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: I gave it five stars, because it has made things easier with my disability. However, voice to text seems to fail me often, which isn't exactly the apps issue. I have experienced multiple moments where the app freezes, and won't let me open until connecting to a Wi-Fi network. That is always a bit odd being as my mobile data is available. Not to mention, a bit annoying. There are no ads, but I have it set up this way through my settings.

It's kind of like Google drive was a while ago. It's a great app but it's buggy. As soon as you've got a bit too many files they start to have problems with snycing. As I scroll down they load and glitch out. Sometimes the files don't even show and I have to look for them in the search bar. Now it's worse than it's ever been, files that should be "available online" simply don't open. This didn't use to happen..

A pretty good word processor for mobile. I enjoy using it for writing, and local saving of documents is helpful. However, it can be a little janky with loading large files, and the italics button (which I use quite often for my creative writing) on Android is now squirreled away in a hard-to-find, unhelpful location, and was replaced with the checklist button. If not for that small gripe, I'd give five stars.

I really wish you would put the italics button back in the hotbar, or at least give us the option to put it there. I used it a lot, and suddenly it has vanished. Please don't direct me to the forums, as I've been trying to get a fix for this there for almost two months with zero helpful answer.

Exceptionally great app for creative minds, writers, communicators, songwriters, business minded fellows etc. It is very efficient for every day use and comes in handy when need be. The text formatting features are incredibly beautiful and second to none. It gives maximum amount of satisfaction in the neatness and appearance of documents like their desktop or laptop counterparts. I love this app super duper. I give you a million stars üåü üåü üåü

title: StayFree Web - Website Blocker & Stay Focused
description:
StayFree Web - Website Blocker is a website blocking app that blocks distracting websites defined by you! 

It provides the simplest way to remove all distracting and harmful websites from your life by blocking them while you need to stay focused and productive. üí™üèª

Want to know how long you are spending on any website? We‚Äôve got you covered for that too! Just open up our app and you will see a breakdown of all of the websites you have used and you will be able to set up blocks based on usage limits. Block as many distractions as you‚Äôd like, whenever you‚Äôd like, for as long as you'd like!

‚ùóÔ∏èIt will only work if your browser is if Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, or Samsung Internet (more browsers will be supported soon!!)

üì¢ THIS APP USES ACCESSIBILITY SERVICES

The Accessibility Services are used for detecting which website you are on and, in turn, blocking the websites you have requested to block. The Accessibility Services are also used for analyzing sponsored content that appears on social media apps as part of an opt-in service. All information is maintained in accordance with our Privacy Policy and Sensor Tower is using the respective permissions with active consent by the end-user.

Accessibility Services Declared:

Retrieve window content -- allows us to read which website you are actively viewing.

We love to get feedback from our users.üòå

This app is maintained by Sensor Tower.

title: Axiad ID
description:
We are excited to announce the release of Axiad ID 2.0 application. Axiad ID is a mobile app for authentication and secure interaction. Axiad ID provides multi-factor authentication for accessing corporate applications and systems. With simple onboarding, management, and usage, there is no need to choose between productivity and security.

New features in this release include:
- Improved automatic setup via QR code scanning and new manual entry option from Axiad Cloud Unified Portal
- Supports OATH tokens (HOTP, TOTP)
- Support for adding multiple accounts with push notification and OTP
- Support for third party accounts, such as for Google, Dropbox, or Facebook
- Secure verification using passcode or biometric depending on user‚Äôs device setting

Axiad ID 2.0 also features a complete rebranding, with a new name, icon, and logo, along with a more streamlined user experience.

Visit https://www.axiad.com/axiad-id for more information.
descriptionHTML:
We are excited to announce the release of Axiad ID 2.0 application. Axiad ID is a mobile app for authentication and secure interaction. Axiad ID provides multi-factor authentication for accessing corporate applications and systems. With simple onboarding, management, and usage, there is no need to choose between productivity and security.

New features in this release include:
- Improved automatic setup via QR code scanning and new manual entry option from Axiad Cloud Unified Portal
- Supports OATH tokens (HOTP, TOTP)
- Support for adding multiple accounts with push notification and OTP
- Support for third party accounts, such as for Google, Dropbox, or Facebook
- Secure verification using passcode or biometric depending on user‚Äôs device setting

Axiad ID 2.0 also features a complete rebranding, with a new name, icon, and logo, along with a more streamlined user experience.

Visit https://www.axiad.com/axiad-id for more information.
summary: Axiad ID provides secure two-factor authentication mechanism.
recentChanges: - Improvement for adding 3rd party OATH credentials.
comments: If you log in to quickly it doesn't work. It's not any more secure the a password as a pin can get you past the traditional mfa. Only use it because I have to

This app has an irritating bug where it shows the "Do you want to authenticate?" notification, but when I click on it, I am just taken to a blank screen like there is nothing to approve. I have to close and open the app to fix it over and over, which ends up being a huge waste of time. If this can be fixed I would have no issues.

PRO: This Multi Factor Authentication (MFA) app was easy to set up and register my device. The login is convenient because it sends a notification to your phone that you must confirm. CON: This app keeps deleting the account I created, and fails to log me in. I have to call IT support almost daily to have my account recreated just to gain access to my career apps and info. This problem NEEDS to be a high priority and fixed. PERSONAL OPINION: Have your company use a different MFA app.

Regularly, I will get a notification "do you want to authenticate", click on it, unlock the app, and the app has forgotten about the authentication event. I have to force-quit the app and re-launch it to get the app to remember that it was in the middle of an authentication event.

This is junk. It was simple enough to get setup, but I dont get my pin in any reasonable amount of time. First try took 10 minutes. Need it again today and we are going on about an hour with no notification. Edit: boy, it was almost good. After awhile, it started to work consistently and it was great. Then it got updated. Now, it works maybe 50% of the time. I will get a push notification for approval, but when I unlock axiad, there is no approval waiting, just the numbers I can enter manually.

title: Your Phone Companion - Link to Windows
description:
You love your phone. So does your PC. Get instant access to everything you love on your phone, right from your PC. To get started, Install the Your Phone Companion - Link to Windows app on your Android phone and link it with the Your Phone app on your Windows 10 PC.

Link your Android phone and PC to view and reply to text messages,  make and receive calls*, and more - all right on your PC. 

Stay on top of your life as you receive and manage real-time mobile notifications on your PC. 

Make emailing yourself photos a thing of the past as you share your favorite images between your phone and PC. Copy, edit, and even drag and drop photos without ever touching your phone. 

For select** Samsung phones you can also wirelessly drag and drop files from your phone to your PC (and vice versa) and even access your favorite mobile apps on your PC.


Your Phone features:
‚Ä¢ Make and receive calls from your PC*
‚Ä¢ Manage your Android phone's notifications on your PC 
‚Ä¢ Access your favorite mobile apps** on your PC
‚Ä¢ Read and reply to text messages from your PC
‚Ä¢ Drag files between your PC and phone**
‚Ä¢ Copy and paste content between your PC and phone**
‚Ä¢ Instantly access the photos on your phone from your PC
‚Ä¢ Use your PC‚Äôs bigger screen, keyboard, mouse, and touch screen to interact with your phone from your PC.

 Integrated with Surface Duo and select Samsung mobile devices for an even better experience  
‚Ä¢ Surface Duo and select Samsung models have Link to Windows integrated and no additional apps required to be downloaded from the Play Store. See list of supported devices: aka.ms/ypltwdevices
‚Ä¢ Find Link to Windows in the Quick Access tray (drag down from the top of your screen to access it).
‚Ä¢ This integration enables unique features like cross-device copy and paste, Phone screen, file drag-and-drop, and Apps (for a breakdown, see aka.ms/ypltwdevices).


*Calls requires a Windows 10 PC running the May 2019 update or later with Bluetooth capability. 

**Drag and drop, Phone screen and Apps access all require a compatible device (aka.ms/ypltwdevices) and a Windows 10 PC running the May 2019 update or later. The multiple apps experience requires a Windows 10 PC that‚Äôs running the May 2020 Update or later and has at least 8GB of RAM.

By installing this app, you agree to the Microsoft Terms of Use https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=246338 and Privacy Statement https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248686

Tell us what features you'd like to see next by selecting "Send feedback" in settings in the Your Phone app or the Your Phone Companion app.

‚Ä¢ Access your favorite mobile apps** on your PC
‚Ä¢ Read and reply to text messages from your PC
‚Ä¢ Drag files between your PC and phone**
‚Ä¢ Copy and paste content between your PC and phone**
‚Ä¢ Instantly access the photos on your phone from your PC
‚Ä¢ Use your PC‚Äôs bigger screen, keyboard, mouse, and touch screen to interact with your phone from your PC.

Integrated with Surface Duo and select Samsung mobile devices for an even better experience
‚Ä¢ Surface Duo and select Samsung models have Link to Windows integrated and no additional apps required to be downloaded from the Play Store. See list of supported devices: aka.ms/ypltwdevices
‚Ä¢ Find Link to Windows in the Quick Access tray (drag down from the top of your screen to access it).
‚Ä¢ This integration enables unique features like cross-device copy and paste, Phone screen, file drag-and-drop, and Apps (for a breakdown, see aka.ms/ypltwdevices).


*Calls requires a Windows 10 PC running the May 2019 update or later with Bluetooth capability.

**Drag and drop, Phone screen and Apps access all require a compatible device (aka.ms/ypltwdevices) and a Windows 10 PC running the May 2019 update or later. The multiple apps experience requires a Windows 10 PC that‚Äôs running the May 2020 Update or later and has at least 8GB of RAM.

By installing this app, you agree to the Microsoft Terms of Use https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=246338 and Privacy Statement https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248686

summary: Access your phone‚Äôs notifications, calls, apps, photos & texts on your PC.
comments: Makes calls and texts, but there is a problem which is that there is no way to interact with in-call prompts (e.g. "Press 1 for English"), which is a huge issue when so many companies use these prompts for their answering service. Also makes it impossible to check my voicemail through the app. Please add this functionality.

!PLEASE fix! Big issue is that the app keeps trying to reconnect whenever my laptop is on (Your Phone App still not launched) BUT the link to windows is TURNED OFF from my phone which drains a lot of battery for no reason and it is very frequent. Clicking on disconnect in the ongoing notification on the phone doesn't help either Love to use this app for connectivity with my pc don't know why screen mirroring lags even though you're sitting right next to the router.

As soon as I installed this, my pc backup and sync started re loading photos i have too many copies of as is. Plus, why not enable pc info to go ontp phone, such as music. Anything that just makes a user happy...it's not happening. It's like selling your soul to the devil. Electronics are sucking up my time and making it hell.

When it works, it's good enough. However, it doesn't work more often tha not. A lot of people have complained about the connection and syncing here and I have the same problem. I have signed into the same microsoft account, connected to the same wifi, made sure low power mode is off, and deleted and reinstalled the app. Stop suggesting the same things to every response and just fix the problem. It is a well designed app that has a lot of features that would up my productivity immensely, please!

Great functionality - but it takes A LOT OF TIME to get it to work correctly. I want to primarily use the screen mirroring function such that I can write with my computer keyboard (running Windows 10) instead of typing with my fingers on the phone screen (Samsung Galaxy S10e). Sounds simple enough... but no. First, my keyboard layout changes to US English despite any settings I change on the computer or the phone, i.e. the common characters √•√§√∂ of my language are not accessible which makes any typing unusable. I searched like hell on different forums and finally I got it to work by enabling accessibility services for the app. Common - this needs to work by default. Second, the other text handling option that I need is copying a text on my computer (from any application) and then pasting it into the window with the phone screen mirroring. BUT IT DOESN'T WORK. HELP! Somehow the clipboard of the screen mirroring window is not shared with the clipboard of all other PC applications. I've tried changing settings on the phone, in the My Phone app, and on the PC. Nothing has worked. Any suggestions?

title: Alarm clock
description:
Simple alarm clock easy to use
Features of the application
- Update weather and temperature right on the stopwatch screen and alarm clock screen
- There are 5 interfaces and 30 colors screen
- The default alarm clock has 3 sleep modes: 5 minutes, 10 minutes, 15 minutes.
- Solve math to cancel an alarm
- Play a game to cancel the alarm
- Gentle and powerful sound
- Play random music according to the playlist you choose
- There is fast alarm mode

title: Microsoft Word: Write, Edit & Share Docs on the Go
description:
Microsoft Word is the document editor that you can take with you on the go.

Writing and collaborating with your team doesn't have to be confined to the office.  Edit docs and collaborate on shared projects in real time on your mobile device with the help of Microsoft Word. Documents have never been easier to create, read, edit, and share. DOCX files, PDFs and everything else ‚Äî regardless of the format, Microsoft Word has you covered.

Access files and make edits with ease while using the Word app. Read documents and open attachments with the built-in docs viewer or edit a PDF with the help of Word‚Äôs file conversion. Once you‚Äôre done editing, share the file in the format you‚Äôd like. Create documents and more on the go and allow Microsoft to polish them off for you with expert editing tools.  

Resume templates, newsletters, brochures and more are all accessible within the template gallery, simply select the documents you would like and get started.  

Never miss out on an opportunity, all the writing tools you may need are now on-hand. Write letters or draft your resume today with the help of an intelligent word processor.

The writing app is as handy as you want it to be. Blogger, writer, journalist, columnist, student, or project manager: Your office moves with you with Microsoft Word.

Write a letter, create templates, read Word documents, edit docs and collaborate with your team anywhere with Microsoft Word.

Create Documents
‚Ä¢ Create docs, assignments, letters, blogs, scripts, notes, resumes and more with beautifully designed modern templates.
‚Ä¢ Editing with rich formatting and layout.
‚Ä¢ Document editor keeps formats and layouts looking great.
‚Ä¢ Docs app with templates for resumes, forms and more.

Read, Write, and Edit
‚Ä¢ Read docs, letters, PDFs, scripts, and more on your device with Reading View.
‚Ä¢ Edit documents from PDFs by converting to and from Word documents.
‚Ä¢ PDF file conversion: save as PDF after editing and share your PDF file easily.

Collaborate and Share With Anyone, Anywhere
‚Ä¢ Collaborate by commenting in your document right next to the text.
‚Ä¢ View any document with the help of built-in docs viewer.
‚Ä¢ Read & edit documents as a team and stay on top of changes to the text, layout, and formatting.
‚Ä¢ Editor version history lets you revert to view earlier drafts to edit docs.
 
Sharing is simplified
‚Ä¢ Share files and collaborate with a few taps.
‚Ä¢ File & document permission management that lets you see who is working on them.
‚Ä¢ Copy files directly into the body of an email message with its format intact or attach your PDFs and docs to an email.

Download Microsoft Word now and edit documents anywhere.

REQUIREMENTS
‚Ä¢  1 GB RAM or above

To create or edit documents, sign in with a free Microsoft account on devices with a screen size smaller than 10.1 inches.

Unlock the full Microsoft experience with a qualifying Microsoft 365 subscription for your phone, tablet, PC, and Mac.

Microsoft 365 subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your Play Store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. You can manage your subscriptions in your Play Store account settings. A subscription cannot be cancelled during the active subscription period.

This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft's EULA for Terms of Service for Microsoft 365 on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: http://aka.ms/eula

recentChanges:
ÔªøThank you for using Word.

We regularly release updates to the app, which include great new features, as well as improvements for speed and reliability.

Did you know that with a Microsoft 365 subscription, you can unlock the full power of Office across all of your devices? Find special offers in the app.
comments: It is free which I appreciate and many professional features. But I do use it for more than reading documents, I also edit them while out and about. And not some little dinky letter. The scrollbars are a pain; I will start carefully moving up up/down and ZOOM! off she goes to where nobody knows. What is very unhelpful is how I try to insert a parenthesis and BLIP! the word I want to encapsulate is gone. Just got through an episode of trying to put "a" in a sentence - having it change to "w".

Needs more updates!! It's great for touching minor things on a current document. I would not recommend using this to make a new document for what ever that may be from start to finish. It doesn't have ALL the features or tools that you'd normally see on an actual computer. However, I think it is possible for them to incorporate more tools than it has now or at least close to it!

Not bad at all, but still stuck in 'paper world' from the previous century. Everything is pages and margins for docs that may never be printed. This app really needs a continues page option. Something similar to the 'Web Layout' you have in the desktop app. The mobile view does not support drawing. Aside from that, it is really a good app.

Nice App. But after the update in July, the available font options reduced. One can no longer select the type of font options to use. It had all the fonts available for selection, but after thr update, we have about only 10 fonts for usage. This is supposee to be an alternative to the PC version, making us able to do all we can do with our phone version too. Please kindly look into this issue. Thanks

Honestly, this app is everything I could have ever wanted. It allows me to work on the docs I created on my laptop on my phone. As a writer that often gets her best ideas while laying in bed, it's incredibly useful. The only reason it doesn't get five stars from me is because there are some bugs that could use fixing.

title: ClevCalc - Calculator
description:
This calculator allows you to easily handle all the calculations necessary for everyday life with a single application. A free calculator app with a clean interface and practical functions!


1. Calculator ( + Scientific Calculator )
‚Ä¢ Supports the four fundamental arithmetic operations, square, root, parentheses and percentage operations.
‚Ä¢ Supports scientific operations such as trigonometric, exponential and logarithmic functions.
‚Ä¢ Possible to modify incorrectly entered expressions with a freely movable cursor.
‚Ä¢ Simple and easy.
‚Ä¢ History available.

2. Unit Converter
‚Ä¢ Supports length, weight, width, volume, time, temperature, pressure, speed, fuel efficiency, and the amount of data.
‚Ä¢ Supports all unit conversions commonly used in everyday life.

3. Currency Converter
‚Ä¢ Supports 135 currencies in the world, including dollar, euro, yen, yuan, etc.
‚Ä¢ Automatically calculates using the real time exchange rate.

4. Percentage Calculator
‚Ä¢ You can easily calculate the percentage increase or decrease.
‚Ä¢ You can also calculate what percentage one number is of another.

5. Discount Calculator
‚Ä¢ Get a discount price by entering the original price and the discount rate.

6. Loan Calculator
‚Ä¢ You can calculate the total interest and total payments by entering the loan principal and interest rate.

7. Date Calculator
‚Ä¢ A feature that calculates the specific date or anniversary to be remembered!

8. Health Calculator
‚Ä¢ You can measure the body mass index (BMI) and the basal metabolic rate (BMR).

9. Automobile Fuel Cost Calculator
‚Ä¢ You can calculate the fuel costs required for driving a car or traveling.
‚Ä¢ Enter a distance and a fuel efficiency to get a fuel cost.

10. Fuel Efficiency Calculator
‚Ä¢ Enter the amount of fuel used to get the fuel efficiency.

11. GPA Calculator
‚Ä¢ You can correctly calculate your GPA!

12. Tip Calculator
‚Ä¢ The tip amount to be added will be automatically calculated if you enter the billing amount and tip percentage.
‚Ä¢ There is a function not to calculate tips on tax.
‚Ä¢ You may calculate the amount per person by dividing final amount by the number of people.

13. Sales Tax Calculator
‚Ä¢ Get a total price by entering the original price and the tax rate.

14. Unit Price Calculator
‚Ä¢ Enter the price and the quantity and you will get the unit price.
‚Ä¢ You can compare unit prices of various goods.

15. World Time Converter
‚Ä¢ Transforms the time of 400 or more cities around the world.
‚Ä¢ Daylight savings time will also be reflected in this calculation.

16. Ovulation Calculator
‚Ä¢ Calculates the time of ovulation and fertility using the menstrual cycle!
‚Ä¢ You can also create notes by date.

17. Hexadecimal Converter
‚Ä¢ Converts between decimal and hexadecimal with ease and convenience.

18. Savings Calculator
‚Ä¢ If you enter deposit amount, interest rate and time period, the interest after tax and final savings balance will be calculated.


[ Disclaimer ]
Cleveni Inc. makes no warranty as to the accuracy or reliability or suitability of any calculation results or information provided through the ClevCalc app. Cleveni Inc. is not also responsible for any damages, direct or indirect, which may occur by the calculation results or information provided through the ClevCalc app.

‚Ä¢ Simple and easy.
‚Ä¢ History available.

2. Unit Converter
‚Ä¢ Supports length, weight, width, volume, time, temperature, pressure, speed, fuel efficiency, and the amount of data.
‚Ä¢ Supports all unit conversions commonly used in everyday life.

3. Currency Converter
‚Ä¢ Supports 135 currencies in the world, including dollar, euro, yen, yuan, etc.
‚Ä¢ Automatically calculates using the real time exchange rate.

4. Percentage Calculator
‚Ä¢ You can easily calculate the percentage increase or decrease.
‚Ä¢ You can also calculate what percentage one number is of another.

5. Discount Calculator
‚Ä¢ Get a discount price by entering the original price and the discount rate.

6. Loan Calculator
‚Ä¢ You can calculate the total interest and total payments by entering the loan principal and interest rate.

7. Date Calculator
‚Ä¢ A feature that calculates the specific date or anniversary to be remembered!

8. Health Calculator
‚Ä¢ You can measure the body mass index (BMI) and the basal metabolic rate (BMR).

9. Automobile Fuel Cost Calculator
‚Ä¢ You can calculate the fuel costs required for driving a car or traveling.
‚Ä¢ Enter a distance and a fuel efficiency to get a fuel cost.

10. Fuel Efficiency Calculator
‚Ä¢ Enter the amount of fuel used to get the fuel efficiency.

11. GPA Calculator
‚Ä¢ You can correctly calculate your GPA!

12. Tip Calculator
‚Ä¢ The tip amount to be added will be automatically calculated if you enter the billing amount and tip percentage.
‚Ä¢ There is a function not to calculate tips on tax.
‚Ä¢ You may calculate the amount per person by dividing final amount by the number of people.

13. Sales Tax Calculator
‚Ä¢ Get a total price by entering the original price and the tax rate.

14. Unit Price Calculator
‚Ä¢ Enter the price and the quantity and you will get the unit price.
‚Ä¢ You can compare unit prices of various goods.

15. World Time Converter
‚Ä¢ Transforms the time of 400 or more cities around the world.
‚Ä¢ Daylight savings time will also be reflected in this calculation.

16. Ovulation Calculator
‚Ä¢ Calculates the time of ovulation and fertility using the menstrual cycle!
‚Ä¢ You can also create notes by date.

17. Hexadecimal Converter
‚Ä¢ Converts between decimal and hexadecimal with ease and convenience.

18. Savings Calculator
‚Ä¢ If you enter deposit amount, interest rate and time period, the interest after tax and final savings balance will be calculated.


[ Disclaimer ]
Cleveni Inc. makes no warranty as to the accuracy or reliability or suitability of any calculation results or information provided through the ClevCalc app. Cleveni Inc. is not also responsible for any damages, direct or indirect, which may occur by the calculation results or information provided through the ClevCalc app.

comments: I liked the app on the beginning, however, the number grid and math functions (+,√ó,√∑,=,-,) have since disappeared and has been replace with a top grid of numbers and a side grid of letters (A,B,C,D,E,F) I cannot for the life of me figure out how to get back to original number/function page. I installed this App today, and I should say it's ok! The layout/design, beautiful themes and many calculators combined in one make it stand out! But the loan calculator seems a bit confusing to me. The 20% of 50,000 should be 10,000, but the calculator said it's 11,074.79. For example, equal total payment for 50,000 @ 20% for 24 weeks should be 60,000 divided by 24 = 2,500 per week, but the calculator said it's 2,544.79. Please is there something I'm missing?

I had a "unit converterr", a "currency calculator", a "loan calculator" and a normal calculator. This app proves that they can all be combined in an intuitive interface, plus some more obscure "calculations". Definitely 5 stars. If anything, the possibility to choose where the exchange rates are updated could be introduced... and a few (very few) details I will inform the developer after some more use. Thank you!

title: Great Taste of the Midwest
description:
2021UPDATE COMING SOON!

UPDATED FOR 2019! 

The Official App for the Great Taste of the Midwest, one of the premier beer festivals in the United States. On the second Saturday in August, over one hundred brewpubs and microbreweries from the Midwest come to beautiful Olin-Turville Park overlooking lake Monona in Madison, Wisconsin, to share beer and good times with six thousand patrons.

Use this handy app to find and rate your favorite beers!

Sort and filter by brewery, beer name, beer style, special tapping times, real ales, and more.

Keep track of the beers you want to try with the handy to-do list. Show beer locations on the embedded map of the grounds.

Take notes and share your ratings and notes.

Continuously updated for the most complete and accurate information on Fest day.
descriptionHTML:
2021UPDATE COMING SOON!

UPDATED FOR 2019!

The Official App for the Great Taste of the Midwest, one of the premier beer festivals in the United States. On the second Saturday in August, over one hundred brewpubs and microbreweries from the Midwest come to beautiful Olin-Turville Park overlooking lake Monona in Madison, Wisconsin, to share beer and good times with six thousand patrons.

Use this handy app to find and rate your favorite beers!

Sort and filter by brewery, beer name, beer style, special tapping times, real ales, and more.

Keep track of the beers you want to try with the handy to-do list. Show beer locations on the embedded map of the grounds.

Take notes and share your ratings and notes.

Continuously updated for the most complete and accurate information on Fest day.
summary: The Official App for the Great Taste of the Midwest Beer Festival.
comments: The day the app gets updated is the best day of the week. Love this app, great way to get excited for Great Taste and pretend to formulate a game plan. (We know it gets tossed after the first hour...) One suggestion: Collapsible lists, especially in the Beer tab. Once I've scrolled through and marked all my IPAs, it would be nice not to have to scroll through them when I open the app later to look at stouts.
Less than a week before the event and it still crashes on launch.

This app could be so much better. Navigation is clunky. If you search & hit 'back' to hide the keyboard, you lose the search. Fast scroll on Beers/Breweries doesn't have feedback. Usually you show what letter the user is on. It'd be cool if you could copy the beer description TextView so could share to your buddy a beer that sounds good. Untappd integration would really set this app over the top. If beers had a check-in button could go back & forth from GTMW/UT & sort by UT beer ratings
App works as it should now
There is a glitch. The app is not working. Downloads then can't open.

title: ID123: Student ID, Employee ID, Member ID Cards
description:
ID123 is a mobile ID card application for schools, businesses and membership organizations. Administrators can use the cloud-based ID management system to securely issue and manage digital ID cards into this mobile app. 

** A VALID WEBSITE IS REQUIRED TO ADD A BUSINESS. **

In addition to student ID cards, school administrators can issue digital school ID cards to parents and teachers. They can also improve campus safety by creating temporary IDs for school meetings and events.

Business administrators can issue digital employee photo ID cards, as well as temporary ID cards to their interns, guests, contractors, and temporary workers through the cloud-based ID management system.

Membership administrators can issue mobile ID cards to their members with preset expiration dates. If desired, they can also enable their members to share their digital photo ID cards to their family members‚Äô mobile devices.

Join the schools, businesses, and memberships that are already benefiting from issuing digital credentials to this mobile ID app!

title: Microsoft PowerPoint: Slideshows and Presentations
description:
Microsoft PowerPoint presents you with a presentation and slides app that you can carry with you wherever you go.

The PowerPoint app gives you access to the familiar tool you know and love. Create, edit, view, present or share presentations quickly and easily from anywhere.

Access your most recently used PowerPoint files quickly while on the go. PowerPoint provides a quick view of your recent files for easy access on any device. Syncing is seamless across devices, so you no longer have to worry about multiple file versions when you work on PowerPoint mobile.

Work with anyone and present to anyone, anywhere, with confidence. With the Microsoft PowerPoint app, your office moves with you.

Give presentations with training from Presenter Coach, a new AI tool designed to help with public speaking. Practice presentations on your own, in private with the Presenter Coach. Presenter Coach helps you practice your presentations with real-time suggestions to help you adjust your pacing, avoid ‚Äúumms‚Äù and speak confidently.

PowerPoint lets you make a lasting impression with powerful and customizable presentations that make you stand out. Create and present with confidence, from anywhere. Making an impactful presentation has never been easier. PowerPoint gives you the ability to edit your ppt or pptx files and customize it on the go, collaborating with others in real time.

Present with confidence
Never miss a beat with PowerPoint on the go. This presentation maker gives you the option to create presentations from scratch or continue working on any that are preexisting. Thanks to OneDrive, you can start a presentation on your PC, then edit and present using PowerPoint mobile. Present your point clearly and with confidence using presentation view on any device, all without firing up your laptop. Practice presentations with the Presenter Coach to master public speaking.

Make a lasting impression
A beautifully crafted presentation is always a winner. Become a skilled presentation maker and take advantage of the slides app with access to powerful and highly customizable tools. Create presentations that will leave a lasting impression and help you stand out from the crowd.

Work with others easily

PowerPoint makes it easy for you to collaborate with others. With 1-click sharing, quickly invite others to edit, view, or provide feedback on your slides. Easily manage permissions and see who‚Äôs working in your presentation. Stay on top of changes and feedback from others with integrated comments within the slides. Compare changes to see how your presentation has evolved over time.

REQUIREMENTS
‚Ä¢ 1 GB RAM or above

To create or edit documents, sign in with a free Microsoft account on devices with a screen size of 10.1 inches or smaller.
Unlock the full Microsoft experience with a qualifying Microsoft 365 subscription for your phone, tablet, PC, and Mac.
 
Microsoft 365 subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your Play Store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. You can manage your subscriptions in your Play Store account settings. A subscription cannot be cancelled during the active subscription period.

This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft‚Äôs EULA for Terms of Service for Microsoft 365 on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: http://aka.ms/eula

title: Padlet
description:
What is Padlet?
Padlet is like paper for your screen. Start with an empty page and then put whatever you like on it. Upload a video, record an interview, snap a selfie, write your own text posts or upload some documents, and watch your padlet come to life. Once others add to it, the page will update in real time.

Used by teachers, students, professionals, and individuals of all ages, all around the world, the Padlet app is the easiest way to create and collaborate wherever you are. Padlet supports any file type you can imagine, from Spotify Playlists to Excel Spreadsheets. Upload a link and watch a detailed preview appear. Organize the content in any format you like - whether you prefer an grid of images or a chronological scroll.

The Padlet app makes it easy to collaborate in any setting. With views tailored for smaller devices and easy-to-use editor buttons, you can change how your padlet looks with a quick double tap. Add photos from your camera roll, or take a video and upload it instantly. Use our QR reader to access a shared padlet. Share across social platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, and LinkedIn. 

If you are using Padlet for school or work, you might want to consider our Backpack and Briefcase plans. Visit https://padlet.com/premium.

title: Sign Document: Edit PDF, Fill & Sign
description:
Sign Document: Edit PDF, Fill & Sign  is a document editor that allows you to edit, fill and sign, read PDF file. Choose the PDF to edit and modify your PDF in a thousand ways: draw, write on PDF, paint, PDF reader, bookmarks, notes, signatures and much more. This sign document app streamlines the paperwork process and enhances productivity with contracts, business documents, and more. With Sign Document: Edit PDF, Fill & Sign, you can open pdf forms, scan a paper form, autofill your pre-saved profiles, create a signature, sign pdf forms by finger, and send pdf forms to other apps. It‚Äôs that easy: no physical document, no printing or faxing needed.

üìö Sign Document: Edit PDF, Fill & Sign main features: 

‚òÖ PDF signature
- Draw, or import your signature just by one click. You can add and save your signature to edit and sign PDF. Leave your signature in your PDF writer. It's so easy to create your signature and creat initials with your finger right on your phone without printing or faxing.
- Signature rotation and signature scaling are also supported.

‚òÖ Edit File
- Opening a static form, you can enter text, symbol. Easily fill and sign forms by editing text directly on the document - no text entry pop-ups required! Resize text, add checkmarks and X's. 

‚òÖ PDF form filler
- Opening an interactive form, you can identify and fill out multiple form field components: Name, address, city, phone number, company...

‚òÖ PDF Reader - PDF Viewer:
- Quickly open and view PDF documents.
- A simple list of PDF files.
- Quickly find PDF file with the simple search option.
- Scroll, and zoom in and out PDF file.
- Bookmark PDF pages for future reference
- Scroll PDF Documents page by page
- Rename, bookmark, fill and sign PDF file

‚òÖ Other features include:
- Refreshing the list
- Pinch to Zoom
- Fast page navigation

title: HP Smart
description:
Print, scan, and share files by using HP Smart with your HP Printer. HP Smart makes it easy to get started and keeps you going with features like Print Anywhere or Mobile Fax!
 

¬∑ Start with a hassle-free set up, then print, scan, copy, and share files directly from your mobile device to your friends, co-workers, or a linked cloud account 
¬∑ Manage or print to your printer using any network connection
¬∑ Order supplies, get support, and manage your HP account straight from the app
¬∑ Create high-quality scans with your mobile device‚Äôs camera or import existing files, then preview, edit, and save them as PDFs and JPEGs or send them in your favorite cloud storage account
¬∑ Edit and enhance your photos by adding filters and text, cropping, and adjusting the saturation, contrast, or brightness 
¬∑ It‚Äôs easy to send secure faxes from the app with Mobile Fax
¬∑ Be more productive with Smart Tasks‚Äîcustomizable one-touch shortcuts
¬∑ Access hundreds of printable crafts, cards, and learning activities for free with Printables! Get involved and get your family creating together!
 
Some HP Smart features require a network connection and an HP account for full functionality. Certain features/software are available in English language only. For a full list of supported printers, visit: http://support.hp.com/us-en/document/c03722645?openCLC=true

comments: If I would had known this printer had to be connected to wifi to print anything normally I would not have gotten the printer. You get what you pay for. Someone trying to print photos, if you don't use the app the images will never fill your paper or be to the correct size, it always shortens the width and length by a half inch no matter what.

WARNING: Return your printer before it's too late. This app has SO many problems. In order for the printer to even connect to the app, I have to open and close the app 5-6 times while turning off and on the wifi button on the printer. I have to do this almost every time for it to work. HP Smart? More like HP Dumb. I have wasted so much paper and ink because it will not let me print double sided. The only way to do it is through "shortcuts", but it doesnt even work through shortcuts

Still frustrated that even after all these years they still fail to offer the option to select & "print selection" like you can on a laptop. It's so frustrating when you only want to print out a couple of paragraphs or a recipe, that you can't simply highlight what you need, choose print, then have the option to "print selection". Why does this seem to be so hard for the techno guys to do this??? Waste time, ink and paper when using now & often parts of what you need dont even show up in final

It was great until today when it made me install an update before I could use it. Now the app won't connect to the printer and says it's unavailable. Grrr, I've got important stuff to scan and it won't connect. The help just says to check printer connection etc. The printer is all good, as is my phone, it's the stupid damn updated app that is the problem.

This app and service was great when I started using it, but several month ago everything went down hill. The app doesn't work properly any more. My printer is finicky and it takes half an hour to get my devices to connect to the printer and even longer to get it to print the full document. This is absurd.

title: Pocket Points: Student Rewards
description:
Are you in college, broke, and addicted to your phone? Pocket Points incentivises you to put your phone away and stay focused with coupons at local merchants and big online brands. Get your school work done, pay attention in class, and be rewarded for it. 

Earn points! Use our timer to track how long you‚Äôre not using your phone. For every minute you‚Äôre not using your phone, you‚Äôll earn points. Get the most points you can and spend them on awesome student discounts. We‚Äôll help you put your focus on your studies so you can be more productive and feel more accomplished. 

Now take those points and shop on our marketplace of gifts and treat yourself to student coupons and discounts for food, apparel, accessories, and much more. Students get updates on new coupons. Never miss a good deal, because every penny counts. Students spend more money on food than anything else, so check out our food deals or suggest deals you want to see in your college town.

The leaderboards and achievements for students who stay focused the most create a competitive atmosphere in class. Are you staying focused more? Find out how you rank against other students at your school and students across the nation. Save money, stay focused with Pocket Points.

Features
> Timer: Stay focused and earn points
> Marketplace: Spend points on student coupons and rewards
> Leaderboard: See where you stack up on the leaderboard
> Achievements: Get achievements for hitting goals

Tweet us @PocketPoints or email us at team@pocketpoints.com for suggestions or support.

comments: Update 5/20/21 -- Out of date deals. Not worth having. App is broken. Can't send feedback. Looked like a fool at the restaurant. ---- This app used to be great when it first came out! Now it is frustrating with less places accepting it and the app won't even open when I try to launch it after this latest update. :(

Does not work on Android. Iphone only. Opens but does not show nearby deals. Can't send feedback. Can't change to a new phone with same # and keep your account. This has been consistent on all android devices. Dont even offer it to android if it won't work!

App won't let me find local stores. My friend has an old version that lets him search stores, find local stores, and all of that. I can't find anything near me and even stores that he has won't show up in search. Terrible app. Every update makes it worse and breaks something

I wish there was the ability to get points for those of us attending online classes. This app really helps me stay off my phone, but now that I am pursuing a degree from home, i feel it isn't as incentivising. Please add "off-campus" compatibility that works the same as on campus does!!!

title: MeetKai VA
description:
Welcome to a preview of our search & AI technology, the first version of MeetKai VA. This app will demonstrate our conversational AI capabilities while you explore Streaming, Restaurants, and Recipes.

¬øWho‚Äôs Kai? 

Kai is an artificial intelligence virtual assistant developed in Los Angeles, CA: the first to offer personalized results, understand negation, and more complex questions as you use your voice and natural tone. Instead of asking "find Chinese restaurants" machine-style, tap on Kai and say "recommend a nearby Chinese restaurant". 

Want to try something more advanced? Kai can also remember the context of your questions to filter or add more information to your original request. Follow-up questions are where MeetKai shines. 

Talking about restaurants, give this a shot: "How about Italian instead?"

Ask MeetKai to:

Search and stream movies or TV shows
"Find me an Emma Watson movie that isn‚Äôt Harry Potter"
"I want to watch a movie with Will Smith"
"What‚Äôs a good action movie?"
"Recommend me a TV series"  

Discover new recipes
"Find me a recipe with fish"
‚ÄúHow about something more sophisticated‚Äù
"I want to cook a 30-minute Italian meal for dinner."
"What‚Äôs a good wine to go with that?"

Find new restaurants
"Show me a good restaurant nearby."
"How about a restaurant with good pizza."
"Where can I get tacos in Marina Del Rey?"
"I want to order sushi."

The more you speak to your voice assistant, the more personalized your results will be as Kai adapts to your vocabulary and preferences. Other domains such as News, Books, and general chit-chat are coming soon! Please focus on the 3 domains above for the best MeetKai experience.

Have fun! and enjoy MeetKai.

title: Alarm Clock for Me free
description:
Alarm Clock for Me turns your Android device into an alarm clock that plays your favorite tunes, a bedside clock with gorgeous themes, and a reliable daily helper perfect for every timing situation.

Main features:

‚Ä¢  Alarm clock: wake up to your favorite music and decorate your home screen with beautiful alarm clock widgets
‚Ä¢  Sleep Timer: fall asleep to your favorite songs or sounds from our collection;
‚Ä¢  Current temperature: check it in the morning to pick out a perfect outfit for your day;
‚Ä¢ Unlimited support: set as many alarms you need ‚Äî  and you‚Äôll never oversleep or miss an important event; 
‚Ä¢  Nightstand mode: see what the time is at night while your Android is charging;
‚Ä¢  Background support: alarm will go off even if the app is not running;
‚Ä¢ Two new ways to turn off an alarm: math alarm clock to kick-start your brain or shake alarm option to wake up your body;
‚Ä¢  Vibrate / Fade in / Snooze options for making your awakening more gentle.

Other features enhancing the overall experience:

‚Ä¢ Use the customizable clock widgets on your Home screen.
‚Ä¢ Adjust the screen brightness so that it doesn‚Äôt blind you after a good night‚Äôs sleep.
‚Ä¢ Take advantage of Perfect Bedtime Reminder to go to sleep at the right time in the evening.
‚Ä¢ Enable Gentle PreAlarm to enjoy easy and gentle awakening in the morning.
‚Ä¢ Use the shortcut on the main screen to go directly to the app‚Äôs settings and all active alarms.
‚Ä¢ You can also choose between vertical and horizontal modes, or prevent the main screen from auto-rotation by fixing the position of the clock on your screen.

Enjoy a perfect balance of beauty and functionality with this beautiful and reliable alarm clock app!

comments: I like this alarm but it has flaws that I've put up with but I'm tired of it. You can't control the dimmer. So im here with the lights on trying to set the alarm and I can't read ANYTHING! I would have to turn off my light to see anything. You should be able to adjust this. Also setting the date. If i had a alarm for December and now it's February it still has it on December. So I have to set up a new alarm ugh just talking about it is annoying. Im downloading a different appt.

I use to love this app. But the noisy ads are way too much. It scares my partner every time I go to set an alarm at night. And it annoyingly wakes him up in the morning when I go to use the app. I'm going to just attempt to use my phones built in alarm system. I'm really sad because this was my favorite app to use for my ADHD. I'm fine with ads but they need to be silent for this kind of app.

This WAS a great app, but now I am on the verge of Uninstaller it. Loud ads KILL this app!!!! It is so annoying to have the alarm go off and then have to wait 5 or 10 seconds through an annoying ad before I can shut that off. It especially sucks if you have someone else in the bed with you who gets up later. Yeah, the wife gets pissed off because it wakes her up completely. "Sorry honey, just waot for the annoying ad with the jackhammer sound then go back to sleep." Yeah right. Silent ads are ok

Been using this app for a couple of years and it was cool, but yhe ads of the app got so annoying, somehow they keep running even when I close the app and it happens only with this app! Even when Im using other app, the ads are running with sound only. I'll have to uninstall it cuz it put me in awkward situations lately

Customer service was fast and good to work with. Still a great program. Thanks for all the help. Dean Love the program. I purchased it a while back and all was good until just recently. It now has ads. The problem is I have 3 Google accounts for different emails and it is looking at 1 that I didn't use to purchase it with. If I delete the account it shows paid. If I add it back it has ads. It didn't use to do this. Any help would be great.

title: MindTickle
description:
MindTickle mobile app is a lightweight version of MindTickle's web based readiness platform for sales and customer success teams. It is a must-have app for organizations who need to regularly update their team with new product features, success stories, sales pitches, sales collateral, marketing offers, sales initiatives, etc.

MindTickle enables sales enablement managers, sales manager and trainers to share  track-able files like videos, slides, documents, audio files, etc. packaged in the form of lightweight and mobile friendly 'Quick Updates'.

As a team member, you can easily view these Quick Updates on MindTickle mobile app.

*MindTickle learner account is required for this app.

Key features:

‚Ä¢	View all Quick Updates on mobile.
‚Ä¢	Get notified when a new Quick Update is published.
‚Ä¢	Login using Salesforce/ Google/ your organization's SSO or simply use your business email id.
‚Ä¢	Earn points for viewing content, and grow your knowledge score.
‚Ä¢	Save content files for offline viewing.
‚Ä¢	Securely view and store all content files.
‚Ä¢	Bookmark important content files.
‚Ä¢	Easily search Quick Updates and content files.

comments: Annoying AF alerts. MindTickle really needs to treat lightly with the aggressive, after-hours push notifications as they can, will, and do put businesses in hot water regarding non-exempt workers being pushed to work off the clock. The mere delivery of an off-hours alert suggesting that an employee complete business tasks is enough to draw a fine. This app fires them off with total disregard.

Crappy app. The service idea is decent but the implementation is mediocre at best. Downloads don't work well for offline viewing, syncing of progress across platforms stinks; really I wouldn't be using this except it's whether our company training videos are.
No speed control for video playback is very limiting, makes this app unusable. I use web version.
This was at the end of the training doesn't say how to sign in just keeps saying I'm entering the wrong learning site so waste of time
I can't sign it. It wants my learning site. I work for Metro by T-Mobile, and it won't accept what we use for learning as a valid learning url

title: Challenges Alarm Clock - Wake up Puzzles (Free)
description:
Challenges Alarm Clock is the best alarm clock for people how can't get out of bed with the simple idea, been as annoying and hard to ignore as he can. This app has been designed to be simple to set up but also powerful enough so you can have a smart alarm clock that can do amazing things like recognizing simple objects like toothbrush, shoes, animals, and smiles on a picture so you have to wake to laugh, even by force, or simply solving puzzles like math equations, memory, and sequence games to stop the alarm.

Features:
‚òÖ Challenges and Games (Math, Memory, Sequence, Retype, Picture, Smile, and Pose)
‚òÖ Disable/limit number of snoozes
‚òÖ Multiple media (Ringtone, Alarm songs, or music)
‚òÖ Dark theme for the app
‚òÖ Prevent user from turn off the phone or uninstall the alarm
‚òÖ Smooth increase volume
‚òÖ Extra loud volume


You can customize this alarm clock anyway you like:

Adding Challenges
This alarm clock comes with a lot of challenges (like a puzzle, games, taking pictures) that gives you tasks so you can't dismiss the alarm and go back sleep.

You can also add multiples challenges to your alarm. That way, when the alarm starts, random challenges will be assigned to the alarm and you never get bored.

Some of the tasks to the alarm are:

Picture Challenge
Using some AI stuff, the app can recognize a pre-select list of objects and can't turn off the alarm until you take pictures of pre-chosen objects or animals.

For example, always forget to drink water? Add a challenge to take a picture of a cup when it triggers so when it starts you have to stand up and drink water.

Smile Challenge
Simple like that, you have to wake up with a big smile, a huge one, and take a selfie. If you don't show all of your teeth to the camera, the alarm will never go out. Jokes book is recommended for this challenge

Memory Game
The classic memory game. Configure the board with the number of cards you want and, when the alarm starts, match the pairs on the board until you find out all the couples.

Math Challenge
If you think wake up early is annoying, imagine waking up early having to solve a math problem. Happily, that is the case üòÅ. Choose between levels of a math problem to solve when the alarm goes off and fry your brain out, trying to find out the correct number.

Retype Game
The app shows a list of characters at random and you have to write it in the exact order. Seems simple, but try to do that as soon as you wake up and see

Sequence Game
Complete this puzzle by tapping the shapes at the same order as it shines. Don't worry if you don't remember all at first, the alarm can repeat the sequence as many times you want.

Pose Challenge
Put the camera in a good place and do some pose, like yoga, to the camera.

Snooze
Disable snooze or limit it, so you have to complete the challenges, or change the snooze duration to a tiny one, so you don't have any time to rest.

Vibrate
Don't like your phone vibrating like crazy when waking up? Me neither, that's why you have the option to disable it from the alarm and just listen to the beautiful song.

Media
Choose between your favorite music, your phone ringtones, or no sound at all to wake up and configure the volume you want the media.

Soft wake
The media you choose will increase the volume gently until the sound you configured.

Dark mode
Change the theme of the app between light and dark mode any way you like.

Smooth increase volume
The volume of the alarm increases gradually until max, so you wake up gracefully

Extra loud volume
It will override the phone volume, increase it, and lock to its max.

Annoying mode
This option will not let you uninstall the app or turn off the phone. The only way to be free of the alarm is to complete the challenges

comments: The concept of this app is really amazing, I used to struggle for years to get out of bed at 7am. Now the alarm doesn't stop ringing until I solve some puzzles and take a picture of a mug in my kitchen to make me get up, this last one is a great feature that makes use of AI. The only annoying thing was the constant ads but I was happy to pay for encouraging the developers that made such a fantastic job !

This app is amazing! If you're the person that can't get up in the morning this app is for you. You can set time for the alarm, days of the week, the music for the alarm and the best part challenges for the alarm. You can add a challenge to take a picture of something, solve a math problem, shape sequence (simon says), memory, smile to selfie, retype words, and make a pose. But the only bad thing i have is the ads. They pop up every time you save.

I don't rate often, but I'm a heavy sleeper, and this app is great! I used to use an alarm clock, which woke me, but I'd half-sleepily turn it off before I was fully concious. This app is consistently getting me pilot of bed in the morning, now at 6:15 every morning I wake up to Jimi Hendrix's "All Along The Watchtower" play three mini-games and I'm up! 5/5, Bravo, developers; a fantastic innovation, Bravo!

Really awesome app, works as described. Only issue is even if you pay to remove adds the app occasionally glitches out and forgets you did this and displays pop up ads with timers and ad banners at the bottom of the screen... A good restart of the app fixes it but it really shouldnt happen in the first place. Update in June says this was fixed, I can confirm it's not entirely as I got the app a few days ago.

This app helps a lot for anyone who has difficulty waking up with or without an alarm. Previously I used to set like a million alarms and used to wake up late. With this I only need to use one alarm and it's amazing. Mrwhosetheboss made a video on this app, has changed my life

title: To Do List
description:
What is SplenDO?
SplenDO is smart task list for everyday use.
It is truly usable with great user experience.
No matter who you are and what you do - you will be better organized!
At home, at work and in your free time - you will focus on really important things!
SplenDO is powerful in its simplicity and convenience of use.


Key Features
‚Ä¢ User friendly task management
‚Ä¢ Grouping tasks in handy task lists
‚Ä¢ Smart home screen widgets show instantly what to do
‚Ä¢ Intelligent notifications exactly when you need them
‚Ä¢ Syncing with Google that just works


More Details
‚Ä¢ Adding tasks via voice
‚Ä¢ Notifications use sounds, vibrations and built-in speech synthesizer (TTS)
‚Ä¢ Icon widget - icon with optional today's and overdue tasks counter
‚Ä¢ List Widget - resizable widget displays upcoming tasks
‚Ä¢ Status bar - component (in the notifications area) keeping you up to date
‚Ä¢ Quick Task Bar - to add something hot quickly
‚Ä¢ Support for recurring tasks
‚Ä¢ Time for shopping? Need to add many tasks at one go? Great, batch mode is on-board!
‚Ä¢ Support for tasks without a due date, all-day-long tasks and tasks at a specific hour of the day
‚Ä¢ Bidirectional synchronization with Google Tasks
‚Ä¢ Many useful configuration options
‚Ä¢ Predefined task lists
‚Ä¢ Actions on group of tasks (bulk actions, long-click selection support)
‚Ä¢ Integration with sharing on Android - sharing tasks with other apps and receiving shared data
‚Ä¢ Creating tasks from the content of system clipboard
‚Ä¢ SplenDO is free to download and use
‚Ä¢ Splend Apps support and more!


About Us
‚Ä¢ Visit SplendApps.com: http://splendapps.com/
‚Ä¢ Our Privacy Policy: http://splendapps.com/privacy-policy
‚Ä¢ Contact Us: http://splendapps.com/contact-us


Follow Us
‚Ä¢ Twitter: http://twitter.com/SplendApps
‚Ä¢ Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/SplendApps
‚Ä¢ Google+: https://google.com/+Splendapps

comments: Cool app that keeps me organized. I recommend it. Especially if you're like me, a dumb blonde who almost drowns when it rains. Or, you have limited time to try and remember tasks you need to get handled each day. I'll pay the $4 to get rid of the ads. Once again,I can't afford the time that is wasted watching ads. I have a fricken universe to run man. Get errr done already. Download dis and handle your business.

App is simple and works, and as much as I hate to drops stars due to ads, the ads in this app got out of hand. LOUD and obnoxious ads that intentionally hide the mute button so you have to frantically look for it while your phone is blasting game sounds. Basically have to avoid the free version in an office, library, around sleeping kids, seminars, you name it. By far the most jarring ad scheme I've ran into. As much as I'm used to the interface, I'll be moving to a new app due to this.

Great app...Just wish it could have better notifications on upcoming events and tasks... Sometimes I schedule events weeks or months in advance and as those events near, I often schedule things that conflict with them...I would love to be able to schedule my own notifications as reminders that work best for me... Can you give us the option of custom notification reminders for any event on our list? I would give the app 9 üåüstars out of 5...

Nice app but you can't select days of the week for a repeating reminder. I wanted a reminder for Friday, Saturday and Sunday every week. The only way to do this is to set three separate recurring reminders. One for each day.

Would be good without full screen ads. I've used it and it was fine but ever since the full screen ads came, I hate it, hence the 2 star. So, I switched to MS To Do, as I have an account anyway. Ad free, so this went uninstalled.

title: Notes - Notepad, Reminder and Notes
description:
Notes is a very simple to use notes making app. you can quickly write what‚Äôs on your mind and get a reminder later at the right time. In this app you can easily write notes, memos, e-mails, messages, shopping lists and also can set reminders on them. Its UI is inspired from Apple's Notes App.

You can easily type as many charactes as you want to type in your notes. you can also give Title to your notes if you want. you can easliy View, Edit, Delete and share your notes. you dont need to press any save button or manually save your notes after typing them, just type your notes on the Notepad and press back button that's it, the app will automatically save your notes and display them in your Notes List. 
you can also see the last date you have Edited your notes. you can easily set Reminders on your notes also can cancel and modify them, you will get notification of those Notes, you can also see your all reminders on Reminders Page. you can also attach as many Images as you want, to your notes from Internal Storage of your phone. Its interface is very Simple to understand and User friendly. The App also has very cool looking Dark theme, you can enable it from the Settings page.

* Features *
- write and organize your notes.
- create lists, messages, e-mails, memos.
- delete, modify, share notes easily.
- simple interface easy to use.
- Reminder notes on status bar.
- organize reminders on Reminders Page.
- attach Images from Internal Storage.
- Switch between Dark theme and Light Theme.
- Search notes from Title and body.
- Powerful task reminder : Time and date Alarm.
- Quick memo / notes.
- give Titles to your notes.
- Share notes via SMS, whatsApp and E-mail etc.
- Free to use.
- automatic note saving.

*Permissions*
- The "Notes- Notepad, Reminders and Notes" requires Read Write Internal Storage permissions for accessing Images to attach in your Notes.
- Alarm permissions to show Notifications of your Reminders.
- Internet Permissions to access internet to show ads.

*Notice*
- if you are unable to find any widget, you can see the user guide in 'How to Use?' tab in Settings Page.
- the Notes App consist few Banner Ads on the bottom of pages.

Q - why notifications for Reminders are not showing up when the app is closed..?
Sol -: In some devices like MI or OPPO etc. The system shut downs notification services or delay these services due to Battery optimization when they are in background. these devices only  let you get the notifications from some special Apps like whatsApp etc. You can try these steps. they may solve your problem -:
step 1: Goto settings >

step 2: search for "Battery optimization" >

step 3: from here, tap on "apps not optimized" and switch to "all apps."
step 4: search for Notes app (of which you are not getting notification)
step 5: tap on Notes app  and set it as not optimized so that it can receive notification.

OR

XIAOMI : Enable autostart for the Notes app. Open up Security and click through to Permissions and Autostart. Make sure Notes is enabled.
OPPO : Make sure Notes is on the list of allowed start-up apps. Open Security Center, click Privacy Permissions, then Startup Manager, and then allow Notes App to start-up in the background.
VIVO : Enable the auto-start setting for the Notes app. Open i Manager, click the App Manager, then Autostart manager, and then allow Notes App to auto-start in the background.
ONE PLUS : Make sure Notes is on the auto-launch list. Open up Settings and click Apps > the gear icon > Apps Auto-launch. Find Notes in the list and toggle it on to enable auto-launch.
          If you still getting this problem let us know in the reviews section of the app. Sorry for the Inconvenience. 

If you have any additional question, find any bug or want me add any other feature in the next update of the Notes App, let me know in the Reviews section. 

Thank You.
Sourav

title: Dropbox: Cloud Storage & Drive, Doc & Photo Backup
description:
Dropbox lets anyone upload and transfer files to the cloud, and share them with anyone. Back up and sync docs, photos, videos, and other files to cloud storage and access them from any device, no matter where you are. And with advanced sharing features, it‚Äôs easy to share docs and send files‚Äîlarge or small‚Äîto family, friends, and co-workers.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Automatically upload videos and photos from your camera roll to cloud photo storage‚Äîall in the background‚Äîfor easy video sharing and photo sharing. 
‚Ä¢ Access any file in your account‚Äîeven offline‚Äîand preview over 175 different file types with no special software required.
‚Ä¢ Easily send large files by copying and pasting a link you can give to anyone, even if they don‚Äôt have a Dropbox account. 
‚Ä¢ Scan documents, receipts, IDs, photos, and more using your mobile device and transform them into high-quality PDFs, so you can view and send anywhere.
‚Ä¢ Sync folders on your PC or Mac to Dropbox with computer backup, and recover older versions or restore deleted files with version history and file recovery. 

Sign up now for your free Dropbox Plus trial. You‚Äôll get 2 TB (2,000 GB) of storage space‚Äîthat‚Äôs enough room to save files from all your linked devices. We‚Äôve also introduced some new features as part of your Plus plan: Dropbox Passwords to store and sync passwords across all your devices and Dropbox Vault to secure and organize your most sensitive documents. And with Dropbox Rewind, you can roll back any file, folder, or your entire account, up to 30 days.

Existing Plus customers can upgrade to Dropbox Professional. With 3 TB (3,000GB), you can store all your stuff‚Äîfrom work projects to personal photos‚Äîand have space to spare. You and your clients can comment on most file types without leaving Dropbox. And you can protect your work with a watermark, add shared link controls, or rewind your account up to 180 days.

Before completing payment, you‚Äôll see the plan price. This amount will be charged to your Google Play account and will vary by plan and country. Dropbox subscriptions purchased in app renew monthly or yearly, depending on your plan. To avoid auto-renewal, turn it off in at least 24 hours before your subscription renews. You can turn off auto-renewal anytime from your Google Play account settings.

Dropbox is a secure cloud solutions leader trusted by Fortune 500 companies for their most sensitive data. Over 14 million paid users choose Dropbox because they know they can count on a company that‚Äôs also dedicated to their security and privacy‚Äîno matter what they do or where they are. Let Dropbox be your all-in-one file storage, file organizer, file transfer, and file sharing solution for all your devices‚Äîfrom Android to iPhone and Mac to PC.

We‚Äôd love to hear from you! Join the Dropbox community: https://www.dropboxforum.com
Terms of Service: https://www.dropbox.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.dropbox.com/privacy
