comments: This is a terrible app. Yet another useless app from Google. The free version offers 2gb's of storage (fair enough), yet I am unable to open a 2gb file because I "don't have enough storage (on the app)". The device itself is brand new and has tons of storage, so that is not the issue (if that is what you were thinking). This is another predatory service offered by Google that does not work worth a damn, yet has access to your location, contacts, personal/private information, etc.

Simply the best cloud storage app in the world and I thank you sincerely for all your amazing work. It is simple, fast, convenient, good looking, functional, adaptive, and works very well. üåü I love to use Dropbox and the use of it helped me many times not only to backup what I wanted, but also to upload files from Dropbox into where I wanted, and that helped me many times. However, I want to have a choice for a small paid plan such as maybe 10GB to 20GB for a personal use.

This is absolutely the best cloud storage app. Thank you! It is dependable and easy to access from all of my devices. It offers plenty of space, which is important because I store a lot of information for schoolwork. I think it's great! Thanks!

I'm extremely unimpressed by Dropbox. It begins by desiring access to things it shouldn't need, with no way of letting you deny it if you need the app. Then it gives you a small amount of space for free, too small for the one thing I needed to download. WORST OF ALL: I can't even see how to delete my account. It only let's me log out. I'd give it a lower rating if I was allowed.

Everyday I find something irksome with this app. The Dropbox service is great, but this app is full of problems. It takes years to upload things - if they upload at all, spontaneous "storage full or unavailable" errors when trying to download, syncing issues, issues moving files, issues renaming files, issues exporting files. It never ends. You're better off just going to the website and working with your files there.

title: Microsoft OneNote: Save Ideas and Organize Notes
description:
Organize your thoughts, discoveries, and ideas and simplify planning important moments in your life with your digital notepad. Microsoft OneNote lets you take notes on your phone and sync them across all your devices.

With OneNote, you can plan a big event, seize a moment of inspiration to create something new, and track your list of errands that are too important to forget. Take notes, write memos and make a digital sketchbook right on your phone. Capture pictures and add images to your notes.

Sync notes across your devices to access them anytime, anywhere. Save ideas and check your list at home, in the office, or on the go across your devices. Search your notes quickly and effortlessly.

Take notes, share ideas, organize and collaborate when you download Microsoft OneNote today. 

Capture Content And Get Organized
‚Ä¢ Write notes, draw and clip things from the web to get your thoughts down into your notebook.
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote‚Äôs flexible canvas to place content anywhere you want.
‚Ä¢ Scan documents and business cards straight into OneNote.
‚Ä¢ Save pictures and images to your notes.

Take Notes And Achieve More
‚Ä¢ OneNote is a digital notebook that brings 3-ring binders to the digital era. 
‚Ä¢ Organize notes with sections and pages to separate thoughts by theme at school, home or work.
‚Ä¢ Organize your notes using to-do lists, follow up items, marks for what‚Äôs important and custom labels.
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote as a notebook, journal or a notepad.

Save Ideas At The Speed of Light
‚Ä¢ OneNote syncs your notes across all devices and lets multiple people work on the content together, at the same time.
‚Ä¢ Use the notepad to list your thoughts down whenever something crosses your mind.
‚Ä¢ Notepad badge hovers on screen and lets you quickly write your thoughts down any time.
‚Ä¢ Sticky notes are helpful for quick memos.

Collaborate and Share Notes
‚Ä¢ Take meeting notes, brainstorm projects, draw attention to important points and organize key resources.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate in real time to stay in sync and on the same page.
‚Ä¢ Take notes and save ideas across your favorite devices, no matter what device your team likes to use.
‚Ä¢ Take notes during classes or meetings, mixing in text, voice, ink and web clippings.
‚Ä¢ Search your notes with a fast and powerful search function

Better Together With Microsoft Office
‚Ä¢ OneNote is part of the Office family and works great with your favorite apps, such as Excel or Word, to help you do more.

Write notes, save ideas and keep up with your to-do list with Microsoft OneNote.

You can find answers to frequently asked questions about OneNote for Android at http://aka.ms/OnenoteAndroidFAQ

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Requires Android OS 5.0 or later.

descriptionHTML:
Organize your thoughts, discoveries, and ideas and simplify planning important moments in your life with your digital notepad. Microsoft OneNote lets you take notes on your phone and sync them across all your devices.

With OneNote, you can plan a big event, seize a moment of inspiration to create something new, and track your list of errands that are too important to forget. Take notes, write memos and make a digital sketchbook right on your phone. Capture pictures and add images to your notes.

Sync notes across your devices to access them anytime, anywhere. Save ideas and check your list at home, in the office, or on the go across your devices. Search your notes quickly and effortlessly.

Take notes, share ideas, organize and collaborate when you download Microsoft OneNote today.

Capture Content And Get Organized
‚Ä¢ Write notes, draw and clip things from the web to get your thoughts down into your notebook.
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote‚Äôs flexible canvas to place content anywhere you want.
‚Ä¢ Scan documents and business cards straight into OneNote.
‚Ä¢ Save pictures and images to your notes.

Take Notes And Achieve More
‚Ä¢ OneNote is a digital notebook that brings 3-ring binders to the digital era.
‚Ä¢ Organize notes with sections and pages to separate thoughts by theme at school, home or work.
‚Ä¢ Organize your notes using to-do lists, follow up items, marks for what‚Äôs important and custom labels.
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote as a notebook, journal or a notepad.

Save Ideas At The Speed of Light
‚Ä¢ OneNote syncs your notes across all devices and lets multiple people work on the content together, at the same time.
‚Ä¢ Use the notepad to list your thoughts down whenever something crosses your mind.
‚Ä¢ Notepad badge hovers on screen and lets you quickly write your thoughts down any time.
‚Ä¢ Sticky notes are helpful for quick memos.

Collaborate and Share Notes
‚Ä¢ Take meeting notes, brainstorm projects, draw attention to important points and organize key resources.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate in real time to stay in sync and on the same page.
‚Ä¢ Take notes and save ideas across your favorite devices, no matter what device your team likes to use.
‚Ä¢ Take notes during classes or meetings, mixing in text, voice, ink and web clippings.
‚Ä¢ Search your notes with a fast and powerful search function

Better Together With Microsoft Office
‚Ä¢ OneNote is part of the Office family and works great with your favorite apps, such as Excel or Word, to help you do more.

Write notes, save ideas and keep up with your to-do list with Microsoft OneNote.

You can find answers to frequently asked questions about OneNote for Android at http://aka.ms/OnenoteAndroidFAQ

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Requires Android OS 5.0 or later.

summary: Powerful notepad to capture ideas & save notes. Easily organize & share notes
recentChanges: ÔªøThank you for using OneNote. We regularly update the app with great new features, bug fixes, and performance improvements. Please continue to share your feedback with us right in the app!
comments: Overall, I love OneNote because of the ease of using across multiple devices. I use both Android and IOS so I can compare the two. I'm very disappointed that the Apple app version is far more robust than the Android version - this is a fail. The Apple version is very close to the desktop version. Android version doesn't allow for pen or paper customizations nor can you select which notebook you want to "share" from a program/site, it only goes to Quick Note. Android should mirror IOS.

I love this app. Ive been looking for a note taking app for a little while. Most of the apps I have used, you can't highlight or strike through. The good thing with OneNote, I can share across my devices.. and I'm able to highlight my notes, edit, add a photo straight from the camera, add an attachment, make Bullet points, add a recording. It's a word processing program for my phone.

I love OneNote; very few apps are as useful to me as OneNote has become. If I had one gripe it would be that there's no way to set it to open my notebook on launch--it always defaults to "most recent. UPDATE: you can, sorta. You can put a shortcut on your home screen to a particular notebook.

This is the best. I am loving it. Just 2 suggestions. 1.A4 restriction (pls) - when I export all my notes into PDFs it becomes a disaster. Please make it with A4 restriction like notability and goodnotes 5. It will make it the best app for notetaking. 2. Include Draw shapes and lines feature on Android. I take my notes in S6 and it doesn't have those features in the list. It will be good if you add them. 3. Pointer - Actually Pointer in a notetaking app is so cool. Otherwise The app is üî•ü§©

Multiple interface and sync problems with this app. First of all, you can't select multiple notes at once to move them around/delete. The UI designer of this app must be some amature with no knowledge of it at all. Second of all, one of the notebooks suddenly stopped syncing at all and I can't see them anywhere on the web version of the app. Third of all, you can't move a whole section from one notebook to another. I mean, in what age are you living to not provide such a basic feature.

title: WhatsDelete: View Deleted Messages & Status Saver
description:
By Scanning your device notifications, This app view deleted messages / notifications of WhatsApp or Other apps which apps are selected by you.

This application will help to download videos, status and View deleted message. It's also allow to repost photo video to your friends without saving it. View Deleted Messages Easily for Whatsapp or Other selected apps. Video Downloader for Facebook and Instagram. Text and Image Quotes functionality is also available in this app. Chat Through Number : Message or Call without saving number in contacts using WhatsApp public API.


Features of this application:
Status saver for Whatsapp
- app use to easily download image or video of your WhatsApp Contacts.

View Deleted Message
- You can read your friends messages and chat anonymously.

Video Downloader
- Easily save videos from Facebook and Instagram

Chat Through Number
- Message or Call without saving number in contacts using WhatsApp public API.

Repost Status
- If you like your friend's post. Just make it your. You can repost to your app.

Instant status saver
- Exclusive functionality to download or repost status without open from application menu.

Text & Image Quotes
- App has free Text & Image Quotes for status. (Example: Inspirational, Love, Good Morning)


How to use 'View Deleted Messages':
1. Open Application and Click on 'View Deleted Message'.
2. Provide Notification Access permission to read notification content.
3. You can view all deleted message in listing. You can read your friends messages and chat anonymously.


How to use 'Status Saver':
1. Open App and Give require permission.
2. Open WhatsApp and view your friends story status.
3. Come back to our App.
4. Save Image or Video from status listing. (You can use Instant status functionality to save directly for WhatsApp)
5. Click on download to save and repost status.
6. Go to Instant Status Option and Turn ON to Download Image Video. You can directly repost it as your status.


Permissions Notice:
Storage: This is an authority required to enable backgrounds to be saved in the storage of the user's device.
Notification Access: This is an authority required to read notification to view deleted message.

Disclaimer:
WhatsApp‚Ñ¢ is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc.

WhatsDelete is not affiliated with, or sponsored or endorsed by, WhatsApp Inc.

This app is not sponsored or part with WhatsApp or other companies. This is only for help you to show hidden Content which are already available in your device. Please use this app on your responsibly. We are not responsible for any content you see in our application. Please Get permission from your contacts before you save their status. Some of status are created by us and some of the contents are displaying from open thirdparty sources. App is not storing any message to our server or any third party providers. App is storing messages locally for app usage only. No one can access your message from application. For 'Chat Through Number', App is using WhatsApp public API to open particular page though number.

title: ScheduleAnywhere
description:
ScheduleAnywhere is the easy, affordable and proven way to build work schedules and communicate with your employees. Save time and make your job easier and your employees happier, all while meeting the needs of your business. If you schedule shifts and need to ensure proper staff coverage, ScheduleAnywhere is for you!

¬∑     Schedule anywhere, any time
¬∑     Eliminate spreadsheets and paper schedules
¬∑     Communicate changes instantly
¬∑     Avoid overstaffing
¬∑     Ensure proper shift coverage
¬∑     Rotate schedules automatically
¬∑     Reduce unnecessary overtime
¬∑     Save time and money!

 
 Mobile Tools for Managers on the Go 

Don't be tied to your desk. Now you can access and manage staff schedules and employees requests from any mobile device with our free ScheduleAnywhere app or mobile site. See who's scheduled, or not scheduled, and make last-minute changes. Simply repost the schedule to instantly notify affected employees.
 

For managers:

¬∑     Respond to time-off, cover and swap requests
¬∑     Find available employees for no-shows
¬∑     Access daily rosters and staff schedules
¬∑     Make last-minute changes
¬∑     Repost schedules to notify employees of shift changes
¬∑     Fast, easy and convenient!
 

 24/7 Mobile Access for Employees 

Instantly access your work schedule with our free ScheduleAnywhere app or mobile site. Manage and submit schedule requests from anywhere, anytime. Plus, you'll always know when you're scheduled to work.


For employees:

¬∑     See when you work
¬∑     View staff schedules
¬∑     Submit time off, cover and swap requests
¬∑     Check the status of requests
¬∑     Never miss a shift!


-- NOTE: REQUIRES A CURRENT SCHEDULEANYWHERE ACCOUNT --

recentChanges: Optimized performance and enhanced usability.
comments: We use this app at work and has been a little awkward but generally decent way to look at my schedule. The update today, though, converted viewing my schedule from a weekly list of which shifts I work each day to a calendar view. This looks better but loses functionality since I now have to click through each day to see the shift I'm working. I suppose this isn't a problem for if you only work one shift, but for those with variable shifts this is a downgrade in function.

Functions well, but screenshots are now misleading - there is no longer a way to see weekly schedules, only the monthly view. For those of us who work variable schedules, we have to click EVERY DAY INDIVIDUALLY to see scheduled times now, which seems a poor decision. Seriously, why the change? Was it an oversight?

New design is awful. I used to be able to see my entire week in one screen. Now I have to click on each individual day. As a Healthcare worker who works in multiple departments with different start times, this is an annoying feature that was introduced with the update.

Horrible, unable to see my weekly schedule at a glance, don't like the new update, needs to link with Google calendar for better scheduling for people who have families and work in Healthcare. I'm a mom of 3 kids who have school schedules, work schedules, my own schedule, plus medical schedules for 5 people and having to look through 3-5 different calendars to make appointments or plans is difficult. Please accommodate this.
The update made this app very inconvenient to use. The layout change made it far more cumbersome to find basic information. I would not recommended this application.

title: Grammarly - Grammar Keyboard
description:
Edit and correct your grammar, spelling, punctuation, and more with your personal writing assistant, grammar checker, and editor.

The Grammarly Keyboard and proofreader allows you to write clearly, confidently, and mistake-free in all your apps. Advanced features such as the synonyms tool help you enhance your vocabulary, spell check words and improve your writing - from emails to social media posts.

Grammarly grammar checker and editor - how does it work?

1. Simply download the Grammarly app and enable Grammarly in your Keyboard settings.
2. You can adjust the look of your Keyboard for a customized experience‚Äîchoose light or dark, key borders, the number row, and more.
3. You‚Äôre now good to go! Simply start typing in any app. Grammarly will check each word, your grammar, spelling, and punctuation, suggest synonyms, and help you improve your communication skills.

Whether you‚Äôre typing emails on the go, editing an important LinkedIn post, sending a text message, or composing an essential tweet, the Grammarly writing assistant and grammar checker lets you spell check, correct, edit and perfect your message from your mobile device with confidence.

The Grammarly Keyboard also supports swipe typing, so you can compose quality writing without slowing down.

Edit, spell check and correct your writing in real time

‚Äì Grammar checker: Know your grammar is always mistake-free.
‚Äì Spelling checker and proofreader: Easily avoid common typos.
‚Äì Advanced punctuation correction: Take the guesswork out of punctuation.
‚Äì Synonyms and editor: See better word choices and select synonyms as you‚Äôre typing.

Writing assistant and proofreader: Improve your communication skills

‚Äì Receive short, clear explanations for every correction.
‚Äì Understand your mistakes and avoid them in the future.

Customizable for your needs

‚Äì Dialect settings (American, Canadian, British, and Australian English)
‚Äì Light and dark themes
‚Äì Personal dictionary: Easily add your own vocabulary to your dictionary

*** Uplevel Your Communication Skills With Premium ***

Take your writing and communication skills from good to great with our advanced features and suggestions.

Grammarly Premium helps you strike the right tone, gives you real-time feedback, and helps you broaden your vocabulary by suggesting impactful, vivid words to help your message, social media post, or email come to life.

Premium features include:

‚úì Vocabulary enhancement
‚úì Clarity improvements
‚úì Tone adjustments
‚úì Word choice
‚úì Formality level
‚úì Fluency

****************

We designed the Grammarly Keyboard to be a writing assistant that works anywhere you write‚Äîno copying or pasting required, no proofreader needed.

Grammarly always keeps your writing safe and private. See our User Trust Guidelines for details: https://www.grammarly.com/trust

By installing the Keyboard, you agree to Grammarly‚Äôs Terms and Conditions (www.grammarly.com/terms) and acknowledge that you have read Grammarly‚Äôs Privacy Policy (https://www.grammarly.com/privacy-policy). California residents, please see the California Privacy Notice (https://www.grammarly.com/privacy-policy#for-california-users).

title: Smart Home Manager
description:
Check out the incredible new version of Smart Home Manager! 

AT&T‚Äôs Smart Home Manager gives you more ways than ever to personalize and manage your home network. As an AT&T Internet customer, you can customize your home Wi-Fi network and get a complete view from your smartphone. You can troubleshoot with one intuitive, user-friendly interface that provides tips and tools in real-time.

Sign in with your AT&T Internet User ID and password to get started! 

¬∑         Enjoy clear, technician-free troubleshooting
¬∑         Easily view and update your Wi-Fi network name and password
¬∑         See what‚Äôs connected to your Network
¬∑         Personalize all your device names 
¬∑         Create Profiles, set Parental Controls and downtime schedules to manage your    family‚Äôs screen time at home
¬∑         Pause W-Fi access for any of your devices
¬∑         Test the Internet speed to your home Wi-Fi Gateway
¬∑         Pinpoint weak signal spots throughout your home
¬∑         Check your Network health, get notified of issues and service outages, restart your ¬∑         Wi-Fi Gateway, and more!

AT&T Smart Home Manager is available to AT&T Internet service customers with a compatible AT&T Wi-Fi Gateway. Feature availability based on Wi-Fi Gateway model. Limited to home Wi-Fi Network.

comments: Useless. I get an orange alert on a blue screen with a message that says "let's improve your network" and that's all it does. I can't click to another page, if I wait nothing happens, there are no directions. I can't see my network and connected devices. Maybe I should just delete this waste of space and use a different home network monitoring app. Heck, having no app at all will give me the same functionality.

The app was quick to dowoad and easy to use. It allowed me to setup and troubleshoot my network issues during my initial service setup. I could also use the app to manage devices on my network, assigning them to particular people's profiles or block their access entirely. All in all this was a very helpful little app.

App doesn't work. Just got ATT fiber and it's terrible. My connection is getting throttled and I can't even troubleshoot because this app won't let me log in. Update: was able to fix my setup. everything works as advertised but the app is overly simplistic and functionality is limited. Also running into some NATing errors but I think I can fix that.

I've had it for a few hours now. I received the "upgraded" modem with fiber straight to it. Have to sign in with every page change for the app. I get signed out for security reasons if I minimize the app. When I do get the page I'm looking for to make a change I can't do it. Spinning circle of eternity happens. Best part is : my internet still doesn't work. But the reps assure me everything is good. With sprint going away I didn't realize att would back fill their garbage service. Smdh

As of August 10th. I signed up and got the fiber running but this APP needs to be fixed. At&t helped me walk through it and the app would not load properly. Even the technician said AT&T needs to improve the app speed and quality. The fiber optic works fine but this app won't let me access my wifi. I have to use the url. Smh.

title: All My Stuff - Home Inventory App
description:
All My Stuff App helps you with your home organization by taken care of the tedious labor of remembering all the details of your stuff.
This Home Inventory App with its intuitive and organized interface will guide you in the task of build a home inventory taken into account how things are kept in real life.
Here is how it works.
Create places where you can store your different elements, for example you can have your Home Place and aside your Office Place, even your Vacations Summer Home or any other place you need.
Once located in a place create rooms to localize your stuff the same way you do in real life, add your Living Room, Dormitory, Bathroom, Parking, even the dog¬¥s house or the cats box.
In Full Version Customize your categories as you wanted, name them add assosiate them with an icon that way it will be easy and recognizable.
Then start to add your stuff, app will requere a category, a room and a name for the curren Item although you can fill in the other details for a better experience, add a photo of your item could be very helpfull.
As your home inventory grows you may need to relocate your stuff in other rooms or places, then you can use the move button on each element to locate them in a very easy way, items that work as containers and have items asociated inside of them are moved all togheter with one click.
Use the search page to locate your stuff by name in just a couple of clicks.
Consider to get the full version to get access to unlimited resources and customizable categories.
Enjoy your experience.
descriptionHTML:
All My Stuff App helps you with your home organization by taken care of the tedious labor of remembering all the details of your stuff.
This Home Inventory App with its intuitive and organized interface will guide you in the task of build a home inventory taken into account how things are kept in real life.
Here is how it works.
Create places where you can store your different elements, for example you can have your Home Place and aside your Office Place, even your Vacations Summer Home or any other place you need.
Once located in a place create rooms to localize your stuff the same way you do in real life, add your Living Room, Dormitory, Bathroom, Parking, even the dog¬¥s house or the cats box.
In Full Version Customize your categories as you wanted, name them add assosiate them with an icon that way it will be easy and recognizable.
Then start to add your stuff, app will requere a category, a room and a name for the curren Item although you can fill in the other details for a better experience, add a photo of your item could be very helpfull.
As your home inventory grows you may need to relocate your stuff in other rooms or places, then you can use the move button on each element to locate them in a very easy way, items that work as containers and have items asociated inside of them are moved all togheter with one click.
Use the search page to locate your stuff by name in just a couple of clicks.
Consider to get the full version to get access to unlimited resources and customizable categories.
Enjoy your experience.
summary: Organize and keep track of all your stuff in a very intuitive manner!
recentChanges: edit bug fixed, add elements from container button added
comments: I think this is the coolest and most unique app idea ever. I personally room mate with ppl and I always had stuff coming up missing and couldn't remember what it was untill I seen it on them or in their stuff but this app lets me keep inventory of my stuff even tho tht sounds horrible lol but I think it's great. Best idea yet. Love the appp!!! I'm sooo ocd so it's perfect!!

Just downloaded. Seems very intuitive. So far super happy with the FULL Version! For me the free seems very limited, but it is free! Certainly no complaints. Picture function is gone. Help. Pictures still broken after months. Please restore picture function.

Paid version: - It does not make sense that you cannot create elements inside the items, which are containers. I had to create storage elements as "rooms", to have the items in them. (One should be able to place boxes in cupboards or presses and add items in the boxes if you want to have it properly.) - When trying to edit an element: You click on the one element that you want to edit and the app it jumps and edits only the very first element added in the app. You cannot change quantity or edit any details of any other element. The only positive thing compared to the other similar apps, that you can buy with a single payment, you do not have to subscribe and pay monthly or annually... what it worth Although I bought this app, I have just uninstalled it. Using an Excel file is simpler and more versatile than this app ;)
Easy to remember small claims and restraining orders not on the list .
not terribly intuitive, I was looking for a way to itemize our stuff for renters insurance.

title: CONCIERGEpad ¬∑ Mobile
description:
CONCIERGEpad is a school safety platform that was designed to safeguard parents, staff and students.  

Features:

Virtual Badge/ID
############

With CONCIERGEpad Mobile you can create a virtual badge to use at any CONCIERGEpad Kiosk location.  This will make the checkin process at any school, business or healthcare facility a "touchless" experience.
 
Important Communication
#################### 
Parents can also receive important information via Push Notifications, SMS and email using CONCIERGEpad Mobile.

title: Leo Translate: Camera Translator
description:

title: Microsoft Office: Word, Excel, PowerPoint & More
description:
Microsoft Office brings you Word, Excel, and PowerPoint all in one app. Take advantage of a seamless experience with Microsoft tools on the go with the Office app, the simple solution for productivity.

Scan PDF files, create spreadsheets, or draft up documents anytime and anywhere by accessing integrated Office features through your mobile device. Using Office can complete your workflows, no matter where you are, even if your network connection is temporarily interrupted. From Word documents, PowerPoint presentations or Excel files, the Office app provides you with one seamless experience.

With intelligent cloud services and trusted security, the Office app will help maximize your productivity in both work and life.

Office Features

Word, Excel, and PowerPoint Combined:
‚Ä¢ Widely used tools now accessible within a single application, the go-to app for productivity.
‚Ä¢ Store and access Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files using the cloud-based storage.
‚Ä¢ Word documents can be created and collaborated on with others in real-time.
‚Ä¢ Edit slides from PowerPoint or practice your presentation with Presenter Coach.
‚Ä¢ Worksheets on Excel can be created using one of the many templates available in-app.
‚Ä¢ Shared view makes it easy to access files shared with you directly or via Outlook and Teams.

PDF Scanning & Editing Capabilities:
‚Ä¢ Scan PDF files and convert them into Word documents and vice versa, instantaneously.
‚Ä¢ Edit PDF files on your device quickly and easily while on the go.
‚Ä¢ PDF Reader allows you to access and sign PDFs.

Transform Pictures and Documents:
‚Ä¢ Create docs by snapping a picture or uploading a photo from your camera roll.
‚Ä¢ Transform a photo of a table into a usable Excel spreadsheet to work with the data.
‚Ä¢ Enhance digital images of whiteboards and documents using the Office Lens features.

Unique Office Mobile Functions:
‚Ä¢ Quickly jot down thoughts and ideas, and then save or share them via Sticky Notes.
‚Ä¢ QR Scanner enables your device to scan QR codes and open attached links.
‚Ä¢ Documents and spreadsheets can be transferred between your phone and computer or shared instantly with nearby mobile devices.

Anyone can download the Office app for free and start using it right away. Access and save documents to the cloud by connecting with a Microsoft Account (for OneDrive or SharePoint) or by connecting to a third-party cloud storage provider. L Logging in with a personal Microsoft account or a work or school account connected to a Microsoft 365 subscription will unlock premium features within the app.

Achieve more while on the go with the help of Microsoft Office.

Requirements:
OS version: Last 4 major versions of Android running an ARM-based or Intel x86 processor
1 GB RAM or above

This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft's EULA for Terms of Service for Office on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=519111

comments: Very helpful, all in one application for the three best Microsoft applications. But sometimes it crashes and hang, I can't even move some other items like pictures and shapes in Microsoft word. I thought my phone was the problem at first but when i bought the latest model still got the same problem. And please fix the picture png. Every time i transfer png photos it has annoying black background but it should be transparent cuz some pic overlaps. Btw this app was so helpful! Used it for 4 yrs

There are issues when making notes using th s pen on the s6 lite tablet. The pen will randomly stop writing and you can only move the page. Have to close and reopen the whole app for the writing function to work again - very frustrating. Today the programme keeps crashing and am having difficulties uploading on the one drive. Not helpful when trying to work!!!

Pretty good app. I use it to scan Receiving docs. It captures very well, allowing multi page PDF's. However, its quite annoying with the constant changes when it's updated. Things like menu's. There was an update that had key menu options like renaming a document without tapping the "edit" button, then the next update its back to the original. The update before last allowed the app to show in dark mode, and the most recent update reverted. I still can't find any options in settings to customize.

Everything in the app is excellent except a few things: The app doesn't have dark mode. Please add a feature that allows us to invert Documents (.docx, .doc, .pdf, etc) that is Most Documents(.docx, .doc, .pdf, etc) have a white background with black text By inverting I mean to change "black to white" and "white to black" Only invert the text and background by default. Allow the user to choose which things they want to invert(text, background, images, charts, etc) Please. Finally thank you!

The app was working very well in my earlier use but lately there have been many bugs. For instance, recently it automatically deleted all notes and PDFs, document files...I am a student so I have to keep up a lot stuff here. When 1 day during a assignment submission I opened the app, everything just disappeared! Just blank! If it wasn't for a backup on other app I would have failed 2 submit my assignment! It has been more than 2 wks & everyday I keep trying 2 get back my notes but nothing works!

title: GigSpot
description:
What is GigSpot?

GigSpot connects you with mystery shopping and market research companies. GigSpot is the place where these companies compete for your service, offering you tens of thousands of job opportunities. You decide which jobs you want, where, and when.


Get Paid to Shop and Eat? Really?

Yes, each listed job is a paying opportunity. Payment is handled by the mystery shopping or market research company posting the job. GigSpot lists the information you need to take or apply for the opportunity, including:

* Compensation and Reimbursement
* Start and End Date
* Distance


Already a Mystery Shopper? You should sign up with GigSpot!

* One simple signup gives you access to thousands of mystery shopping jobs from dozens of mystery shopping provider companies
* Manage one profile across all companies
* Easily get more jobs than ever
* Receive push notifications for new jobs - fewer emails!
* Complete certifications directly on your mobile device

title: HabitHub - Habit tracker & Goal tracker motivation
description:
‚ÄúMotivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.‚Äù - Jim Ryun.

"The HabitHub" is a powerful app that can be used to track habits, accomplish your goals and finally rewire yourself.

‚Ä¢ Streaks
HabitHub is based on Seinfeld's productivity secret, which involves building long streaks of days. These streaks that you build will motivate you to keep moving forward.

‚Ä¢ Themes
HabitHub comes with four beautiful prebuilt themes.

‚Ä¢ Calendars
HabitHub comes with a full-featured calendar view for every habit to track and visualize your chains.

‚Ä¢ Reminders
Do you keep on forgetting that habit of yours? No worries !! HabitHub comes with a powerful reminder system that will help you stay on top of all your habits.

‚Ä¢ Ready for Smartwatches
HabitHub sends out the reminders directly to your smartwatch allowing you to mark the days directly from the watch.

‚Ä¢ Notes
Want to keep a journal? How about keeping track of your daily achievements !! With HabitHub you can add notes to any day you want and even read all the notes sorted by the last week, month or even year !!

‚Ä¢ Flexible goals
Do you want flexibility in your habits? Do you want to go jogging just on the weekends or hit the gym 4 times every week? HabitHub comes with a very sophisticated scheduling system that can track any habit you can imagine.

‚Ä¢ Category
HabitHub comes with the ability to categorize habits according to various aspects of your life to keep you sane and focused !!

‚Ä¢ Widgets
Track your habits and goals right from the home screen with SIX beautiful widgets for FREE !!

‚Ä¢ Graphs
Want to know how you have been doing with those goals/habits? See the big picture with the help of graphs. Gain insights into what's working for you and what's not working. Get a break down of all the successful and failed days by weeks, months or years.

‚Ä¢ Backup
Automatically backup your data to external storage providers.

‚Ä¢ Import
Already using other apps ? Import your tracking data from apps like habits streak with just a click.

How it works ? 
1. Setup your habit
2. Mark the days on calendar every time you perform the habit.
3. Soon you will build a chain.
4. Don't Break the chain !!


Your life is essentially the sum of your habits. What you repeatedly do is ultimately the person you become. Big goals are never reached by big leaps, but by many small steps. HabitHub help's you in taking these small steps and ultimately reaching these goals.

To help you reach these goals HabitHub lets you set daily reminders and even provides with graphs that help you stay motivated along your journey. On top of this every morning when you wake up, HabitHub sends you nice little motivational quote :)

With HabitHub your task is to build a long streak of days for the habit you are working. The longer your streak, the better it is !! It will take a couple of months to build a solid habit, but don't give up, stay at it !! Be consistent and it will work.

comments: Very good app for productivity. Allows you to track what you need to do in a day quite easily. Would definely recomend for routine building. But there are some things that could be improved. 1) Theres not much to track your daily progress. A percentage bar to tell you if you've done everything would be helpful. Adding to this, something to tell you if you've completed all habits in a category. 2) A hexadecimal system for choosing the colours on habits. So you don't have to eyeball custom colour.

Love it üôÇ! I tried out tons of habit apps but this was the best. The more affordable one-time fee was a big reason, but it also met all my needs and I like using it. Categories are a must. I haven't used the rewards part yet, but that is an extra many other apps don't have. I also love that it has dark mode, I can disable all notifications, and it doesn't make sounds.

User friendly interface. Like the fact that can create habit with multi-line heading, descriptions, reasons for motivation and set up habit categories. Best is IMHO the widget which shows visually the strength of habit following using chain link and completion status. I like the detailed reminders you can set for a habit. I'm using free version so could not check premium features but based on what I saw and used so far I expect premium features to be a hit as well. Wish I had premium version.

I would give 4.5 Stars actually for such a Great, useful app. On a smaller aspect The reward section needs to be more consider. And it would be a real winner of you could have a more collaborative aspect. with the habits
Great app, pretty simple to use and some nice widgets for the home screen. Only four stars because the app doesn't sync everything across my phone and tablet on the fly. Otherwise really great.

title: S‚Äômore - Earn Cash Rewards
description:
PLEASE NOTE: THIS APP IS FOR THE USE OF CUSTOMERS IN THE UNITED STATES ONLY

S'more is a lockscreen rewards app that allows you to earn points in exchange for us placing ads and content on your lockscreen. Every day we'll give you points in exchange for having the S'more lockscreen installed, and regardless of how many times you see it, you'll have points added to your account. Just use your phone normally, and get paid. Want to earn even more? You can also complete offers, play games and use the refer a friend feature to get more points. Once you've earned points you'll be able to redeem them for gift cards from retailers including Amazon, Walmart, Target, CVS, GameStop, Starbucks and more.¬†Last step? Spend that lockscreen cash!




Here's how it Works:


Earn Points
‚Ä¢We'll show you relevant content and ads on your lockscreen.
‚Ä¢To dismiss the ad and access your phone, simply swipe up. To learn more, tap the ad.
‚Ä¢You earn points every day regardless of the number of ads you see or click on.
‚Ä¢Redeem your points for gift cards from retailers, then spend that lockscreen cash!


Bonus Offers
‚Ä¢Offers include free trials, app downloads and videos.
‚Ä¢Complete offers in order to earn points.


Refer and Earn
‚Ä¢Use the refer a friend feature to get additional points by sharing a referral link and code.
‚Ä¢When your friends and family sign up, they receive an additional point bonus.
‚Ä¢After they‚Äôve used S'more for 10 days and are eligible to redeem their own points, you'll receive a 25 point bonus!
‚Ä¢You can refer as many friends and family members as you like.


We're working hard to be the easiest lockscreen rewards program. We'll give you points every single day that you have our app installed. That's it, no catch. As long as you use S'more, you¬†WILL¬†get points that you can redeem for gift cards.¬†


To earn points, you DO NOT need to learn more about every ad or try to see as many ads as you can. Continue to use your lockscreen the way you normally do. You won't earn more for viewing as many ads as you can. Our sponsors and advertisers like it this way and we hope that you do too.


The App thay Pays You
To sum it all up, S'more is a way to get paid for something you're already doing: unlocking your phone. We reward you for allowing us to show you relevant content and ads on your lockscreen, making S'more the easiest way to make money using your phone. So if you're looking for a way to get free cash, look no further.




FAQs
Will this app drain my battery?
Nope, we've optimized the app so that it will use the least amount of battery possible.
How do I get paid?
When you redeem, we'll send you an email with a redemption code for your gift card. No waiting for the mail.
When will I be able to redeem points for gift cards?
For your first redemption, you'll need to wait 10 days after installing, but after that you'll be able to redeem anytime you have enough points for a reward.
What Gift Cards are Available?
Gift Cards are available for Amazon.com, AMC Theaters, Applebee‚Äôs, Best Buy, CVS, Domino's Pizza, GameStop, Starbucks, Target and more!.


Emoji icons provided free by EmojiOne

comments: Had nearly 1700 points removed suddenly and without warning. I've used the app for 2+ years. I've always had the lockscreen ads on my phone. At some point they stopped showing up, once I noticed I opened the app checked out my settings and lockscreen was on so I turned it off and back on. Ads started showing up again. My account still showed almost 1700 points. Today I noticed my account showing 100 points. I'd been logged out. Logged in and found points expired in July. C. support won't help.

This app was awesome. Right up until I was force logged out & all my points "expired". No warning, no "oh hey we changed something, use b4 they are gone". While being logged out after an update happens occasionally w/ apps, I hadnt had that problem here before, nor have points "expired". Dont waste your time.

pretty neato app. you can't redeem any gift cards until after 10 days. Ive had this app for 10 days today and have a total of 1893 points ($18.93). It only took 1 day to get 1100ish. (I played a couple of the games haha) just redeemed my first $10 Amazon card. Going to go play a couple more games to redeem another $10

Honestly had Google play store still been a redeem, I'd have rated it 5 star as a legit way to have some premium for ftp mobile games here and there. But now I have almost no reason to keep it outside of the off chance that they return the Google play store redemption. I'll keep it installed till then.

I love the app, everything checks out however i would really like a google play gift card option. i believe it used to have the option however it got removed later... also the game play rewards change alot and it gave me 19 points for 39 minutes on the mafia game right after it used to be 4 mins for 19?

title: Dropbox Passwords - Secure Password Manager
description:
Dropbox Passwords provides secure password storage and syncs your passwords with all your devices. It autofills usernames and passwords so you can instantly sign in to websites and apps‚Äîall while keeping your data secure. You can easily create and store unique, secure account passwords as you sign up on new apps and websites. 

Features:
‚Ä¢ Sign in to apps and websites with one click
‚Ä¢ Store passwords as you sign in to apps and websites
‚Ä¢ Access your passwords from anywhere with automatic syncing to all your devices

Never get locked out of your accounts again. This new password manager from Dropbox helps you sign in to your favorite e-commerce, streaming, and banking sites and apps quickly and securely.

Passwords secures your credentials with zero-knowledge encryption, so your passwords are only accessible to you and not Dropbox. This extra layer of password security safeguards your logins and helps keep hackers out. 

Dropbox is trusted by more than 14 million paid users‚Äîlet Passwords become your go-to Android password manager. Get peace of mind with the backing of a trusted leader in secure cloud solutions.

comments: Moving to another device is impossible. If you wipe your phone and forget to download your Recovery words, you're screwed. No way to authenticate through your own Dropbox account, even with 2FA enabled. I recommend deleting the App and moving to a more stable platform with better 2FA.

I Think That This Might Really Be Good & Secure. I was Reading One Of The First Couple Of Reviews & One Said That Everytime They Switched Devices That It Wanted To Know The 16 Words Code Or Something To That Effect (Sorry Not Too Tech Savvy On The Lingo). But, I Think That The Developers Shouldn't Change A Thing (haven't tried it yet) Because You Will Have More Subscribers, The More Honest & Secure You & Your App Are!!!! üí°üìµ

Very basic features, no master password, crashes often, syncing (between android and Windows at least) doesn't work, signing in with app authorisation doesn't work (need to dig up my 12 recovery words every time I set up a new device). If this app doesn't get better by next year I'm terminating my DB Plus subscription and switching over to something that actually works and suits my needs.
It doesn't always synce across devices, makes it difficult to know if my phone has the correct password or my laptop does

It stores my passwords and is usable. However, I can't connect my desktop version, so my passwords are out of sync indefinitely. I've tried contacting them through the app store, but no response, so here we are with a 2 star rating.

title: Mobile¬†Scanner¬†-¬†PDF Scanner App, Scan¬†to¬†PDF
description:
Mobile Scanner app is a Free, Fast Scanner for Android. It‚Äôs NO ADS! Turn your phone into a powerful scanner with Mobile Scanner app. Scan anything including documents, paper notes, receipts, and books into clear & sharp PDFs and images. Convert images into text with OCR technology and export searchable PDF files.

Features:

Ultra-fast Scanning:
- Generate high-resolution scans within seconds
- Batch scanning - scan as many pages as you like
- Batch processing - export multiple docs at once

Smart Image Optimizing:
- Automatic border detection and cropping
- Transform and rotate images with just one tap
- Generate perfect quality docs with advanced pic processing filters

Texts Extracting:
- Built-in OCR (optical character recognition) feature
- Recognize any text from your scans
- Export texts as txt

Save & Share:
- Save scans as PDF and images
- Share documents easily via email and popular platforms.
- Batch saving and exporting

Multiple Scan Modes
With multiple scanning modes to choose from, you can easily perform a wide range of tasks for work, study, or daily life.
-Document: auto-detect borders, smart cropping, and HD enhancement provide clear, high-quality PDF documents in seconds.
-QR: easily read QR & barcodes to link to websites.

Secure Important Files

Thanks for staying with us! The new version offers:

comments: Super easy to use, automatically scanned the document and no background was included. It was very clear and readable, easy export to pdf. I just wish it didn't have a subscription requirement.

When you first use the app it all works fine, but after the trial and when you purchase the subscription it stops working. Absolutely appalling app with no way to contact anyone to try and get it fixed. Changed to adobe scan and no problems at all.

One of the few apps that scan on the go! Had a lot of trouble with those that need pictures taken cos of a bug, but this app makes scanning seamless and fast. I love how shadows eg of my phone are immediately removed too, unlike some of the other apps where the shadow stays. Worth the price imo.
This app is outstanding. It's a mobile office. I confidently engage in all document activity when it occurs.

I love this app and the yearly subscription is totally worth it. I have a critique: you should be able to share/email multiple files at once, that would greatly improve my productivity with this app! Love the app thanks for making it.

title: Line2 - Second Phone Number
description:
Line2 is your complete business phone system for your Android device. Give your customers a professional call experience no matter where you are and keep your personal and business lines separate.

Multiple phone numbers: Add multiple virtual business phone numbers to your device and receive or make calls from anywhere.

Local and toll-free numbers: Go local with your business with localized numbers or give your customers toll-free numbers to call. You can also port your existing phone number to Line2.

Unlimited call and text: Get unlimited Voice over IP calls and texting across the United States and Canada. Also, get free calls and messaging between other Line2 users. 

Auto-attendant: Guide your customers to right call queues like sales and support using the auto-attendant feature, along with on-hold music and pre-recorded call greetings. 

No cellular data needed: Make and receive calls or texts using VoIP technology. No need for expensive cellular plans or hardware. 

Call features: Screen and block unwanted calls with call screening and call blocking. 

Designed for mobile business professionals, freelancers, and entrepreneurs, Line2 lets you keep your business and personal communications separate and eliminates the need to purchase and carry a second mobile phone.

More powerful features:

‚Ä¢ Use your Line2 number across your smartphone, computers, and tablets.
‚Ä¢ Share media with MMS and group messages with anyone in the U.S. and Canada.
‚Ä¢ Quick and easy setup with no additional hardware required.

Questions or comments? We‚Äôre here to help, 7 days a week at http://help.line2.com or tap Settings -> Help from within the app.

Note: Your cellular provider may prohibit or restrict VoIP (Voice over Internet Protocol) on their network. It‚Äôs your responsibility to check with your cellular provider about their VoIP functionality, and any additional charges it may incur.

recentChanges: Thanks for using the Line2 app! In this version, we've made some general bug fixes and performance improvements based on our customer feedback.
comments: The app is horrible, mute sound on your phone without permission! Same problem even after update, when I connect to my car via Bluetooth the app make your phone silent to all notifications!

It's really handy to have a 2nd number, for the most part it functions well. On Android 11 the aggressive optimizer will prevent you getting your calls/messages, go into settings for battery & unoptimize, it will function better then. 1 thing I hope developers will remedy, after an app update, you're logged out UPDATE If you're experiencing issues, email the developer and tap the help tab in the app, I'm currently working with support team and running a beta version which works better 07/20/21
Since update won't open. Crashes constantly

This app is awful. Scrolling through a text message causes it to crash, each and every time. I've been a Line 2 user for several years, never had a problem until the most recent update last February. Now it's almost unusable. Cleared data, cleared cache, uninstalled, reinstalled, still the same result. Crash. The Line2 dev guys need to fix this thing and provide an update.

It works but there is an annoying bug. Every time after a phone call, it tends to mess with my music/video audio. For example, after the phone call, all of the audio plays from my phone speaker that is only used for phone calls. Same with my car audio, it thinks I am in a phone call. The only way to fix it is by closing the app from my multi-task viewer. Hope you can fix it soon because it is annoying.

title: Wondr Note - Pretty notes, lists, countdown & more
description:
Wondr Note is a creative & unique take on notes & lists. We asked ourselves, "Why can't notes be pretty & useful?". And so we created Wondr Note in the hopes of providing ultimate convenience, productivity & visual appeal. 

From poems to shopping lists to travel expenses to errands checklist. Plan/add errands and todo lists to your day. Countdown to a big event or build an inspiration board for your next project. Keep your notes, lists, mood boards & accounts here. Easily categorize and search through titles and items. Add items to your agendas & customize the app with themes. We try our best to keep it simple, clean & pretty.


‚ñåSTUFF YOU COULD DO ON WONDR NOTE

‚úì¬†Make a shopping list for tomorrow
‚úì¬†Add widgets of your important lists, agendas or countdowns
‚úì¬†Add a checklist of your errands & chores in daily agendas
‚úì¬†Make simple expense accounts of an outing or trip you just returned from
‚úì¬†Add all your favourite recipes with a picture and steps in a numbered todo list

recentChanges:
An awesome new update for you guys! With all your valuable feedback, we have added more features and improved design as well as usability!

- Autosave! Everything saves automatically
- Add future agendas
- Cleaner and improved usability
- Major Bug fixes
- More changes with suggestions and feedback from you guys!
comments: I have used Color Note since 2017 and this is so much better. It's cuter and a lot more functional, and you can add tags to keep up with everything, kind of like hashtags. You can add pictures, agendas, lists, and even keep track of finances, as well as a lot of customization features at your disposal. I had it crash on me but support was responsive, however I recommend to people to back up often just in case it crashes. The customer service is awesome, and I will recommend this app to my folks!

I honestly don't usually write reviews but the latest update was so good that I have to sing it's praises. The slicker UI makes navigating the app, which already was good, a breeze. The new agenda features which let me plan ahead, as well as the UI making it a pleasure to use, has made me switch to using this as my main ToDo list. Fantastic! I applaud the team behind such a wonderful app. Keep up the good work!

Really cute note taking app! It's a little confusing at first but well made. It would be nice to have a feature to toggle dark mode/light mode from within the app though. Also, maybe an easier way to delete notes from the main screen! Keep up the good work!

It's still a new app, so features are limited, but I really like it! The functionality it does have works well and I really appreciate the visual customization. Can't wait to see what else the devs have in store for this gem!

Wish I didn't pay for premium. The widgets don't work,I can open the app and make agendas but I can't put it on my homescreen because the widget doesn't work for me. Smh, it's too bad because it's cute af and I would love to be able to use it.

title: Google Calendar
description:
Get the official Google Calendar app, part of Google Workspace, for your Android phone and tablet to save time and make the most of every day.

‚Ä¢ Different ways to view your calendar - Quickly switch between month, week, and day view.
‚Ä¢ Events from Gmail - Flight, hotel, concert, restaurant reservations, and more are added to your calendar automatically.
‚Ä¢ Tasks - Create, manage, and view your tasks alongside your events in Calendar
‚Ä¢ All your calendars in one place - Google Calendar works with all calendars on your phone, including Exchange.

Google Calendar is part of Google Workspace. With Google Workspace, you and your team can:
‚Ä¢ Schedule meetings quickly by checking coworkers' availability or layering their calendars in a single view

comments: The app is good. But since last 1 month the notifications are not working properly. If I click on a particular reminder notification then some other opens. So I always need to open the calendar and go the reminders there to do anything with them. If this issue can be resolved then it will be great.

I have been using this app for years but now you suddenly can't colour code the different appointments as you save them. I used to have a different colour for grandchildren, one for the dogs, red for all doctors or dentists appointments and purple for all the birthdays. Now any that are set stay that colour but all new ones are blue. I can't see at a glance what I'm doing now. It's sooo disappointing. I'm going to have to look for a different one to help me remember everything.

Been using it a few years. However, the app keeps giving me a sync error now no matter what I try. Restarting my phone clearing the app's cache and storage and leaving in-app feedback did nothing. Edit: It works now! But all of the suggestions given didn't fix it. What I did was to remove all my gmail accounts and add them back again.

Really really good, until recently... I've been very happy with the app for many years. However recently I've noticed a bug with the editing of 'Reminders' - the edit window cannot properly identify which reminder it's supposed to be editing. Wonder if this something you might be working on?

Do not erase this review. This is the third time I placed review it might not be a great review. But it's an accurate one. Should not be deleted. I was having trouble with the app trying to figure out how to put backgrounds on events and I was under the impression that it couldn't be done because nobody at support was able to help me. However when I go into place this review I'm looking at the photos of the app at the Play store and it clearly shows that there are backgrounds. Help

title: Arabic Voice typing keyboard- Speech to text app
description:
Arabic voice typing keyboard allows you to type messages through voice typing. In Arabic voice Keyboard you only have to speak In Arabic and it will convert the voice text in to Arabic text. Now no need to use typing keyboard any more, just use this audio to text converter and write text through voice typing keyboard. Arabic speak to text keyboard will make your life much easier you just have to dictate your text and it will convert it automatically. Arabic voice typing keyboard is highly optimized speech to text app that uses voice recognition technology to detect your voice and provide your voice in text form for text, messages or any other social app. Arabic audio to text converter app is the easiest voice typing keyboard to write Arabic text through voice.

Arabic voice typing keyboard is simple application with user friendly interface. Using speech to text online you can send long texts to your friends with easy text copy option. In Arabic voice typing keyboard the text will appear after you stop speaking and it will take a while to convert your text but once it gets the regularity then it will convert the text instantly. Just talk and get text in return just like a magic. Using Arabic voice typing keyboard, you can share your text file with all the supported application on your phone. You can copy the text and send as a message/text form to your contacts. 

The goal of Arabic voice keyboard is to give you an easy and simple way to send text messages with your voice. Arabic Voice Typing Keyboard that makes typing Arabic text faster than ever before. Using Speech to Text online, you can share your text with all the supported messaging application on your phone.

Speech to text- Arabic keyboard has easy features:
‚Ä¢	Fast voice recognition
‚Ä¢	Speech to text
‚Ä¢	Simple and Elegant design
‚Ä¢	Easy text sharing option
‚Ä¢	Speech recognizer does not time out
‚Ä¢	Saves a lot of time & effort
‚Ä¢	Free to use 

How to Use Arabic voice typing keyboard:
1.	Open the Arabic voice typing keyboard.
2.	Click on settings 
3.	Set Arabic voice keyboard as your default keyboard
4.	Enable the Arabic voice keyboard
5.	Click on Done 
6.	You are ready to use Arabic voice typing keyboard 

The goal of Voice to Text- Arabic keyboard is to give you an easy and simple way to send text messages with your voice. Start using Arabic voice typing keyboard as it is free. Don‚Äôt forget to give us your feedback so we can provide you more good work.

title: MetroFax - Receive and Send Fax from Phone

comments: Fantastic app for both smartphones and on the web and great service. Started using this from back in 2013. Though there was a gap in between of my usage, then again started using again and I love their service.

How is it a "FREE TRIAL" if you're putting a HOLD on someone's credit card IMMEDIATELY? It's meant to mislead people. You sign up, they have your personal info to sale. They'll take the funds they claim they're holding. Legitimate companies that aren't running a scam don't put a hold on your card during the free trial. It's boarder line false advertising. They don't take the funds immediately, but you don't have access to those funds either because they're "holding" them. DON'T FALL FOR IT!

Absolutely stay away from this company. Free trial is a scam. They won't let you cancel until you pay them a fee. It's a joke. You can not get a real person to speak to, they hide behind the layers of internet. I never once logged onto their system, never used a single function, and canceled 3 days after sign up for free trial. They won't let me cancel until I pay an erroneous $29 for nothing. They keep trying to charge my cc every other day. I have had to cancel my cc and report to fcc, ftc. Bb
Very easy and convenient to use!
This is the Best Faxing app out their! Been using it for several years and had No Problem at all! It's simply and affordably does what it says it does.

title: Google Tasks
description:
Get more done with the Google Tasks mobile app. Manage, capture, and edit your tasks from anywhere, at anytime, with to-dos that sync across all your devices. Integrations with Gmail and Google Calendar help you get tasks done‚Äîfaster.

Quickly capture tasks anywhere
‚Ä¢ Create task lists with your most important to-dos
‚Ä¢ View, edit, and manage tasks on the go, from any device
‚Ä¢ Manage tasks created in Gmail or Calendar on the web from your mobile device

Add details and create subtasks
‚Ä¢ Break down your tasks to subtasks
‚Ä¢ Add details about the work you need to focus on

View tasks created from emails

summary: Simply create any task or subtask. Integrated with Gmail for easy collaboration
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Easily create a new task by long-pressing on the app icon
‚Ä¢ Create a task by sharing from other apps
‚Ä¢ General improvements and bug fixes
comments: Great app. Can repeat every day and will show up on your Google calendar if you want. You can set your own custom amount of reminders I the settings and all new tasks will automatically have those reminders. I like checking them off. Once they're checked off, they're still on a list below that you can find and reactivate. You can create subtasks. I would like to be able to set reminders hourly, however, for things like taking medicine or drinking water.

Pretty good. The link with Google Calendar is great, as is the ability to create different categories of task and to set different dates and times for subtasks. Two things that would make this nearly perfect in my view: (1) A separate standalone app for pc use, since the sidebar thing is extra clicks to get to and a computer screen is better for seeing the whole picture at once, and (2) the ability to set different colours to appear on the calendar (perhaps for different categories of task).

Gets the job done. Wish there was more list functionality. Ideally the ability to set deadlines with reminders would be fantastic. As well as the ability to change or choose how you get notified about tasks. The ability to share a task list and have it edited by multiple parties would also be useful.

This app needs more options and more control. When you make a task with subtasks it just lumps everything as tasks so the list ends up the same as any other list, no way to collapse it or know which sub items belong to which main task. It's nice that tasks can be assigned a date but the fact that the tasks are not removed after they have been checked off from calender is annoying. My calendar will have old tasks that I have already checked off and yet they still remain striked through on calenda

I *really* want to love this app and make it a part of my daily productivity. The integration with Google Calendar and the ability to create tasks from an email (in Gmail) are game changers for me, however there are two deal breakers: [1] There is no integration with the Google Assistant. This is a surprising oversight given that you can add everything else with your voice (Calendar Events, Reminders, Notes, etc). I have too many use cases where I need to add Tasks with my voice from either my phone, Google Home, or Android Auto. [2] There is no ability to share task lists with other Google users*. I need to share lists with my household (grocery lists, chores, house projects, etc). *Yes, I know there are services that will do this for you but it should be a native feature.

title: Post-it¬Æ
description:
Use Post-it¬Æ Notes anywhere and anytime. Post-it¬Æ App brings the simplicity of Post-it¬Æ Notes to your smartphone, tablet and Chromebook. Whether you use Post-it¬Æ Notes for teamwork and collaboration, or for reminders and personal note taking, Post-it¬Æ App helps you keep the momentum going.

If you work from home or as a student in remote learning, use the Post-it¬Æ App to share your ideas with co-workers, structure your assignments and share them with your teacher, or create colorful calendars and share them with your friends.

Simply capture analog notes with your camera or create digital notes right on your device. Arrange, refine and organize ideas anyway you see fit. Collaborate and share notes with co-workers, teachers and friends, or export to your favorite apps and cloud services‚Äîincluding Miro, Trello, Dropbox, PowerPoint, Excel, PDF, and more.

Post-it¬Æ App features:
‚Ä¢ Connect and share ideas from anywhere with co-workers and friends, whether it be a workshop, a brainstorm or you simply want to share notes with each other.
‚Ä¢ Capture more than 200 Post-it¬Æ Notes at a time with your camera. All our popular note sizes are supported.
‚Ä¢ Transcribe your notes automatically using Handwriting Recognition. Great for search and exports.
‚Ä¢ Draw, erase, type and change the color of your notes using powerful editing tools.
‚Ä¢ Organize your way‚Äîgroup your ideas by thought or simply organize on a grid.
‚Ä¢ Share to your favorite formats and cloud services to continue working on your ideas digitally‚Äîsupports Miro, Trello, Dropbox, PowerPoint, Excel, PDF, and more.
‚Ä¢ Use our Widget to put your most important notes directly on your home screen.

Learn more about Post-it¬Æ App at post-it.com/app

Terms of Service: https://www.post-it.com/3M/en_US/post-it/ideas/app/eula/

recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Structure your ideas in new ways by using empty groups. Empty groups will stay in the board to help you organize and rearrange notes any way you like.
‚Ä¢ The option to create duplicate boards allows you to use an existing board as a template, or to explore multiple variations of a board without changing the original.
comments: Definitely on the right track with this. Having a note posted to the phone screen is the real advantage here I think. It would be a great if you could just tap the widget and add a note from there. Quicker than having to go to the ap first, add a note, marking it as a favorite, then have it finally show on the widget on the phone screen.

Great but Lacks What I Needed Most. All I want is to be able to put multiple notes on a page of my screen so I can read them on the go. I just downloaded the app, so I don't have much of an opinion about its functionality other than the options that I saw and tried out are amazing and fun. And when I get a new job on a team, I will be able to use the collaboration aspects of it as well. üòä

Great app. The only reason I have not given a full 5 star rating is because there is now way to login, save your boards, back-up your work, or evensync from device to device. other than this the app is great.

Please simplify this note app. It's good for notes but very clunky. Every time you make note it creates its own group\boards. Simplify it's features and allow us to add photos to our notes and back up in Google or OneDrive .
Organization wasn't always the easiest if the note needed to change boards, but the ability to quickly photograph and store notes is helpful.

title: Gov2Go
description:
Your Personal Assistant for Government

Gov2Go is the easiest way to keep up with your government to-do list ‚Äî property taxes, car tags, voting, and more. It‚Äôs a smart app that reminds you what's due and helps you take care of it. Never miss a deadline again!

Your Guide to Government
With Gov2Go, you don‚Äôt have to know which agency handles property assessments or vehicle registration. No more navigating government to get things done. All you need to do is share a little about yourself. We‚Äôll handle the rest.
 
Personalized to You
Gov2Go learns about you and then carefully curates government information and services based on what you share. It knows your government deadlines, tracks them for you and tells you when it‚Äôs time to do something.
 
Secure & Private
Your data is secure. We will never sell it or share it with anyone. Information you provide is used only in the ways you allow. You‚Äôre in complete control of what you share and what conveniences you get in return. You can add or remove information at any time.
 
A Name You Can Trust
Gov2Go is offered by NIC, Inc., the people behind eGovernment. Over 3,500 government agencies (and counting) trust NIC with their payment processing and online services.

recentChanges: Fixed an intermittent crash during app start
comments: I used this app in the past to schedule covid tests. Today I tried to and I couldn't find the testing info anywhere. If there hadn't been a link to schedule a new test under one of my old appointments, I wouldn't have been able to do it (in SC). Also, this app signs you out way too quickly and it's frustrating when you're waiting in line for a test and need to pull up your voucher number. If you're going to require logging in every time, please add biometric support. Also, where is MFA?

Im not gonna blame the App its actually worked great for me until I had to start putting the work search info in. First they need to realize that probably 95% if not more businesses don't take paper applications anymore. Especially the bigger companies. They are online or some places have a kiosk where you fill out the apo on site. Then they ask for a contact or email address for your contact. I believe this is why there's problems for some people getting there money. 2 weeks in a row.

I think the app in not working properly. Since April it's been 2 months I have claimed for my benefit with which was appeared on my dashboard but I haven't received any of them.. Moreover, I called the customer service for thousands of times but it always says that the representative is busy. When there's a chance to wait on the lines, I hold my phone for 6-8 hours to speak wit them, then the phone call hangs up automatically.. I sent emails to them but still no response... I'm so stressed right
App keeps moving up half the screen so I cannot see half of the app. If I reload the app it work until it goes back up half the screen again and I lose all my progress.

They have supposedly made many updates and yet I have not been able to file ANY claims since DECEMBER 2020 . I have mentioned this to my VEC and they have finally pushed me into a corner and made it damn near impossible to file claims and thanks to this terrible app I have to wait HOURS a day just to get hung up on several times. Not sure what it going on but this app clearly needs fixed and ASAP.

title: Easy Voice Recorder
description:
Easy Voice Recorder is your everyday companion to record important moments. Capture meetings, personal notes, classes, songs, and much more, without time limits!

For students

Record classes and lectures with clear quality, even when the teacher is not right in front of you. Listen to these recordings as many times as you want to help you study for that next exam. 

With no time limits and the option to choose a compressed format, it's easy to record the longest classes and lectures.

For business

Capture interviews and meetings from your phone, tablet, or smart watch, then share them with your colleagues through email or your favourite messaging app. Take advantage of powerful widgets and shortcuts to start a new recording right from the home screen.

For musicians and for everyone

With many options to fine-tune the recording, the app is great for rehearsals and for capturing melodies that pop into your head. Try new ideas fast, hear the results and make adjustments on a new take.

Quickly switch between voice notes, meetings & lectures, and music & raw sound with easy to use settings and presets.

Here is what you get:

‚òÖ Record to high-quality PCM and MP4, or use AMR to save space.
‚òÖ Quickly start a new recording with widgets and shortcuts, and record in the background.
‚òÖ Share recordings easily through email or your favourite app, or set one of them as a ringtone.
‚òÖ Android Wear support - record from your smartwatch.
‚òÖ Light and dark themes, and many other cool features.

Want more?

The Pro version also includes the following features (available on supported devices):

- Upload new recordings automatically to your Google Drive or Dropbox.
- Record to MP3 and AAC, in addition to all the formats available in the free version.
- Record using a Bluetooth microphone.
- Trim recordings and remove unwanted sections with Edit mode.
- Manage and organize your recordings with folders, and save recordings to your SD card.
- Control the recorder from anywhere using the notifications bar, or through our Tasker and Locale plugins.
- Bonus features: record in stereo, import files, skip silence, volume boost, custom bitrates, and more.

Easy Voice Recorder is exactly what the name says: an easy to use audio recorder and sound recorder. Reliable, fast and flexible, it adapts to your needs.

Need help?

Please note that Easy Voice Recorder is not a call recorder and can‚Äôt record phone calls on most phones. If there are any problems, please contact us at support@digipom.com. We are always happy to assist you.

Terms of Use

Terms of Use: http://www.digipom.com/end-user-license-agreement-for-applications/
Privacy Policy: http://www.digipom.com/privacy-policy-for-applications/

Permission details

Photos/Media/Files - Save recordings to your external storage.
Microphone - Record audio from your microphone.
