comments: This is a great reliable app. Not only does it record the events & conversations I need to save. I use it to help me remember stuff. I have memory issues and I record little clips on this then have my phone alarm play the clip. This really helps. I don't have to pick up the phone to know what the alarms about. I already know because it's telling me.

This is one of the absolute best apps I have ever downloaded. Whenever I have a thought or want to record something for posterity this does the trick. Sound quality is exceptional. The process to record and save is so simple and it keeps a record of each recording by date. Is easy to retrieve each recording and listen back to it along with the option of saving again or deleting. It's so nice to have an app that is effective and simple but so valuable. 10 stars.

I'm a journalist, and this is the only recording app thus far that doesn't spontaneously delete my recordings. Saves audio automatically, and tells you how much recordable time you have left, which is a huge plus especially when I have a long event. Plus, it's free and ads don't play as soon as you stop recording. Love this app, I've recommended it to everyone I work with. Great job.

I've recently picked up my guitar, again, after a stroke a few years ago. I'm struggling (well, it feels like a struggle to me...) to find my singing voice again. Recording as I practice lets me see/hear that it's going better than I thought! The app is easy to use, which is important. Lets me concentrate on what I'm doing, rather than on figuring out how to opperate and record. Really glad I blundered into it!

This is the best free App for recording. My mum is in a nursing home. She is not well. My sister visits her. I am hundreds of kms away. So, I write, then record my family stories. My sister plays them to mum's great delight. The recordings are very clear, bright & precise. Very very Audible. Mum is pretty deaf, but, hears the storys well. I recommend this Audio Application. Brilliant. Thank you to the Developers. A great professional job you have given to society. Jeanette

title: OneSoil Scouting: Farming Tool
description:
Know what's on your fields, keep an eye on plant health, mark problem areas, and harvest on time.

OneSoil Scouting is a free agriculture app for farmers, crop consultants, and agronomists that assists with farming operations and lets you conduct farm monitoring via satellite.
 
üìà Get vegetation data updates

OneSoil Scouting calculates the vegetation index (NDVI) of a plant using satellite imagery. The field will be divided into colored zones (brown-yellow-green) based on the NDVI value. This helps detect problem areas.
The NDVI updates every 3-5 days if the weather is cloudless. Switch on notifications in app settings to stay on top of updates.

 üó∫ Automatic field boundary detection

OneSoil Scouting automatically detects your field boundary using satellite images from Sentinel-2. All you need to do is select your fields by tapping them on the map.

‚úç Add field notes

You can either choose a pre-selected issue type (e.g., crop diseases, pests, water, weeds, plant lodging) or create a blank note. Customize your note by adding a note color, writing a comment, or adding a photo. The note will be pinned on your field map.
This app just made agronomy easier. The pins can be added remotely from the office or when you're scouting fields. In this case, the satellite can determine your exact geolocation.

üí™ Work offline

No Internet connection? No problem! You can still check the last 6 months of NDVI values for your fields, add notes, and edit field info (add new crops, specify their growth stages and seeding dates, and more).

‚õÖ Weather forecast

Check the weather forecast for your field and see our spraying time recommendations. 

üå± Add crop growth stages

Add a growth stage for your crops to plan fieldwork more thoroughly. The current phenophase can be added in the field card.

üîóShare fields and notes

Share your fields and agro notes with your colleagues. They will be able to see the note content and/or vegetation index, but won't be able to make any edits.  

  ***

üèÜThe UN-supported WSA Global Congress 2020 ranks our platform as the Best Product in the Environment & Green Energy category.

OneSoil is a member of the Global Alliance for Climate-Smart Agriculture hosted by the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO).
  ***

About OneSoil:

We also offer a web app with the following farming tools:

 Fertilizers: Calculate variable rates to apply nitrogen or phosphorus and potassium fertilizers and then create a task for agricultural machinery equipped with onboard computers.
 Sowing rate: Calculate variable sowing rates and create a task for agricultural machinery equipped with onboard computers.
  Weather: See the five-day forecast and growing degree-days and accumulated precipitation charts.
 Field Data: Visualize the results of your fieldwork that your onboard computer uploads as files.


‚ùì If you have any questions, please contact us at care@onesoil.ai or in the online chat (Look for the blue icon in your profile tab).

‚úî Stay connected: 

Facebook   
Twitter
Telegram 


Thank you for reading this far!
We're proud to have such a motivated user. üòä
descriptionHTML:
Know what's on your fields, keep an eye on plant health, mark problem areas, and harvest on time.

OneSoil Scouting is a free agriculture app for farmers, crop consultants, and agronomists that assists with farming operations and lets you conduct farm monitoring via satellite.

üìà Get vegetation data updates

OneSoil Scouting calculates the vegetation index (NDVI) of a plant using satellite imagery. The field will be divided into colored zones (brown-yellow-green) based on the NDVI value. This helps detect problem areas.
The NDVI updates every 3-5 days if the weather is cloudless. Switch on notifications in app settings to stay on top of updates.

üó∫ Automatic field boundary detection

OneSoil Scouting automatically detects your field boundary using satellite images from Sentinel-2. All you need to do is select your fields by tapping them on the map.

‚úç Add field notes

You can either choose a pre-selected issue type (e.g., crop diseases, pests, water, weeds, plant lodging) or create a blank note. Customize your note by adding a note color, writing a comment, or adding a photo. The note will be pinned on your field map.
This app just made agronomy easier. The pins can be added remotely from the office or when you're scouting fields. In this case, the satellite can determine your exact geolocation.

üí™ Work offline

No Internet connection? No problem! You can still check the last 6 months of NDVI values for your fields, add notes, and edit field info (add new crops, specify their growth stages and seeding dates, and more).

‚õÖ Weather forecast

Check the weather forecast for your field and see our spraying time recommendations.

üå± Add crop growth stages

Add a growth stage for your crops to plan fieldwork more thoroughly. The current phenophase can be added in the field card.

üîóShare fields and notes

Share your fields and agro notes with your colleagues. They will be able to see the note content and/or vegetation index, but won't be able to make any edits.

***

***

recentChanges:
We've updated notes

comments: Easy to use and useful application for crop monitoring

Love this app! Helps you with any issues with drought or too much watering. Satellite feeds. To give you accurate info for managing crops & balancing fertilizer placement. Weeding and feeding There is a lot more features than this. If your having issues with growing issues that need to be solved this app is a definite help. Best times to spray herbicides. Wind issues & weather.

this app is God sent...let's you record all farming activity and view all available NDVI images of the chosen field. not only that, it also lets you see the NDVI image of all available dates. I can track the progress of my crop by viewing all the images and highlight areas that are of low productivity. I hope you guys also add in other filters like EVI. That would be really great. thank you.

Amazing app, however after latest updates (probably since offline functionality was added) the interface is extremely slow and laggy and by that I mean it takes a lot of time from clicking on a field to when the app displays the field's ndvi image. I have an 8 core cpu and 6 gb ram so phone hw is not a problem. Kindly ask you to address this issue. Later review: I can confirm that as 27/01/2021, the app works smooth and I therefore can give 5 stars. Many thanks to the team, amazing work.

This is a great app. I can monitor vegetation dynamics and weather at my fields from any location without necessarily visiting them. It allows to now precipitation, wind speed, dew point, temperature, predicts growth stages. Extremely useful. I highly recommend it.

title: Reminders: to do list, daily planner with calendar
description:
Reminders is your personal planner. From a grocery list to a project planner Reminders can help keep you on track and increase your productivity! 

With Reminders app in your pocket, you can create to do lists effortlessly. Take notes, add alerts/alarms, priorities and flag the most important items. With the build in filters and calendar view you can see what is most important and get things done (GTD).

Reminders is easy to get started with its clean, intuitive design. It can be customised to your needs from a simple grocery list to complex filters. It's in your hands.

Get more out of Reminders with Premium features:
‚≠êÔ∏è  Home screen widgets - Interact with Reminders quickly and easily from your home screen.
‚≠êÔ∏è  Custom filters - Build your own filtered lists based on your criteria.
‚≠êÔ∏è  Backup and restore - want to stay in control of your backups? Use the Backup/Restore option in Settings.
‚≠êÔ∏è  Support - Got a question, just ask.
‚≠êÔ∏è  Tags - Tag your reminders. Create filters based on tags.

USEFUL and PRIORITY determination is THERE ! ... basicly only few clicks to what you need ... it is like it is reading your mind you want something you look at the screen it is there ! Amazing

It's Useful for organize your day and write your own plan And also it work easy
Great clean and tidy looking app ‚ò∫Ô∏è I use it for daily reminders like walking the dog üê∂ I love that it's easy to use and there aren't any adverts

title: I'm On It: Focus Timer for ADHD & ASD
description:
A timer app, with regular reminders to stay on task.

The "I'm On It!" timer app for Android is designed specifically for people who struggle to stay focused on the task at hand. These may be children or adults with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD, or ADD) as well as people working through the unique challenges of High Functioning Autism Spectrum Disorder, or ASD (Asperger's Syndrome), and of course, anyone who struggles to stay focused.

Research-based features

Designed from the ground up to help you or your child with ASD or ADHD learn to stay focused.

Features include:

* A timer, that can be set for any length of time up to 60 minutes (1 hour) so you can divide large tasks into shorter chunks.

* An audible reminder or silent vibration that can be set to go off at regular intervals to keep you on task.

* Adjustable reminder intervals in the form of "Levels." Once you have mastered level 1, move on to level two. Reminders can be set to anywhere from every 30 seconds to 30 minutes.

* Three visual cues represent the remaining time:
-- A moving clock hand that rotates towards 0.
-- A horizontal progress bar that moves towards the end.
-- A large, easy to read digital display.


*This is a free app.  All content and features are available at no charge, and without advertising.

*The app does not collect or transmit any information about the user.  (Your settings for the app are stored on your phone.)

recentChanges:
v.3.5 bug-fixes, notifications, and run-in-background tweaks.
v.3.4 by popular demand: DARK MODE!
v.3.3 The "I'm On It!" ADHD timer is now free with NO ADS.
comments: ESSENTIAL for those with ADHD. The visualizer is reliable and useful; I use almost daily now.
At last, a clear timer that I can set and use. No distractions that would divert me from focusing on one thing at a time.

It works really well for reminding me to stay on task and the sound grabs my attention but I need to feel a vibration I can't really have the bell going off in class. If that can be fixed I'll give it the fifth star.

I love this idea and how helpful it can be, but what I appreciate most is the developer who is honest, takes feedback well, is improving himself and his application and doing it all at no cost to users. One feature I think you should add is an option to pay for the app if we like it. I've seen other free apps that have a "pay what you want here" link. Whether it's for fun money or pays for classes I like supporting people who create things like this that don't collect data and are ad free.

I definitely like the idea of this app. But when it takes less than ten continuous minutes of a countdown for the reminders to lose sync with the clock, it doesn't fit my needs well. Is the visual clock ticking faster than the invisible clock governing the reminders? Is either governed by actual time (I got so distracted I forgot to check)? If you set the reminders to ring every minute and start with an even timer, it should ring on the minute, not at 56 seconds into the next minute.

title: Twee Creator
description:
Twee creator lets you create what you can imagine. Write whatever you want or be whoever you want. Now turn your imagined story into reality. Choose any username, add any number of likes or add any number of comments without any limits.

You can use these realistic posts to prank your friends or creating memes out of them. Choose different emojis styles too, whatever customization you want is already there.

Want to show a poll, add a real poll to the posts.

Don't want to type the same username repeatedly. Save users in the user list and use them later everywhere with ease. Verify a user or make it private, it's up to you.

Save a post to edit it later, or save it as an image for sharing on your favorite social networks.

-------------------------------------------------------------
Key Features

 Light, Dim and Dark themes.
 User Profiles
 Different emoji styles 
 Polls 
 Quote 
 Saving posts 
 Add Images 
 Add Videos 


Any suggestions are most welcome, for any suggestions or feedback write us at thesoonya@gmail.com

title: ColorNote Notepad Notes
description:
ColorNote¬Æ is a simple and awesome notepad app. It gives you a quick and simple notepad editing experience when you write notes, memos, e-mails, messages, shopping lists and to-do lists. Taking notes with ColorNote¬Æ Notepad is easier than any other notepad or memo pad app.

* Notice *
- If you cannot find the widget, then please read the FAQ below.
- When you're finished using the notepad, an automatic save command preserves your individual note.

* Product Description *
ColorNote¬Æ features two basic note taking formats, a lined-paper styled text option, and a checklist option. Add as many as you want to your master list, which appears on the app's home screen each time the program opens. This list may be viewed in traditional ascending order, in grid format, or by note color.

- Taking a Note -
Serving as a simple word processing program, the text option allows for as many characters as you're willing to type. Once saved, you can edit, share, set a reminder, or check off or delete the note through your device's menu button. When checking off a text note, the app places a slash through the list's title, and this will be displayed on the main menu.

- Making To-do List or Shopping List -
In the checklist mode, you can add as many items as you'd like and arrange their order with drag buttons activated in the edit mode. After the list is finished and saved, you may check or uncheck each line on your list with a quick tap, which will toggle a line slash. If all items have been checked, then the list's title is slashed as well.


* Features *
- Organize notes by color (color notebook)
- Sticky note memo widget (Put your notes on your home screen)
- Checklist notes for To do list & Shopping list. (Quick and simple list maker)
- Checklist notes to get things done (GTD)
- Organize your schedule by note in calendar
- Write a diary and journal in calendar
- Password Lock note : Protect your notes with passcode
- Secured backup notes to SD storage
- Supports online back up and sync. You can sync notes between phone and tablet.
- Reminder notes on status bar
- List/Grid View
- Search notes
- Notepad supports ColorDict Add-on
- Powerful task reminder : Time Alarm, All day, Repetition.(lunar calendar)
- Quick memo / notes
- Wiki note link : [[Title]]
- Share notes via SMS, e-mail or Twitter

* Online backup and sync cloud service *
- Notes will be encrypted before uploading notes by using the AES standard, which is the same encryption standard used by banks to secure customer data.
- It does not send any of your notes to the server without you signing in.
- Sign-in with Google or Facebook.

* Permissions *
- Internet Access: For online backup & sync notes
- Storage :  For backup notes to the storage of the device
- Prevent phone from sleeping, control vibrator, automatically start at boot: For reminder notes

* FAQ *
Q: How do you put a sticky note widget on the home screen?
A: Go to the home screen and hold down your finger on an empty space and choose widget, Color Note will then be desplayed so you can stick on the page. 

Q: Why don't the widget, the alarm and notes remider functions work?
A: If the app is installed on the SD card, your widget, reminder, etc. will not work properly because Android doesn't support these features when installed on an SD card! If you have already moved the app to an SD card, but want those features, then you have to move the app back on the device and reboot your phone.

Settings - Applications - Manage Applications - Color Note - Move to Device

Q: Where are backed up notes data on the SD card?
A: '/data/colornote' or '/Android/data/com.socialnmobile.dictapps.notepad.color.note/files' on SD card 

Q: I forgot my master password. How can I change it?
A: Menu ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Master Password ‚Üí Menu Button ‚Üí Clear Password. You will lose your current locked notes when you clear the password!

Q: How can I create todo list note?
A: New - Select checklist note - Put items - Save. Tap an item to strikethrough.

comments: Used to be my absolute fave note app for years.Recommended it to loads of people. Sadly, they've recently made some change to the app and it no longer works on PC. I loved being able to sync across my phone and PC, keep track of lists, type out long blog posts/etc on my PC to copy and paste on my phone (save my thumbs!). But the loss of functionality on my PC is just making the app so much less of my go-to. I'll be trying to find something to replace it that does have PC sync options. But I have years of notes and lists on this app that I'll either lose or have to manually copy and paste elsewhere. Super disappointing. If all you have is Android devices, I guess it's probably still a decent app, but if you want to sync across other things, you're out of luck.

This is a fast and efficient note program. I can quickly jot something down and it has reminders. I use it to keep copies of often used text to copy & paste. You can color code notes like categories and sort them that way. I have pages of word docs that I store, so it holds a lot. You can also use it to make image notes, but I don't need to do that. It's cross platform so I can access my notes on my phone or tablet. Not so good with Windows. Overall It works great for me and recommend it.

Notes does just what I want/need w/o the bells and whistles. If you simple need notes that "stick around" it is far superior to a wall full of sticky notes (way old school). I will admit, it is a cross over for those of us that went through figuring out how best to keep track of notes/tasks. For you more modern guys that can keep it all in memory, it is simply redundant. üòâ

I've used it for a long time, but there are some things that I wish could be done with it. For example, making a gridded list. Similar to excel, but more straight forward to use. So that specific information about stuff could easily compared to one another without needing to go to another note. I prefer using digital notepads over real ones, but if you want to do literally anything besides type words, this one can't do it.

I use this app daily for things like grocery lists and household tasks. Since I don't have much free memory on my cell phone I love that this app can be stored on a SD card. I enjoy customizing the looks of my lists and this app lets me choose the colors of my lists. I just wish hot pink or fuschia was a color option. It would be awesome if there were different color options with images. For example, there could be a space image color theme.

title: Notion - Notes, Tasks, Wikis
description:
Notion is a new editor that blends notes, tasks, wikis in one app.


DRAG, DROP, EDIT
Use drag & drop and Force Touch to arrange any content. Great for prioritizing lists and to-dos.

RICH MEDIA
Supports images, to-dos, bookmarks, code snippets and 20+ block types.

SYNC WITH MAC, WINDOWS, AND BROWSER
Download the companion browser and desktop apps. Notion keeps everything in sync.

OFFLINE
Pages you visit online are downloaded for access on the go.

COLLABORATE IN REAL-TIME
Share your pages, and edit together at the same time, @mention, and comments.

FOLDERLESS ORGANIZATION
Organize your content using nested pages. Say goodbye to messy folders.

To download the companion desktop app, please visit:
https://www.notion.so/desktop

comments: Desktop version is good. Can't say the same about Android version. It's sooo slow. Otherwise same functionality as desktop. But still thanks for the app, notion is the best. Android app is only useful if you use desktop version, and need something to quickly check your stuff. Not suitable for anyone who wants to use it as standalone app.

it was going great at first, but today changed my mind. yes i still love the app, it is very useful and i wont uninstall it. today, a few hours ago, notion stopped working for me, as soon as i want to open the app, it takes a long time to open the app. it still isnt working and i hope it starts working again :(

I love using this app for my personal notetaking and planning. I used the desktop version most of the time though. One problem that I'm currently facing is the text formatting bar not showing when I have my bluetooth keyboard connected, even though the new formatting toolbar for android tablet is added, I still can't use it because of this.

I really like it but it would have been perfect if there was an option to private the templates. Even if ther are no group members. Something like a pin code to access a certain page would be nice. I would love to use this for some personal space but im afraid someone might log in into my pc and might see my jounaling which they can access easily even if it is closed so i kindly request you to add password or pin option to this application. Thank you very much

Can't open links because "there's no app to open [link]". Have to click enter twice to go to the next line. Literally my only two uses for the app, quickly writing notes in multiple lines and opening links are impossible. I'll change the rating once those things will work properly. Also: why's the widget color based on the mode of the entire phone? I'd like to keep my phone in dark mode but still have the widget in light mode for aesthetic purposes

title: Google Sheets
description:
Create, edit, and collaborate on spreadsheets from your Android phone or tablet with the Google Sheets app. With Sheets, you can:

- Create new spreadsheets or edit existing files
- Share spreadsheets and collaborate in the same spreadsheet at the same time.
- Work anywhere, anytime - even offline
- Add and respond to comments
- Format cells, enter or sort data, view charts, insert formulas, use find/replace, and more
- Never worry about losing your work ‚Äì everything is saved automatically as you type
- Quickly get insights, insert charts, and apply formatting with smart suggestions
- Open, edit, and save Excel files.

Google Sheets is part of Google Workspace: where teams of any size can chat, create, and collaborate.

Google Workspace subscribers have access to additional Google Sheets features, including:
- Easily add collaborators to projects, see changes as they occur, receive notifications for edits that happen while you‚Äôre away, and chat with colleagues in the same spreadsheet. All changes are automatically saved as you make them. And with offline access, you can create, view, and edit files wherever and whenever
- Get insights fast, powered by Google AI
- Work seamlessly across Sheets and Excel
- Maintain control with enterprise-grade security
- Analyze data from other business-critical tools
- Build custom solutions

Learn more about Google Workspace: https://workspace.google.com/products/sheets/

recentChanges: * Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: HOT MESS!!! 1. Download any xlsx file from G Drive and it'll become "view only" -- which means saving changes will generate a new file. The only upside: new file is smaller. BUT this is insane; all this just to encourage you to ditch xlsx format and use Sheets instead! 2. What's also insane is Google Sheets will download as PDF!!! I discovered all this garbage when I just wanted a file available offline cuz Google Drive was slow sometimes.

None of the office related apps of Google - neither Sheets, nor Docs and Slides have been working reliably in the past year and a half. I am cannot open my own documents, thought I see a preview of them in the Drive. I am asked to sign into my account, but then I get an error that I am already signed in. It is a real shame that a company like Google can't fix its apps for years even though there were dozens of updates in that time.

Trash. You can't even edit text in a cell without having to use the "formula" bar... Which when using the app is ridiculous, you can't barely read what your entering or edit what's in the cell. Trying to insert a paragraph is non existent... It's 2021, there's no excuse.

Most recent version doesn't interact with Google Drive - only shows top level folders and then becomes unresponsive, having to be killed. This *doesn't* happen with Documents and Sheets, which still work perfectly normally with Drive-based documents. As a Pixel Tablet and Drive are my remote working tools, I can't currently work remotely on any spreadsheets unless I download and upload them, missing out on the integrated collaboration features.

Works great for me! Dont know why people talk this app down. I keep it simple as a budget spreadsheet. Maybe their issues are related to their phone systems and complex use??? I love it in my application. Period.

This app is useless half of the documents I have saved on my device would not show up in the app. This app can't even perform the basic functions it's meant to.... Print documents

Used to be fine, now it is saying there's an error (exclamation mark in corner) everytime I try to add something to the list to print. The app keeps getting worse as time goes by. At one point it worked perfectly.

Despite having other cloudprint options, including laser and ink at home, I find Wepa extremely useful, especially for last minute tasks. Wepa has saved my butt more than once. It is great when you have ink intensive color tasks as you can save your supplies and get high quality results.

title: Internet Archive org app
description:
The Internet Archive is an American digital library with the stated mission of "universal access to all knowledge". It provides free public access to collections of digitized materials, including websites, software applications/games, music, movies/videos, moving images, and millions of books. In addition to its archiving function, the Archive is an activist organization, advocating a free and open Internet. As of April 2021, the Internet Archive holds over 30 million books and texts, 8.9 million movies, videos and TV shows, 649,000 software programs, 13,225,000 audio files, 3.8 million images, and 580 billion web pages in the Wayback Machine.

The Internet Archive allows the public to upload and download digital material to its data cluster, but the bulk of its data is collected automatically by its web crawlers, which work to preserve as much of the public web as possible. Its web archive, the Wayback Machine, contains hundreds of billions of web captures. The Archive also oversees one of the world's largest book digitization projects

comments: This app is really useful, and it controls me in the use of some apps, like Facebook or YouTube. It makes it easier because of there are no ads in there. Thank you for the developer of this app, to use my phone for a short amount of time, and I'm already aware of how much time I use my phone when I downloaded and used this app.

It really helps to improve my daily mobile usage and to keep a track on apps that I have to make a limit on. It's comparison feature is a plus to this app as it make me realise that I am wasting my time more than average people on internet on some apps that I can use in other things. It hepls me improve my productivity but I think if there will be a feature of setting particular time slots for using apps than it will help me more. Overall I like this a lot.

I've found that when the display of the apps and the amount of time you used it is on "Grid" List Style, it tends to cause a bit of lag or slowness to show the app icon, the name of the app, and the time usage. This also happens when it's on "Linear" List Style mode, albeit a bit quicker, but it is still slow nevertheless. Please fix this bug. Thanks!

It really helps keep everything in check and order. It provide factual information about your usage and so on. The limits for the day are really useful. Ir would be better if you can choose to just do it in certain days though. Like have it less strict on a weekend and more strict on a weekday. Overall it's an amazing and good app. I would recommend it for anyone looking for this sort of thing.

This app DOES NOT work. I never leave reviews but I'm beyond frustrated! The app constantly tells me focus mode is on (and then blocks me) when it shouldn't be on, lets me go on apps I've blocked, etc. I appreciate the fact that it's ad-free and that it works brilliantly for everyone else, so for that reason I gave it an extra star, but I couldn't possibly give a higher rating than two stars considering all the problems I've had... Such a shame considering how promising the app was!

title: ICA UAE Smart
description:
This application allows locals, residents, and visitors of the United Arab Emirates to benefit from the services of the Federal Authority for Identity and Citizenship like visas, residencies, payment of fines, printing the family book, renewal of passport for the citizens and many other services.
Summary of the services:
Apply for a residence entry permit for your family members. Apply for new residence for your family members. Renew residence permits for your family members Apply for cancelling resident for any sponsored under your sponsorship Apply for a visit visa for your relatives You can generate the travel status report and the list of people you sponsor . Check your residence and entry permit status Request a new or renew your UAE passport Print the family book for locals Extend your on arrival visa Pay fines of visas and residencies.

comments: 1. App request for an OTP to send to mobile in 1 minute but I have done so many attempts and no OTP has come. 2. In registration process, once I made mistake or missed detail and go back for editing I have to enter for OTP again 3. After registration and payment completed, the app will send you link to log-in. However, after I enter my email, it requires me to provide password. In the registration process, there was nowhere it requires me to register a password.

Wrost ever app. Not only this. All of UAE's online apps are disgrace. Third class services. No Matter how many times you entered valid details to register or change in id details. It always shows invalid data. What's the cause then to create this rubbish apps. If you can't provide better services. Then please remove them. And come with some better things.

Pretty awful experience. I have been trying to update my phone number for the past hour. It throws different errors and refuses to work properly. Has crashed on me multiple times. Expect better from Dubai government app. Usually they are very tech savy. Hope to have this app improve soon.

One of the most useful and resourceful app of UAE. However on arrival request few things as below are not working 1.gender 2. passport type 3. Mobile number country code dropdown menu is not working. I guess few backend work needs to be done. Wish you best of luck in helping UAE citizen and residents.

Literally the worst app, never works, always fails to register me, I tried it for different people, different phones, IDs, different everything .. still doesn't work... This should have been released on April 1st, cuz it's a joke

title: DroidPass Password Manager
description:
DroidPass password manager remembers all your passwords for you. This password manager saves all the passwords and secures behind the one master password that only you know. Advanced Encryption Standard (AES-256) in this password manager app keeps your passwords safe and secured.
 
DroidPass password manager stores information for websites ranging from medical to finances to simple gaming apps, so you can free your mind to tackle more important undertakings. Don't worry that you should remember your password again! This password manager gives access to your vault with a fingerprint login.
 
Password manager app DroidPass is a powerful password generator also that will ward off hackers and keep your treasured information safe. Strong passwords are generated by complex algorithms of this password app and stored in an encrypted database. You will only need one master pin to unlock it all and do as you wish.
 
This password manager instant sync and data backup will keep all your devices up-to-date with any password alterations.
 
Features of DroidPass password manager :
 
- Store passwords for all types of websites with Strong AES 256-bit encryption using your master pin. All your data is encrypted and decrypted using your master pin at the device level, not on the server.
 
-  Besides storing passwords, this password manager can be used to store personal information like notes, contacts, Wi-Fi, bank accounts, credit cards, etc.
 
-  DroidPass password saver will sync and backup the data across all your devices instantly.     Anything you save on one device is available on other devices instantly.
 
-  Access via one single master-pin. Everything you store in password manager DroidPass is protected by a master pin that only you know.
 
-  Password Generator for the creation of strong secure passwords.
 
-  Automatically lock the app after a set time or when the screen is turned off.
 
-  Prevent Screenshot to protect passwords.

-  Light and dark color themes are available.

-  Protect your passwords from data theft.
 
-  DroidPass password manager also works offline! You can use it without an internet connection too.
 
 
Get more with DroidPass password manager Pro:
-  Biometric Authentication - Unlock app with Fingerprint, Trusted Face Authentication.
-  Unlimited encrypted storage.
-  Unlimited number of entries.
-  Add Extra Fields.
-  Customize app themes.
-  Profile premium badge.
-  Automatically lock the app instantly when the screen is turned off.
-  Priority tech support.

 
Data in Droidpass Password Manager are completely encrypted. As The keys to decrypt and encrypt passwords are derived from your master pin It is your responsibility to protect the security of your Master pin. As we don't have any access to your master pin If you forget your master pin, we can't help you to recover it.


 
** If you need assistance, please email bddroidapp@gmail.com

comments: 5‚òÜ's.....I've installed, tried, and compared "MANY" password apps and this is the best one that I looked at! My cell is a Samsung Galaxy and I've experienced zero issues with compatibility! Try it and remember, you can uninstall it if you find one better....however, you won't!!

Very user friendly. Love that! Wish it had a Search Field instead of having to roll through and scan. Very happy with it anyway. July 3, 2021 Just renewed my subscription. I am sold on this program. So easy to use and understand. I had previously requested they add a SEARCH field, as I have many passwords. They added it with their last upgrade. Very easy to use and a time saver. I have recommended this program to several people, who are just as pleased as I am. THANK YOU!!

Cracking app. Does exactly what you need it to do, which surprisingly enough is to remember all your passwords!! Comes with an easy to use password generator which can be altered to be as long/short/ complicated as you need. Also for good measure you can add credit card details, bank account numbers, secure contact details and notes. Free version was handy if I remember correctly, but I paid for the full version and have never been disappointed. Top recommendation from me, buy it now!!

Be careful these people will bill you automatically even if you don't sign up.. today I just got a notification I am still under free but they billed my account for $12. Please refund my money. I'm still using the FREE account.. I cannot cancel because I do not have a subscription.. My account says FREE..
It has been great fora couple years now. I used to write my passwords in a little book, not it's easily accessible through DroidPass. Makes my life much easier and passwords are secure

comments: I had no issues for almost the 4 years I had a subscription for VirtualShield for until now. It doesn't work at all now and I can't even log in to the website or app at all to unsubscribe from their awful service. I switched to NordVPN a bit ago because their VPN actually functions and VirtualShield automatically disconnects all the time for no reason at all, even if I never disconnected from it. My advice? Go subscribe to literally any other VPN service that isn't VirtualShield.

So far the only problem I had was when I installed Avast adblocker, which hijacked my PC security and shut Virtualshield off. I uninstalled it and got help from Pearl in VS customer service to resolve the situation in a matter of minutes. Hopefully, it will stay connected now that I am watching it closer.

Not a reliable VPN app. The app will disconnect from the network after a while and you will think that you're browsing privately when such is not the case. I can't believe they haven't updated their app since March of last year.

I pay monthly fee been giving me problems dropping me then when I reconnect it just sits there but does not connect. I have just about enough with this unstable protection. If I keep having these problems im not paying for an unstable connection. Fix or im leaving. Pissed off customer

Dishonest billing right from sign up. I was going to get one month of family plan with 30 day trial and was offered 2 months free if I paid today. I assumed that ment pay one month today but they tried to bill me over 300.00. Thank God Capital One sent me an alert 1st.

recentChanges: Yoimiya and Sayu are here!
comments: Good app. Well presented information, generally accurate builds, nice themes and tools for the game. I like it. Could use some polishing with the grid layout of the characters though: they're staggered, the top of their box is less rounded than the bottom, the resolution of character portraits is inconsistent, the character image background is stretched and distorted, and there are white bars at the bottom of some characters. Aside from that though, I really enjoy using the app.

This app is overall pretty great! It's informative, and in my opinion makes the genshin experience better and more organized. The only real issue i can see is the graphics which look squashed/stretched at times. A cool thing that would improve the app is recognition of a screenshot of the genshin inventory to automatically log, as logging the inventory every day can get kinda tiring. Keep it up, guys. Great app. :)

I've been using this app for months now and till now it's still my favorite place to check if I'm building my characters right. I love how neat everything is and how there is a calculator for the things we would need to bring a character to a certain lvl. This app is amazing and continues to be every update :))

Amazing! Very helpful. I love the design of the app too. It offers very detailed character builds (i have trouble with that) and can calculate how many materials you need for a character/weapon. I recommend it to everyone

WOW! This app is so helpful! There's literally everything you need! I've always had problem with building my characters, but with this app I understand it better! I can compare weapons and artifacts... Awesome! Also, you can see which materials you can get on a certain day! Helps a lot, too. I recommend this app to every person who plays Genshin Impact! Great job, team! ‚ú®

title: Construction Calculator Free
description:
Construction Calc is a free calculator application designed by, and for, construction workers, carpenters, engineers or anyone else who works with measurements in feet and inches or in metric.  C-Calc is a full function calculator that works as a standard calculator but more importantly allows you to work in feet, inches, and fractional inches and meters, centimeters, and millimeters.  Features include;

- add, subtract, multiply, divide, power, root, and more with measurements in feet, inches, and fractional inches

- use the scaling feature to quickly and easily scale drawings

- reuse any entered or calculated value from the history list

- automatically round results to a user defined precision (ie. sixteenths)

- reduce fractions and fractional inches to their lowest common denominator

- 50 memory locations featuring add, subtract, set, recall, and clear

- split screen shows decimal value, feet/inch value, memory, and scaling all at once in large easy to read fonts

- calculate areas and volumes easily

- full instructions and video tutorial available at www.snappyappz.com

comments: A well deserved 5 stars, a high quality and well thought out app that saves the conversion headache and time, simply click on any variant mode of measure and it shows it in that mode, and also any other mode, and calculates and adds different measurements (eg) inches AND cm AND feet AND yards (plus more) all in one calculation. No need to standardise whilst typing - the app does all the work.

There are no instructions on how to enter a fraction. The help button lead to a YouTube video on the settings, which is nice. But zero explanation on how your buttons work, or how to do a basic conversion. BUT, on the plus side, I have hopes that your app can do what the other calculators can't seem to do: Be useful. I just want to convert between Imperial with fractions, to Metric with decimals. Like a simple measuring tape.

Since a few days ago, there's a vibration with every tap. This literally drives me crazy. I can't find a way to stop it. This app was great, 4-5 stars, now I might be getting rid of it. This will be 1 star and removed without correction by the end of the week

Video doesn't match the app - there's no MR (memory recall) button on the current app. I gave it 10 minutes of trial and error, and I can't figure out how to recall the memory, which makes it unfit for my use. Moving on!
Ads are so annoying and even if you disable this apps permission to use wifi and data, it still accesses it.

comments: Absolute Trash. - Save yourself some headaches and just use the web interface. I have had tons of problems connecting with this app and on many occasions, when I do, it has wiped out my internet connection. I used to be a huge fan of Netgear equipment. I am starting to lose confidence in the company as a whole and in their commitment to quality. Using the Rax 20 as a guest AP and for my IoT devices. Switched to ASUS for my private internal network.

I have to be as honest as possible here. The app is absolute trash. Constant freezing/ crashing on start up and when it doesn't freeze or crash its functions don't work properly 90% of the time. I'd have better luck beating my router with a coat hanger trying to edit its settings than using this app. Just log into the router manually and save yourself the headache of troubleshooting this garbage.

This is one of the worst apps ive ever used. It doesnt remember your passwords to log in, it doesnt correctly save your safety questions. It randomly forces you to log in despite remembering you, and will refuse your password no matter what. If you try to reset the password, it doesnt accept it. It forces a hard reset each time, and simply doesnt work. And dont even get me started on the bs security app it forces you to download. If you dont buy bitdefender, you cant access any website. At all.

Awful. The app crashes without fail every time it reaches the last step of my wifi router set up (verifying the phone's connection to the router's internet) I can't tell you how many times I've logged in, filled out my personalization options, waited for the verification process, only for it to inevitably crash the app. And this is the only way to set this router up? No wonder Netgear was on sale.

When I had a Motorola Z3, this app worked fine. I could control my guest wifi, check my speed and change settings. However, when I switched to Motorola one 5g, it almost never works. Whenever I try to log in, I get a message that my login attempt timed out and I should restart my phone. Restarting doesn't change anything, I still get the same message

title: The Clock: Alarm Clock & Timer
description:
Alarm Clock App with Timer, Stopwatch, Bedside Clock & World Clock 

Simple, Reliable, Precise

The Clock is a beautiful alarm clock with "extreme" functions. It includes features that prevent excessive snooze and get you out of bed. It also comes with a built-in timer, stopwatch, world clock and a stylish bedside clock. Combines all of the functionality you need into one simple, beautiful package. It is designed to create, edit and remove alarms in the easiest way. 

Timely and accurate
You can use it to wake up in the morning or to setup reminders for your tasks and ‚Äúto-do‚Äùs during the day. Set recurring alarms for repeating events. It‚Äôs an innovative solution for those who just can‚Äôt seem to get up on time, even with an alarm clock. 

 Gentle alarm with increasing volume (Alarm Fade-In)
üîäThe Clock offers an option to set alarmy volume increasing in a peaceful and progressive way to provide gentle wake-up experience (volume crescendo). You will be able to wake up gently from your dreams, in a peaceful and progressive way. 

You‚Äôll never oversleep or miss an appointment
Choose your favorite music or tunes for your wake up. Jump-start your brain by solving math problems to dismiss the alarm. Comes with a large snooze button to prevent you from accidentally pressing ‚Äòdismiss‚Äô. Wake up in time and never late for work.

Wake up to Spotify Music
Select your best track on Spotify and wake up to great music.

Set favorite tunes with online radio
Choose from many popular online radio stations, or add your own if your favorite isn‚Äôt already on the list.

Solve math problems
You get to choose the difficulty level: Easy, Medium, Hard, Very Hard.

Alarm Widget You can edit or remove alarms with just one touch. 

Nap Alarm Perfect for an afternoon siesta!

Perfect alarm clock for heavy sleepers 
Sleep if u can! Annoying alarm clock with loud alarm tones and vibration. Perfect solution for those sleepyheads. Wake up using only vibrations, with a choice between soft and intense. It will force you out of sleep.

Works better than other alarm clocks
It is flexible. You can set an exact alarm time or sleep goal. You can set as many timers as you want for activities like exercise, cooking, sports, games and more!

Timer The Clock has a Countdown Timer, both on app and as a widget on home screen. Use it for sports, fitness exercises, tabata, HIIT, games, in the kitchen, gym or wherever you need it.

Stopwatch Simple and reliable stopwatch to keep track of split/lap time and total time down to 1/100 of a second. Feature for games, sporting events, work, science experiments, etc. The results can be shared via any application such as SMS, e-mail or Whatsapp or recorded on your notepad. 

World Clock
Keep track of time around the world using the World Clock.

Widgets
Alarm Widget, Analog Clock, Digital Clock, Calendar, World Clock Widgets. One can decorate her/his home screen with those beautiful widgets. 

Bedside Clock Turn your device into a gorgeous bedside clock. Our alarm app features a night clock with gorgeous themes (in nightstand mode). You can set as a screen saver.

Themes Unique themes & custom background support (dark & light).

Compatible with Android 11 and 12
- Use voice commands to set alarm and timers (Google Assistant)
- Use strobe light for alarms
- üìÖ Set date for alarms

** Important Note: your phone must be on for the alarm to work **

comments: This app pushes me to purchase the paid version all the time. The last time it did this, was at night. THE ADVERTISEMENT PREVENTED THE ALARM FROM SOUNDING. I love this app, helps me to be more organized. I would like to suggest , make the font a slightly larger in size.
It annoyingly keeps asking me to give it five stars on Google play, that's why I'm giving it 3 stars. Otherwise, it's a great app.

title: UID
description:
UID, a secure digital identity platform

UID is an application that allows you to login and register on websites without having a username and password. UID also has an electronic documents wallet that to stores you‚Äôre ID cards and lets you share it with the websites of the electronic service providers you wish.

By installing the UID app, registering on sites and filling forms becomes short & easy while giving you the option of accessing your identification documents anytime and anywhere.

Login with UID:

- Run the UID app and fill the required fields to complete your profile.

- A QR code will be displayed on the partner‚Äôs websites, just scan it with the UID app.

- Allow the partner access to your information and revoke it any time you want.

From now on, you need only to scan a QR code to login to your account on the UID partner‚Äôs website. 


Advantages of using UID:

- Login to websites and apps with just a scan.

- Faster, shorter & easier signing and registering.

- No need for filling registration forms to receive online services.

- No need for physical copies to receive services anymore.

- Possible to store and maintain ID cards.

-  Access your documents anytime, anywhere.

title: Smart Remote Control for Samsung TV
description:
SamRemote is a virtual remote control that lets you control your Samsung TV. The application is completely free.

To use the Samsung remote control, you must have your mobile is on the same wifi network as your TV and you accept the message that appears on your TV. Because the application runs through the wireless network, it is not necessary to be close to the TV.

If by mistake you have refused the confirmation message of your TV ( Message for establishing communication ), it is possible to change your selection by going to :

/ Menu / Network / AllShare Settings

In addition to a careful representation of the remote control, you can use all the functionality of the real remote.

Samsung remote control works with the following tv:

- Series C (2010) with internet
- Series D (2011) with All Share
- E Series (2012) with All Share
- Series F (2013) with All Share
- Series K-L-M-N (2016/2017/2018)

DISCLAIMER
SamRemote is neither an official Samsung product nor are we affiliated with the Samsung Electronics company.

title: Sioux Center
description:
Access all you need in Sioux Center with the official Sioux Center app. With features like a Community Calendar, All Seasons Center and Recreation Information, Report a Concern, Utility Payments and Account Information, City Contacts, and personalized notifications, you'll find it easier than ever to stay connected in Sioux Center with just a few taps on your mobile device. 
The City & Government, All Seasons Center, Business Directory, Parks & Trails, and Recreation sections allow you to have all the important contact and destination information in your city with the click of a button. Find parks, facilities, and points-of-interest, along with hours, information, phone numbers, maps, trash and recycling information, and directions. 

Stay informed on the latest happenings and upcoming events with Notifications, Social Media feeds, and News. 

Report issues within your city like potholes or dark street lights straight from the app and keep track of your utility usage each month. 

Download Sioux Center‚Äôs app and start engaging with all different aspects of your community in one place!

title: üî•SMS Backup, Print & Restore -Export PDF,HTML,CSV
description:
Backup, Convert, Exports your SMS/MMS text messages to PDF,  CSV, JPG, HTML or TXT and then restore them back to your device, print, or share them

A MUST HAVE FOR EVERY SMARTPHONE!!!

Previously called "SMS Share 2"

With  "SMS Backup, Print & Restore" you can create backups of your SMS, MMS, and RCS logs and then share it using Email, Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, and every other sharing method your phone provides. then you can use the files for storing in your pc or backup to the cloud. later you can use these files to restore your messages or print them

So, What can you do with "SMS Backup, Print & Restore":
‚úâÔ∏è Backup & Restore your messages - just send your messages to your email or leave the files on your device - you can restore all the messages on the same device if they desire or on another device 
‚úâÔ∏è Print your SMS and MMS Backups! - Print directly from your phone or share the backup to your email, open on the desktop, and print.


Special Features:
‚≠ê Backup and restores both text and multimedia messages
‚≠ê Supports RCS and "Advanced Messaging" (Not on all devices)
‚≠ê Supports Emojis.
‚≠ê Previews PDF and TXT files
‚≠ê Supports contacts sharing - vCard, xCard, jCard, and hCard
‚≠ê Supports calendar events sharing - vCal (Events, Todos, Journal)

Pro Version
"SMS Backup & Restore", even though it performs a simple task, is a major project to develop and maintain. Because there are so many devices and so many different apps for texting, it requires constant attention, development, and improvements. in order to keep it moving, there is a symbolic fee for unlocking all the features.  
The free version allows you to share 6 messages each time and includes ads. It is a bit more complex but it actually allows the full functionality, especially for shorter conversions. If you upgrade to pro, you can send all the messages in one go. 

Personal note:
I'm very grateful to know that the app is serving many of you in important cases like getting justice or saving important messages of your families. I do the best I can to remember this and improve the app as much as I can with the intention to help in needed times and not just to treat it as a business. If you are in urgent need of the app, yet can not afford it at the moment, please contact me.

Converting And Exporting SMS - Formats:
"SMS Backup, Print & Restore" will convert your SMS text messages to PDF, CSV, HTML, or JPG formats, export the conversations to files, and save them to your device storage. 
It will use these files as attachments and share them via different sharing apps. the files are all restorable, meaning you can retrieve your texting data back to the device.

PDF File:
The best option for printing SMS text messages and media (MMS/RCS messages). 
Can be opened by Adobe Reader.
"SMS Backup, Restore & Print" will create beautifully designed PDF files with graphics and text.
It supports SMS text messages, as well as MMS multimedia messages (photos and links) 

HTML File:
A compact file - can be open via the web browser. Good for backup or for printing long conversations or in case the PDF option does not work properly.

CSV File:
Best for data manipulations and analysis.
Opens with Excel or Google Sheets. 
Converts your SMS conversations to well-organized datasheets.

Image Files:
Best for sharing your SMS/MMS conversations with friends (like Facebook, WhatsApp, twitter ens').
Supports .jpg .png and .webp photo file formats
It supports SMS text messages, as well as MMS/RCS multimedia messages

Fully customizable:
Allows you to tweak, color, and customize the conversations so you get the exact results you were looking for.


The "SMS Backup & Restore" app has a slick UI, integrated with animations, which makes the app easy and simple to use.

Hope you enjoy and find the app useful :)

recentChanges: The app is even faster and smoother. It will work well in both short and long conversations. If you encounter an issue, please contact the support
comments: Great backup and restoration app. With the increasing use of text messages in the business world these days and considering legal and billing purposes, it would be foolish to not have a messaging backup app. The paid version offers a variety of features which is more than fair for its price.

Glad that I bought this app! I always have the trouble of losing my text messages whenever I format my phone, and now with the help of this app, I'll always have a copy of messages to restore in the future. Definitely did not mind taking the leap to get the premium version.

Effortless and secure way to backup your text messages. You set it up once and its smooth sailing after that. I only backup important messages so there are yet quite a few features that I haven't tried, but I can say without a doubt that this app always delivers good results!

This app works so well and I have never had any complaints about it. The ads in the free version aren't intrusive and once you go premium you will much more features as well, you can select a specific text conversation and email it as a PDF or a CSV file. Works great!

If you are looking to get an app to perfectly backup your messages, you can go for this one without a doubt. After trying several other apps which partially work and start lagging with big conversation threads and multimedia messages, this is by far the best one and is true to what it says it can do!

title: Rocketbook
description:
The Rocketbook app instantly sends your Rocketbook pages and whiteboards enhanced with Beacons to your favorite cloud services. Access and share them anytime, anywhere!

The app has a unique seven-symbol shortcut system that gets your auto-cropped and high quality scans into the cloud faster than any other scanning app. Using our Handwriting Recognition (OCR) features, you can search your handwriting inside the app, use your handwritten text as the filename, and get a full-page transcription via email.

The Rocketbook app is designed to work with Rocketbook products including the:
- Core (endlessly reusable notebook)
- Mini (pocket sized version of the Core)
- Wave (microwave-to-erase notebook)
- Color (reusable kid's coloring book)
- Whiteboards enhanced with Rocketbook Beacons (adjustable whiteboard attachments)
- One (single use notebook)

Enjoy the pleasure of writing and the efficiency, organization, and shareability of digitization. Write freely and use our shortcut system to send your scans as PDFs or JPEGs to specific locations in Google Drive, Dropbox, Trello, Evernote, Box, OneDrive, OneNote, Slack, Google Photos, and Email.

For more information about our reusable notebooks, please visit getrocketbook.com. Free Rocketbook PDFs and customizable pages can be found at start.getrocketbook.com.

recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes and performance improvements.

By the way, App Store reviews are really helpful for us. If you think Rocketbook is great, would you mind taking a moment to write a nice review? If you have any feedback, please contact us at feedback@getrocketbook.com. Thanks!
comments: Update Aug 3-The synch issue has been resolved. Would still like the ability to import scans from my old device/cloud. I don't like that you cannot import scans to the app when you get a new device. I get that it's cloud based, and I like that when I'm on my laptop. But it's a pain on a phone to have to log into another app, look for the folder, etc etc. Would be much better if they were handy in the Rocket app. 2 clicks away.

Scans won't send to email accounts despite trying every setting combo (auto send on/off, OCR on/off, different file types etc). Support just suggest "check your spam folders" which Ive done, so no help at all. Also, if you sign out of the app and then back in it loses all your saved destination info so you have to enter it again! Im thinking of returning my rocketbook fusion as its practically useless with the app in this state.

Exactly what I was looking for! I have used multiple apps on multiple platforms. This one is perfect. It has much more capability than I have yet to use, however, I am relieved to finally find the one that I can use consistently and easily!

Able to send scan through email only about once in ten tries. Various email servers tried, no difference. They are not in junk or spam folders either. Goes to Dropbox or Google pics better. Android app.
- can't edit scans - very poor OCR (only English is recognised) - directories, tags, tabs -- anything that would allow you to group scans is missing - smart lists - totally useless feature

title: HP Print Service Plugin
description:
The HP Print Service Plugin is the only print driver that you'll need to easily print documents, emails and pictures from print-supported applications to a variety of HP Printers, including HP OfficeJet, HP LaserJet, HP DesignJet, HP Photosmart, HP DeskJet and HP Envy.

You can discover and print to HP printers that are:
‚Ä¢ Connected to the same network as your mobile device
‚Ä¢ Broadcasting a Wi-Fi Direct network
‚Ä¢ Connected to the mobile device via a USB On-the-Go cable

Just select Print or Share to PSP when you need to print. Just tap the menu button to reveal the print option. Location of menu button may vary depending on your model of Android‚Ñ¢ device. 

The HP Print Service Plugin simplifies printing on your Android‚Ñ¢ Lollipop‚Ñ¢ (v5.0) and newer devices. If you use Android 6 (Marshmallow) or earlier, you might need to enable the HP Print Service Plugin in your device's settings

For more information on using the HP Print Service Plugin or details on supported HP Printers, go to:
https://support.hp.com/us-en/document/c04024231/?openCLC=true

For more information on Mobile Printing in general, go to:
https://www.hp.com/go/mobileprinting

comments: Ever since the plug in was introduced my devices do not print right. I had everything up and running smoothly and ever since I downloaded the Plug-In app I have two of my printer on all my devices and sometimes I simply cannot get things to print anymore. I really wish you would try again and get an app that is all inclusive and doesn't need a separate plug in in order to continue working because for whatever reason it seems to cause confusion between devices and the actual printer.

It seems to work fine gives me an error message til it 'wakes up". I'm still getting used to it but its sure nice to print from my phone so easily. updating review to 5 stars. excellent service and user interface, like it v much Another edit. I can fax without hooking up to a phone line, this app just keeps getting better and better!! I really love this app. While occasionally it can be a chore to set up, once it's up and running it's phenomenal. Highly recommend it.

I never used to be able to print from my phone using this app however we used to have an old WiFi printer. Now we bought a new printer the app works really well with the same phone - it's a shame that my HP laptop doesn't like printing as I have to reboot to the printer every time I want to print. So it's just easier using this app I'm my phone now anyway.

Works after several tries keeps asking for me to keep signing in wish it would just print when I want it to what happened to just clicking print and it printing now they want access to all the information about the stuff your printing as well. It's too much, simplify things please one button I push print and no more questions unless it's about printing, and you don't need all my information about how I'm using my own printer I bought.

title: MinimaList - Simple To Do List
description:
MinimaList is a favored and featured todo list app, it is super simple yet super useful.
It's a simple to do list, a reminder, a checklist, a task manager that helps you to get things done.
here is some #useful features#:
- Intuitive lists: simple lists for complicate things
- Reminders: time and location based reminders 
- Pomodoro Timer: focus with amazing sounds 
- Shared lists: simplest way to share same list with others
- TouchID/FaceID: privacy is protected now
- Cloud Syncing: same lists for mobile devices
- Auto-snooze: you can set a reminder auto snooze three times ( you can change this in setting)
- Custom theme and ringtone: your notification sounds, your font, your theme color

title: Smart View
description:
Smart TV Cast is a Miracast app that standard for wireless connections from sending devices (such as laptops, tablets, or smartphones) to display receivers (such as TVs, monitors, or projectors). It can roughly be described as "HDMI over Wi-Fi", replacing the cable from the device to the display.

Cast App gives Smart Display on wireless TV cast. Mirror any Screen with Wireless tech & gives Live HD over WiFi & Internet.

Screen Mirroring App mirrors your complete screen, including photos, videos, apps, games, websites and documents.

Screen Mirroring for Smart TV that lets you mirror your screen to another device in your WiFi or remote over Internet Connection. You can also create a second screen on another device.

Smart View combines all benefits of most popular streaming and mirroring technologies in one App to give you endless options for screen sharing.

Smart View - Smart TV Connect to Phone is the most powerful app for mirroring and broadcasting your Android screen and audio in real time with high quality!

Features
‚Ä¢ Click on the ‚ÄúConnect‚Äù button on the bottom of the app TV Cast LG
‚Ä¢ Wait for a few seconds for the app to discover your TV/Dongle
‚Ä¢ Conduct effective classroom sessions by showing the mobile content on the TV, to all the students and Steps to Mirror to Smart TV
‚Ä¢ All your media in one place: music, photos, videos, movies, tv shows etc.
‚Ä¢ Its a simple easy to use and fast
‚Ä¢ Automatically enable Bluetooth and Wi-Fi - quickly connect a keyboard, mouse, and/or game controller
‚Ä¢ Dentify local files like video, audio, photo on your device and SD Card automatically
‚Ä¢ Neat & clean user interface to create a good experience
‚Ä¢ See the latest trailers and discover movies not currently available on Netflix, Hulu or Amazon Prime subscriptions
‚Ä¢ Cast to your TV Casting using Chromecast or Airplay support
‚Ä¢ Simple profile-based interface - easy to enable/disable different profiles for different types of displays like duet display
‚Ä¢ Quick Actions - quickly and easily run SecondScreen features without creating or editing profiles
‚Ä¢ Broadcasting to Twitch, Youtube (Youtube Gaming), Facebook Live, Ustream, and others
‚Ä¢ Easy to use for Samsung Smart TV Connect, Samsung Smart TV Connect to WiFi

Screen Mirroring of your smartphone on Smart TV. Mirror Smart View, Samsung Allshare, Allcast and more!
‚Ä¢ It can be any Smart TVs: Samsung, Sony, LG, Hisense, TCL, Vizio Smartcast, Xiaomi, Panasonic and so on;
‚Ä¢ Roku / Roku Stick / Roku TV;
‚Ä¢ Chromecast;
‚Ä¢ WebOS and Miracast;
‚Ä¢ Xbox, Xbox One and Xbox 360;
‚Ä¢ Fire TV and cast to Amazon Fire Stick;
‚Ä¢ Apple TV and Airplay;
‚Ä¢ Smart View and Allshare
‚Ä¢ All other DLNA receivers.

With Roku app you can enjoy videos, movies, sports and tv shows in full HD 1080p on your big TV screen. No cable, no laptop, no server, no complex setup, no additional hardware needed. Just use your Android device to tap and stream. Connecting your phone to a TV screen via Cast To TV app.

Smart View Vidio Cast for TV Mobile Connect and stay connect app To TV shows android device display to your smart tv. watch favorite shows or Sports on your smart tv screen by using Screen Mirroring For All TV. Screen Mirroring app mirrors your mobile display to larger screen without any lag.

Smart View Mirroring your mobile screen on your TV can be useful when you're showing off photos from a recent trip, playing a game or giving a demonstration. With this Screen Mirroring App, you'll be able to duplicate your Android phone's screen on TV Screen.

Video & TV Cast - Miracast Display on tv
Smart TV Mirroring : Display Phone Screen On TV

title: AdTranquility Spam Protection
description:
Our mission is to get rid of aggressive advertising forever.

Spam and annoying ads - they're a nuisance we've gotten used to. Why?

You may be used to feeling a lack of control, of not being able to do anything about the nonsense you're bombarded with every day.

Fighting against greedy, unethical, aggressive advertisers isn't an easy game.

But that's where AdTranquility comes in. We want to equip you with the power to say "NO" to misleading, annoying ads.

We want to help you create a distraction-free environment.

So that using your mobile, or browsing the internet is a tranquil and relaxing experience.

The question is - do you want to join our cause? Do you believe that together we can stop abusive advertisers and bring back the beauty of the internet?

==============

Our first proposal for you is the Spam Protection app.

If you're getting bombarded with tens, maybe even hundreds of "push notifications" every day (yes, those annoying messages telling you about how you won a new iPhone), we have the solution.

==> Simply follow these 3 steps:

1. Download the application
2. Follow the simple (one step, one-click) on-screen instructions
3. Click the big button, and clear your current notifications. You won't get any more!

We hope you enjoy using our app. Please, tell your friends about us if you think they'll find this app - or our mission - aligned with their needs!

The official, tailor-made PSG keyboard is just what you need to keep the red and blue flag flying high!
 
A smart, all-inclusive keyboard introducing astonishing features such as the PSG  look and feel, an extensive news feed bringing you the most accurate and up-to-date information about your beloved team,and much more. Plus, new and exciting features such as Emoji‚Äôs and many more coming up in the near future!

The PSG official keyboard allows you to enjoy all these special features: 
 
1. An automatic spelling and style checker, protecting you from embarrassing mistakes.
2. An extremely convenient layout, making commonly used keys more accessible than on other keyboards.
3.  Automatic word completion and correction, using a sophisticated algorithm that adapts suggestions to your vocabulary and style.
4. Next-word prediction that learns your vocabulary and style as you type.
5. A fantastic store which allows you to change your keyboard design from a large collection of themes and allows you to enjoy many features  and other cool stuff coming up in the future such as stickers!   

Your privacy is important to us, and we at PSG keyboard have chosen to undertake strict safeguards to protect your privacy. Please note we don't save any credit card information or passwords keep that in mind when you receive the notification from android regarding privacy. We also strive to meet and exceed industry standards.

title: Star Tracker : Night Sky Map and Stargazing Guide
description:
Star Tracker : Night Sky Map and Stargazing Guide is an application for space science stargazing, distinguishing and watching planets, heavenly bodies and stars continuously on the night sky map. Sky Walk is a hand-held planetarium for your Android gadget. Use it to distinguish stars, planets, nebulae and that's just the beginning. 

Features:
- Planetarium - 3D model of our Solar system
- 3D models of spacecraft & Space exploration 
- Astronomical calendar of celestial events
- Visual effects of 3D planetarium
- Space simulation 3D
- Wonderful panoramic photos of space objects 
- Astronomy news and current events in 'What's new' section

title: Pomodoro
description:
***** Instructions for dealing with background mode *****
   On certain devices, apps are not allowed to perform background functions from their own battery saver, such as Xiaomi's MIUI, Huawei's PowerGenie...
So please add the Pomodoro app to the "protected apps" list or the "allowed background" apps list.
> On popular devices it is found in "Battery Manager > Protected Apps"
> Or find your device details here: https://www.onceupon.group/wiki

*****There are six steps in the original technique*****
  1. Decide on the task to be done.
  2. Set the Pomodoro timer (traditionally to 25 minutes).
  3. Work on the task.
  4. End work when the timer rings and put a checkmark on a piece of paper.
  5. If you have fewer than four checkmarks, take a short break (3‚Äì5 minutes) and then return to step 2; otherwise continue to step 6.
  6. After four Pomodoros, take a longer break (15‚Äì30 minutes), reset your checkmark count to zero, then go to step 1.

Application developed by Linh Okita and co.

Application developed by Linh Okita and co.
summary: Pomodoro Technique is a time management method by Francesco Cirillo in the 1980s
