- Implement media type for Notification
- Enhance UI
comments: Beautiful design outside but not really user friendly inside at all. Actually feels buggy and unfinished. I can add a pomodoro type, but not edit it. When I go back it exit the app instead of, well, going back. Dark mode keeps switching back to the light mode. No timer in notifications. I tested few pomodoro apps and this one is very limited. Sorry, but it needs much more work. Sign of the times - focused on the looks only.

This is the best app I've found so far that can keep up with my work & studies. It's visually pleasing and I love the solar system-like illustrations hehe. I think this could be made even better with a few additions like : 1. Having the option to skip breaks (cuz some ppl work for long hours straight :/) 2. Switching to next timer Automatically 3. Having a to-do list or notes or a time planner of some sort This would make it an all-in-one app which would make a brilliant app! \^.^/

This is the best pomodoro app that I have used till date but I wish the notification tones can be changed. The moment I change it and go back to see the change, the 'cuckoo' option will be the one set. So is the case with the volume. And one thing that I would like to add is the deficit of a clock. A clock with the current colour scheme would just throw every other app out of competition

Does what it should, minus a bug. I will give 5 stars when they fix the bug I experience. I cannot turn off the cuckoo noise or change any of the alarm settings. Hitting apply and going back to settings show they dont change. Not very useful if you need to be in a public place. The sound also doesn't play in earphones, but in the phones speaker. This is due to the media type they play the sound as, not required, but it would be good to add this as a checkbox choice in the alarm settings too.

This app is very visually pleasing but the image on screen that looks like a clock actually isn't a clock and just spins around at random speeds. I'm a very visual person and need an app that will show me a visual representation of what time is left. Honestly don't understand what the point of the clock-esque image is, if anything it's distracting because it wonder what it's purpose is. Also very basic app, no settings. There are much better pomodoro apps out there.

title: Bublup
description:
Bublup is the easiest way to visually save, organize, and share any content, all in one place.

Save links, documents, notes, videos, photos, GIFs, music, and more in visual folders with customizable pictures, titles, and descriptions for at-a-glance navigation. Folders (and sub-folders) keep your information in one organized place, so you never have to worry about misplacing your important files and links. Share something as epic as a new business venture or as common as choosing a new couch with your friends, family, or co-workers. With Bublup, your information is laid out the way you want it, and seen by who you choose.  

Give SOS a new meaning. Save. Organize. Share. 

KEY FEATURES:

VISUALLY ORGANIZE EVERYTHING (WE MEAN EVERYTHING!):

‚Ä¢ Create an unlimited number of private or shared visual folders and subfolders.
‚Ä¢ Save any content and resource type side-by-side: links, notes, documents (PDFs, Word, Excel, Google Docs, etc.), photos, videos (.mp4, Quicktime, YouTube, Vimeo, etc.), emails, and more.
‚Ä¢ Navigate your content at a glance with images, titles, and descriptions.

GO BEYOND BASIC CLOUD STORAGE:

‚Ä¢ Easily organize saved web links and files in the same folder, so everything you need is always at your fingertips.
‚Ä¢ Share your folders with others and start a conversation with comments and reactions.
‚Ä¢ Discover fascinating new content related to what you save with ‚Äúbubbled up‚Äù suggestions.
‚Ä¢ Share your content easily with anyone via messaging, email, social media, etc.

ROLL UP YOUR CONTENT:

‚Ä¢ In just a few seconds, create beautiful web pages (‚Äúrolls‚Äù) from your saved content.
‚Ä¢ Customize rolls easily by choosing themes and layouts.
‚Ä¢ Brand your roll for professional use by customizing the URL and logo.

PLENTY OF STORAGE, TOTAL PRIVACY:

‚Ä¢ Bublup is a free app!
‚Ä¢ Bookmark an unlimited number of links and get 3 GB of private storage, with the ability to earn up to 12 GB of extra storage -- 1 GB for each person who joins Bublup via your group folder invitation or personal referral link.
‚Ä¢ Upload files as large as 3 GB for free.
‚Ä¢ Everything you save is kept private and secure. You decide what to share and with whom.

BUBLUP WORKS FOR YOU:

Use it for work to:

‚Ä¢ Create a portfolio of your creative work.
‚Ä¢ Share educational resources in an organized space.
‚Ä¢ Save & share large files with clients or colleagues.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with your team in a productive, private, and organized digital work space.

Use it in your personal life to:

‚Ä¢ Plan a trip.
‚Ä¢ Organize your favorite recipes.
‚Ä¢ Look for a new apartment.
‚Ä¢ Save family photos.

No matter what you‚Äôre interested in, you can save everything visually in Bublup and share it like a pro. Please contact us at support@bublup.com for assistance.

Get your stuff together. Get Bublup today.

comments: Love it... I use this app to keep my kids daily pass test vaccine records organized... and my daughter has access to her folders where I can having everything set up for her

Best app this year!! Love the ability to create different folders and even include your own notes on the recipes with your personal preferences... Very cool for recipes! I was using Keep Notes, but this is so much better. If you provide password protection for the folders, then Bublup will be the only app I use for note taking and organization.

Hi, using this have been great in saving important materials I like: recipes, dance videos, crafts, friends and family. It was going well and now it shows I'm "Temporarily Blocked." WHY? What is the problem? I ask that you please unblock me. I'm new at this and now its confusing. What to do?

I really do love this app. It's a MUCH better way to save (and share) content in a more visually organized, appealing & functional way than browser bookmarks/favs. Only 3 stars because it's still missing one VERY crucial feature: the ability to SAVE ITEMS TO MORE THAN ONE FOLDER AT A TIME. I save a TON of content that FREQUENTLY overlaps folder subjects. I must exit app & start over at square one EVERY time I want to save an item to an additional folder. My req for this feature was dismissed.

My favorite and most comprehensive note keeping app. It offers so much breadth in terms of how you save your media, yeah it's so simple! The interface, colors, effects are well thought out by the developers and work perfectly for someone like me who is ADHD. I need to see the functionality of an quickly app without having to listen to hours of tutorials just to learn the new folder system. Great App. I hope it sticks around because I've been raving about it too my friends

title: ha tunnel VPN
description:
Secure VPN is a lightning-fast app provide free VPN service. Not need any configuration, just simply click one button, you can access the Internet securely and anonymously.

Secure VPN encrypts your Internet connection so that third parties can‚Äôt track your online activity, making it more secure than a typical proxy, make your Internet's safety and security, especially when you using public free Wi-Fi.

We have built a global VPN network included America, Europe and Asia, and expand to more country soon. Most servers are free to use, you can click the flag and change server as any times as you want.

Why choose Secure VPN?
‚úÖ Large number of servers, high-speed bandwidth
‚úÖ Choose apps which using VPN (Android 5.0+ required)


Download Secure VPN, the world's fastest secure virtual private network, and enjoy it all!

If Secure VPN connect failed, don't worry, you can follow these steps to fix it:
1) Click the flag icon
2) Click the refresh button to check servers
3) Choose the fastest and most stable server to reconnect

Hoping you suggestion and good rating to keep it growing and make it better :-)


VPN related introduction

A virtual private network (VPN) extends a private network across a public network, and enables users to send and receive data across shared or public networks as if their computing devices were directly connected to the private network. Applications running across the VPN may therefore benefit from the functionality, security, and management of the private network.

Individual Internet users may secure their transactions with a VPN, to circumvent geo-restrictions and censorship, or to connect to proxy servers for the purpose of protecting personal identity and location. However, some Internet sites block access to known VPN technology to prevent the circumvention of their geo-restrictions.

VPNs cannot make online connections completely anonymous, but they can usually increase privacy and security. To prevent disclosure of private information, VPNs typically allow only authenticated remote access using tunneling protocols and encryption techniques.

Mobile virtual private networks are used in settings where an endpoint of the VPN is not fixed to a single IP address, but instead roams across various networks such as data networks from cellular carriers or between multiple Wi-Fi access points. Mobile VPNs have been widely used in public safety, where they give law enforcement officers access to mission-critical applications, such as computer-assisted dispatch and criminal databases, while they travel between different subnets of a mobile network.

comments: Haven't had much time to evaluate this app, but 1) The UI is impressive, 2) As is the support for importing photos, and 3) The list of features. However, the latter does NOT belong under the heading 'What's New'! I'm sure I'm not the only one who actually reads the 'What's New' section, which other Devs manage to use to communicate with (potential) users re new/enhanced features, issue/stability fixes, etc.

I really like the concept and idea behind this app. The one thing I don't like is the stop of my audio when I open the app while listening to music. This may because of the ads üòÖ. I do not mind the banner ads since they don't interfere with my doing but I don't like the pop ups. For better earning I think it's better to make an ad to unlock a certain feature. Like I want to make use a VIP template. Maybe I can unlock by watching an ad. If I want to use the template again I gotta unlock again.

I like this app better than the regular one, but this app you have to pay for items. It's not free as advertised. There are many things you can due for free, but most of everything else comes with a subscription. Which is $29.99 for life!! Not bad right??? Well everything I want to use like auto save, auto back up, and many other similar things all have to be done on a subscription. Which at this very moment today I can't pay for. Not today anyways. It does have some nice features!!

It's an ok app, although most of the features are only available for VIP members, & there are more ads than I'd prefer. Overall it's not horrible, but you might be able to find better, simpler note-apps out there ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: Stack: PDF Scanner by Google Area 120

Make organizing easy

Never miss a detail

Automatic Back Up

Stack transforms your scanned documents into high-quality PDFs.
Easily edit with crop, rotation, color enhancement, and correction.

Make organizing easy
Stack automatically names and organizes your documents into useful categories.

Never miss a detail
Stack finds and displays key details from your document (like ‚Äútotal amount due‚Äù). Copying information has never been easier.

Private and secure
Stack uses Google‚Äôs world-class security to protect your data. You can turn on fingerprint or face lock for extra peace of mind.

Automatic Back Up
Stack backs up all your documents to the Cloud. You can save a copy of your documents also to Google Drive.

Import existing PDFs
Import from camera, gallery or files. Your documents have a new home.

Free
Stack has no ads or in-app purchases. And no watermarks.

Share PDF documents
Share your scanned documents via email.

Document search
Stack‚Äôs OCR scanner allows you to search for text within your documents. You can always find what you need.

Made by Google
Built by Google‚Äôs in-house incubator ‚ÄúArea 120 by Google‚Äù, this app will show you why this is the best PDF scanner. Learn more at stack.area120.com.

Google LLC

345 Spear St Ste 400
San Francisco, CA 94105
recentChanges: Brand new app! Stack has just launched so please send us feedback on what can be improved.
comments: Very good app! I hope someday this can be used for official government ID. one little thing I just had trouble with is that it doesn't seem intuitive to move things between stacks. I added a document and it was in no stacks. I couldn't add it to one without downloading the PDF and sharing it to the app again, even though it already has a copy of it. minor thing but worth pointing out. I will still use this app heavily. I want to get copies of all my important documents in here.

I love everything Google; it's sync/accessibility/etc is a lifesaver. I would love a scanner app that also doubles as an organizer. While this app is off to a good start in that direction, it's still lacking features that prevent me from fully commiting to using it at the moment. The concept of organizing scanned items into folders is a huge asset for this app! However, the app NEEDS to allow the user to be able to sort said items by name/date. The sooner this function arrives, the better!!

Simple, easy to use and intuitive. Automatic backup to Drive is especially helpful. One of my favorite features is the ability to save a document to more than one stack. Unfortunately it looks like stack selection can only be made when creating a new document. I don't see an option to update which stack(s) the document is linked to after initial creation. Great job!

This app is great! One major bug that keeps it from being 5-star is that the adjustable "color" feature rarely keeps my manual selection. Generally, after making all my edits, the preview looks as intended. When I hit save the edited version is overridden by the original photo when the PDF is generated. Automatic color editing options are great, and I often want to use the medium and bright options. Happy to work with your team to troubleshoot. More sort options (Title A-Z) in app would be nice

I love this app. I'm documenting all of my purchases, with pics of serial numbers and receipts. They save in Google Drive as a PDF as well, so don't have to only use the app to view it. Google, please don't kill this one! One thing I'd like to see is the ability to change the order of the pics in the edit window. You can delete individual pics, but can't move one from the back to the front without deleting them all and adding them all back in a different order.

title: Email - Lightning Fast & Secure Mail
description:
Email by Edison is the simplified, customizable inbox experience that allows you to manage unlimited email accounts in a seamless way! Get emails faster, block spam, and never see an ad clogging up your inbox again.

Enjoy Office 365, Yahoo Mail, AOL Mail, Hotmail, Outlook, MS Exchange, IMAP, Alto, Gmail, iCloud, Comcast, Verizon, AT&T, and more all in one application. Built for phone and tablet usage. 

Google Play Store 2017 Android Excellence Program Winner

TheVerge - ‚ÄúThe fastest email app around...‚Äù 
Android Authority - ‚Äú‚Ä¶useful features...great user interface‚Ä¶‚Äù
TechCrunch- ‚Äú‚Ä¶like you‚Äôve given the mail app an upgrade‚Ä¶‚Äù 
CNET- ‚Äú‚Ä¶imposes order on an unruly inbox‚Ä¶‚Äù 

With Edison Mail you get:
‚Ä¢ Price Alert - Get cash back on shopping! Enable Price Alert and Edison will alert you if your recent purchases dropped in price from retailers that offer price matching so you can ask for a refund for the difference.
‚Ä¢ All Your Inboxes The Way You Want - Manage all your mail accounts, easily switch between inboxes, optional Focus Inbox moves your important mail up front.
‚Ä¢ Closer to Inbox Zero - View all your subscriptions in a tab, unsubscribe from junk with a tap, bulk delete, block certain senders from messaging you again, easily block spam forever
‚Ä¢ Privacy From Prying Eyes - The only email to automatically block read receipt tracking pixels without degrading the email experience
‚Ä¢ Built-In AI Assistant - Easily search bills & receipts, attachments, travel, entertainment, and more without disturbing your email organization. Get real-time travel notifications about your flight plans. Check package statuses all in one folder. With our new Assistant, see your upcoming meetings, travel itinerary, bills due, smart unsubscribe suggestions, and more at a glance.
‚Ä¢ Fewer Mistakes - Always undo send and AI-based smart reply options.
‚Ä¢ Less Digging - A full search engine in your phone that allows you to search through all your folders quickly and seamlessly.
‚Ä¢ Customizable Notifications - Personalize sound and vibration settings. Only get alerted for the mail you care to see.

Privacy By Design is Our Promise to Our Users 
We put privacy first in all the things we do at Edison Software. We never target you for ads and prevent other companies from tracking you when you use our app. We also believe in being transparent and giving you choices. Please read our Privacy Policy to ensure that you are familiar with our practices and business model and to learn how you can manage your data.

Please send us your feature requests and feedback at mailsupport@edison.tech.

Special thanks to everyone who rates us 5 stars, or leaves kudos! Your support means the world to our team!


Price Alert is available in the US.
AI-Assistant available in the US, UK, Australia, Canada, and India.

comments: Can't use due to Android:installLocation setting. App won't move to adoptable storage and I definitely don't have room to store email internally. Looked promising otherwise and such a simple thing spoils it. This is so easy and no reason not to do so. With modern fast SD the speed penalty is usually not noticable. Yes, many apps are guilty of the same thing, that doesn't make it right. The only way I can make space on my device is to delete other apps I use also guilty of this. Not one more!

I've only used this app for a short time, but so far, it works as advertised. That said, all I want is a reliable way of collecting my email, and sending the occasional letter out while away from my computer. I'm hoping that this app doesn't get in the way of that through marketing or feature bloat. So far, my limited experience with this app has been good.

Many parts are cool in theory, but the flaws far outshine the positive aspects. Here are some of the major issues: „ÄãYou can create folders for organizing your inbox, but cannot set any rules for how items get sorted into said folders „ÄãFolders other than your main inbox do not refresh, show unread #, or show search results „ÄãAbout 10% of the time, the app will randomly start reading my emails allowed. Closing the app in multitasking doesn't stop it & it's not my device settings. Full dealbreaker.

Awesome, absolutely a breeze to use. I have multiple email accounts and need different settings for each one, which I can easily do through this app. I have no complaints at all after several months of using it now. There's small glitches that can happen here and there but due to the app being so good, u truly overlook the small little glitches!!!!

I did try quite a few of email clients, and happy to give 5stars to this one. Early days of use, and quite a few functionality in app, still exploring all settings, but looks quite clean, functional and simple to use. Will see in future if anything is not right for me. For now, would strongly recommend to anyone who is in need to manage multiple email accounts in one place! Thanks for great app!

title: Notepad Free
description:
Notepad Free is a small and fast app to create and edit text notes. Features:
* simple interface that most of the users find easy to use
* no limits on note's length or number of notes (of course there's a limit to phone's storage)
* creating and editing text notes
* importing notes from txt files, saving notes as txt files
* sharing notes with other apps (e.g. sending a note in Gmail)
* widgets allowing to quickly create or edit notes
* backup function for saving and loading notes from a backup file (zip file)
* app password lock
* color themes (including dark theme)
* note categories
* automatic note saving
* undo/redo
* lines in background, numbered lines
* technical support

** Important **
Please remember to make a backup copy of notes before formatting a phone or buying a new phone. Since the 1.7.0 version the app will also use Google device copy, if it's turned on in the device's and the app's settings.

* Why do I advise to not install the app on an SD card?
I follow Google's advice to block installing on an SD card apps that use widgets. This app uses widgets, which are like icons for the notes, and can be placed on a phone's home screen (for example).

* Why is the permission for writing on SD card listed on the permissions list?
It's currently not used. It was an optional permission for cases when a backup copy was to be saved on the device. Play Store shows historical permissions, even if it's no longer in use by the app.
Please remember that the permission can be revoked at any moment by going into the app's settings. Also, the app will ask for the permission when needed.

If you have any additional questions, just contact me by email: notepad.free@outlook.com .

Thank you.
Arek

comments: I like your app. Firstly, there isn't a long list of intrusive and unreasonable permissions request for this app. I like that you respect your user's privacy. Secondly, it is simple to use. I don't need an elaborate app just to make short reminder notes. However, I was wondering if it is possible to underline, bold or even cross out the text in my notes. For example, when I have bought something on my shopping list, I might like to cross out the item on my list.

This is a great app... I have used it for years now. I only suggest that you add a go to bottom of notepad button... I make very long notes and I feel like scrolling down to the bottom taking 30-45 seconds is excessive. Edit: OMG. Thank you to the developer!

Top shelf app. Easy to use, nice to have access to this product. I have trouble moving all the info from one appliance to another. Any help would be appreciated. It should be simple, I can't seem to get my head around it. Thank you
It is extremely simple and easy to use and the notes will not be sold to advertisers and are only accesible through the app
Works great. Thanks for developing it. Still works great. It helps keep track of my workouts.

title: Planning Center Headcounts
description:
You must already have an account with Planning Center Check-Ins, as well as Counter permissions to use this app. To sign up for an account subscription, have your organization administrator to go https://planningcenter.com/check-ins

===== Planning Center Headcounts: ======

Planning Center Headcounts is an online mobile application that works with Planning Center Check-Ins to help keep track of any type of attendance, without needing to track specific individuals. The Headcounts app works in conjunction with the times within Events in Check-Ins. Simply choose an existing event, then type of headcount you'd like to take attendance for, and your mobile device is instantly & conveniently converted into a digital handheld tally counter. You won't need to write down your totals manually when you're done, since saving your count total will instantly update your headcount total in Planning Center Check-Ins. Taking attendance is made simpler, more accessible, and your data is instantly saved to your account & can be included in your attendance reports.

title: School Event Tickets Scanner
description:
School Event Tickets Scanner App a handful Android application for event organizers - to let them stay organized and check in attendees faster at event with. Now available on Android phone and tablet device! Event organizers can scan tickets or look up names on the guestlist, and use multiple devices without worrying about the same ticket being used twice.
All check-ins are synced with our servers, so you can use more than one Android or iOS device at different points of entry.

Using School Event Tickets Scanner App app you can:
- Look up and check in attendees off a list
- Easily validate attendee barcodes or QR codes using the camera-based scanner
- Check in attendees using multiple devices at the same time
- Analyze your attendance data online after the event

title: Brother Print Service Plugin
description:
The Brother Print Service Plugin enables you to print directly from your Android devices (Android 5.0 or later), to your Brother printer through a Wi-Fi network. As this is a plugin application, you can print using the "Print" option of supported Android apps. Please see below for supported applications (as of March 2015):

- Chrome Browser
- Gmail
- Photos
- Google Sheets
- Google Slides
- Google Docs
- Google Drive

The following print options are available (compatible options will depend on the selected device):

- Copies
- Paper Size
- Color/Mono
- Orientation
- Media Type
- Quality
- Layout
- 2-sided
- Borderless

After installing this application, you must activate it in one of the following ways:
- Tap the icon displayed in the notification area immediately after installation, and enable it in the displayed screen.
- Tap "Settings" on your Android device and tap "Printing", then select "Brother Print Service Plugin". Enable it in the displayed screen.

Please visit your local Brother website for supported models.
*Please note the email address mobile-apps-id@brother.com is for feedback only. Unfortunately we cannot reply to inquiries sent to this address.

comments: this used to work but no longer works for me. Yes it installed ok, yes it is enabled in the printing services and shows up when you go to add a printer, but it just says "cannnot add printers'. I guess it doesn't work with Android 11. I am instead able to use the app called 'Brother iPrint&Scan' and that works well, though its not as convenient as printing right from apps themselves. workaround is to print from apps to a pdf or picture file, save it, then use 'Brother iPrint&Scan' to print the pdf or picture file.

All it ever says is Can't connect to printer my printers connected to my pc but does not provide any additional information of anything on the connection then. Both my phone and the printer on the same Wi-Fi WI why isn't it finding the connection. With my last phone I was able to find it no problem now with my new phone can't connect to it at all.

Nothing worse than having a product work fine until it just doesn't. Seems to be a simple software issue, but by reading the recent negative reviews about the connectivity issue, Brother doesn't seem to think it's worth addressing. Zero stars.

Love Brother Service! What You NEED: 1) Install Brother Printer App 2) Install Brother Print Service Plugin 3) Be on "SAME" Wifi to printer wireless! (Your printer & Your Device -ex... Laptop, Phone, desktop computer). When you finish printing you can go BACK to your phone's own wifi. *Note: When your device is desktop or laptop computer...You can download drivers (from finding & matching to your specific desktop/laptop model! Hope this info helps you. It has never failed me so far. ;)

Provides extra print settings. The typical connectivity issues seen to be sure to the printer going idle. I usually tap through the menu on the printer to print settings, then immediately cancel the print job before it's done thinking about it. Within 10 seconds or so if that, my phone should be able to detect the printer on the network and this app can then be used to drive the print options page. All the folks saying it can't find the printer, I'm sure it's actually the printer, not this app.
